title: Platinion Principal Data/AI Architect
description:
**Locations**: Singapore \\| Kuala Lumpur \\| Jakarta


Who We Are


Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963\\. Today, we help clients with total transformation\\-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom\\-line impact.  

  

To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading\\-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures—and business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.

 **About BCG Platinion**

  

BCG Platinion's presence spans across the globe, with offices in Asia, Europe, and South and North America. We achieve digital excellence for clients with sustained solutions to the most complex and time\\-sensitive challenge. We guide clients into the future to push the status quo, overcome tech limitations, and enable our clients to go further in their digital journeys than what has ever been possible in the past. At BCG Platinion, we deliver business value through the innovative use of technology at a rapid pace. We roll up our sleeves to transform business, revolutionize approaches, satisfy customers, and change the game through Architecture, Cybersecurity, Digital Transformation, Enterprise Application and Risk functions. We balance vision with a pragmatic path to change transforming strategies into leading\\-edge tech platforms, at scale.

**Practice Area**

  

BCG Platinion launched in Germany in 2000 to add deep technical expertise to the Boston Consulting Group’s existing capabilities. Today, our presence spans across the globe, with offices in Asia, Europe, and South and North America. Our New York\\-based North American team began in 2014 and in 2017 acquired MAYA Design, a Pittsburgh\\-based digital design and innovation lab, to grow our capabilities around technology and design.

  

We support our clients’ total digital transformation through technology, design, cybersecurity, and risk management \\& financial engineering capabilities. And together with BCG, BCG Platinion’s interdisciplinary team of technical experts enable customized technical solutions and accelerate delivery value through new business platforms, application consolidations, and major system implementations.

  

What You'll Do

**Position Overview**

**About this role**

  

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Data/AI Architect to provide strategic guidance on designing, developing, and optimizing modern data architectures that support advanced analytics, AI/ML, and real\\-time data processing. This role emphasizes advisory and leadership, helping organizations define future\\-ready data strategies and governance frameworks that enable AI\\-driven use cases. The ideal candidate will work closely with data engineers, data scientists, business analysts, and IT leaders to shape scalable, secure, and efficient data ecosystems.

 **What You Will Do**

 **Data Architecture \\& Strategy**

* Define and advise on the design of modern, future\\-ready data architectures that align with business goals and support AI, analytics, and automation.
* Guide organizations in adopting cloud\\-native and hybrid data solutions (AWS, Azure, GCP, Snowflake, Databricks).
* Provide thought leadership on best practices for data modeling, data warehousing, and lakehouse architectures to ensure scalability and performance.
* Shape long\\-term data strategies that foster flexibility, innovation, and interoperability across platforms.

 **Data Governance \\& Advisory**

* Lead the development of governance frameworks and policies that ensure data security, compliance, and ethical AI use.
* Provide guidance on the creation and maintenance of data dictionaries, metadata management, and data cataloging, ensuring consistency, accuracy, and alignment with industry best practices.
* Advise on data quality management strategies, ensuring robust data lineage, accuracy, and reliability across the organization.
* Define governance roadmaps that support AI adoption while maintaining compliance with GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA, and other regulations.

 **Cloud \\& Emerging Technologies**

* Provide strategic recommendations on leveraging data lakes, data meshes, and serverless architectures to optimize data processing and storage.
* Advise on implementing real\\-time streaming solutions (Kafka, Kinesis, Pub/Sub) to support AI\\-driven analytics.
* Assess and recommend AI/ML\\-enabled data architectures that facilitate scalable feature engineering and model training pipelines.
* Guide organizations in evaluating and adopting graph databases, NoSQL solutions, and modern data integration tools.

 **Collaboration \\& Leadership**

* Act as a trusted advisor to C\\-level executives and business leaders, translating complex data challenges into strategic initiatives.
* Collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and business analysts to enhance data accessibility and usability.
* Drive innovation in data architecture, ensuring organizations remain competitive and AI\\-ready.
* Lead assessments of emerging data technologies and best practices to future\\-proof organizational data strategies.

  

What You'll Bring

**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**

* Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Data Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
* Experience: 10\\-16 years in data architecture, data engineering, or cloud\\-based data solutions.
* Flexibility to travel within SEA/Asia Pacific region

 **Technical \\& Advisory Expertise:**

* Deep knowledge of cloud data platforms (AWS Redshift, Azure Synapse, Google BigQuery, Snowflake).
* Expertise in data governance, master data management (MDM), and compliance frameworks.
* Strong understanding of AI\\-ready data architectures and their impact on feature engineering and ML workflows.
* Ability to guide organizations on ETL/ELT strategy, data integration, and workflow automation.
* Familiarity with industry\\-standard data architecture frameworks (TOGAF, Zachman).
* Experience advising on real\\-time data streaming (Kafka, Kinesis, Pub/Sub).

 **Preferred Qualifications**

* Certifications in cloud data platforms (AWS Certified Data Analytics, Azure Data Engineer, GCP Professional Data Engineer).
* Experience advising on Data Mesh and Data Fabric architectures.
* Knowledge of Graph databases and NoSQL solutions (MongoDB, Neo4j, Cassandra).
* Background in data ethics, responsible AI, and AI governance frameworks.

 **Why Join Us?**

* Influence enterprise data strategies at a global scale.
* Work in a collaborative, innovative environment that values advisory expertise.
* Competitive compensation and benefits.
* Lead transformational data initiatives that shape AI adoption and digital innovation.

  

If you are passionate about advising organizations on future\\-ready data architectures and driving AI\\-enabled data strategies, we invite you to apply!

  

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
  

BCG is an E \\- Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E\\-Verify.

title: Data Engineer
description:
- Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, and cybersecurity.


By combining creativity, tech, and data insights, we empower our customers to transform their business and unlock the future.


With 25 years’ of experience and 8,000 employees across Europe and the Middle East, Devoteam promotes responsible tech for people and works to create better change.


\\#Creative Tech for Better Change


Devoteam has launched in January 2021 its new strategic plan, Infinite 2024, with the ambition to become the \\#1 EMEA partner of the leading Cloud\\-based platform companies (AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft, Salesforce, ServiceNow), further reinforced by deep expertise in digital strategy, cybersecurity, and data.

  
The **Data Engineer** will be responsible for the following activities:


* Work closely with data architects and other stakeholders to design scalable and robust data architectures that meet the organization's requirements
* Develop and maintain data pipelines, which involve the extraction of data from various sources, data transformation to ensure quality and consistency, and loading the processed data into data warehouses or other storage systems
* Responsible for managing data warehouses and data lakes, ensuring their performance, scalability, and security
* Integrate data from different sources, such as databases, APIs, and external systems, to create unified and comprehensive datasets.
* Perform data transformations and implement Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes to convert raw data into formats suitable for analysis and reporting
* Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to establish data quality standards and implement data governance practices
* Optimise data processing and storage systems for performance and scalability
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including data scientists, analysts, and business stakeholders, to understand data requirements and deliver solutions

  
* Programming Skills: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, Scala, or SQL is essential for data engineering roles. Data engineers should have experience in writing efficient and optimized code for data processing, transformation, and integration.
* Database Knowledge: Strong knowledge of relational databases (e.g., SQL) and experience with database management systems (DBMS) is crucial. Familiarity with data modeling, schema design, and query optimization is important for building efficient data storage and retrieval systems.
* Big Data Technologies: Understanding and experience with big data technologies such as Apache Hadoop, Apache Spark, or Apache Kafka is highly beneficial. Knowledge of distributed computing and parallel processing frameworks is valuable for handling large\\-scale data processing.
* ETL and Data Integration: Proficiency in Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes and experience with data integration tools like Apache NiFi, Talend, or Informatica is desirable. Knowledge of data transformation techniques and data quality principles is important for ensuring accurate and reliable data.
* Data Warehousing: Familiarity with data warehousing concepts and experience with popular data warehousing platforms like Amazon Redshift, Google BigQuery, or Snowflake is advantageous. Understanding dimensional modeling and experience in designing and optimizing data warehouses is beneficial.
* Cloud Platforms: Knowledge of cloud computing platforms such as Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, or Google Cloud Platform (GCP) is increasingly important. Experience in deploying data engineering solutions in the cloud and utilizing cloud\\-based data services is valuable.
* Data Pipelines and Workflow Tools: Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools such as Apache Airflow, Luigi, or Apache Oozie is beneficial. Understanding how to design, schedule, and monitor data workflows is essential for efficient data processing.
* Problem\\-Solving and Analytical Skills: Data engineers should have strong problem\\-solving abilities and analytical thinking to identify data\\-related issues, troubleshoot problems, and optimize data processing workflows.
* Communication and Collaboration: Effective communication and collaboration skills are crucial for working with cross\\-functional teams, including data scientists, analysts, and business stakeholders. Data engineers should be able to translate technical concepts into clear and understandable terms.

  
- **Education and Experience**


	* Bachelor’s degree in Engineering required.
	* Minimum Two years of related experience is highly preferred.
	* Two certifications in GCP (within 3 months after joining).Status: Full\\-Time


Duration: \\-


Beginning date: September 2025


The Devoteam Group is committed to equal opportunities, promoting its employees on the basis of merit and actively fighting against all forms of discrimination. We believe that diversity contributes to the creativity, dynamism, and excellence of our organization. All our positions are open to people with disabilities.

company: PT Victory International Branch Jakarta Setiabudi
description:
**Internship – Market Analysis \\& Sales Support**  
**Status:** Internship \\| **Lokasi:** Jakarta (Hybrid)

**Tentang Program**  
Program Market Analysis \\& Sales Support Internship memberikan kesempatan bagi kamu yang tertarik mendalami dunia riset pasar, trading, dan hubungan klien di industri keuangan.  
Selama program ini, kamu akan belajar langsung bagaimana melakukan analisis pasar, mendukung aktivitas sales, dan memahami dinamika nyata dunia finansial.

**Tanggung Jawab**

* Melakukan riset pasar terkait saham, komoditas, dan instrumen keuangan lainnya.
* Mengolah serta menganalisis data untuk menghasilkan laporan atau visualisasi yang mendukung strategi trading dan sales.
* Memantau aktivitas trading secara real\\-time dan memberikan insight kepada tim.
* Membantu kegiatan prospek dengan memperkenalkan layanan analisis dan trading kepada calon klien.
* Menjaga komunikasi awal dengan klien dan calon investor.

**Kualifikasi**

* Mahasiswa tingkat akhir atau fresh graduate dari jurusan Ekonomi, Keuangan, Statistika, Matematika, Teknik Industri, atau bidang terkait.
* Memiliki minat yang kuat pada pasar modal, trading, dan relasi klien.
* Analitis, detail, dan memiliki inisiatif tinggi.
* Mahir menggunakan Microsoft Excel atau Google Sheets (pengalaman dengan SQL, Python, atau R menjadi nilai tambah).
* Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik dan mampu bekerja secara mandiri maupun dalam tim.
* Mampu berbahasa Inggris dengan baik, lisan maupun tulisan, menjadi keunggulan tambahan.

**Manfaat yang Akan Kamu Dapatkan**

* Pengalaman langsung dalam kegiatan riset pasar dan dukungan sales.
* Mentoring dari profesional berpengalaman di industri keuangan.
* Sertifikat magang dan surat rekomendasi resmi.
* Akses ke data pasar dan sistem trading secara langsung.
* Kesempatan membangun jaringan dengan klien, investor, dan praktisi industri.

Jenis Pekerjaan: Magang  
Panjang kontrak: 3 bulan

Pertanyaan Lamaran:

* Apakah kamu mahasiswa aktif atau sudah lulus? Jika mahasiswa, semester berapa sekarang?
* Apakah kamu bersedia mengikuti magang secara hybrid/onsite di Jakarta?
* Berapa lama durasi magang yang bisa kamu jalani?
* Apakah kamu memiliki preferensi khusus antara fokus ke market analysis atau sales support?

title: Manufacturing Analyst
description:
**Career Area:**


Manufacturing**Job Description:**

**Your Work Shapes the World at Caterpillar Inc.**

When you join Caterpillar, you're joining a global team who cares not just about the work we do – but also about each other. We are the makers, problem solvers, and future world builders who are creating stronger, more sustainable communities. We don't just talk about progress and innovation here – we make it happen, with our customers, where we work and live. Together, we are building a better world, so we can all enjoy living in it.

**What does it mean to live the Caterpillar Experience?**


At Caterpillar’s Indonesia Batam, we manufacture Hydraulic Mining Shovels products used in building the infrastructure and mining to move materials that makes a better world.


As Caterpillar’s Manufacturing Analyst, you will work both independently and as part of a team to perform detailing budget management for expense and capital. Creates, updates and improves manufacturing engineering document.

**As the** **Manufacturing Analyst****, you will:**

* Detailed budget management with accountability for delivering to spend profile on time.
* Facilitate manufacturing engineering capital and expense budgeting and identify opportunities for cost savings.
* Order recognition and organization of purchase orders across functional areas.
* Creates, updates, and improves manufacturing engineering standard works.
* Support attendance record and validation.
* Coordinate supplier permit based on required.

**The successful candidate must bring:**

* Engineering, Finance or business administration degree background or equivalent experiences.
* 1\\-3 years of experience in a manufacturing environment.
* Fluent in SAP, Power BI, PowerApps, Coupa, GEP, Excel.
* Knowledge of data, process and events, ability to use tools and techniques for analysing and documenting logical relationships among data, processes or events.
* Knowledge of the process of planning and arranging tasks and resources.
* Ability to plan and organize both time and resources to get things completed while structuring and maintaining work in a systematic way.
* Ability to collaborate, communicate and work with cross functional teams to provide updates on key departmental activities.

**Top candidates will also bring (would be highly considered):**

* Strong problem solving and analytical skills.
* Knowledge of large\\-scale budge management.
* Excellent communication, interpersonal and teamwork skills.

**Additional Information**

Shift: Regular.


Work location: Batam, Kepulauan Riau.


You will work both in an office and manufacturing shop\\-floor environment.


This position requires the candidate to work a 5\\-day\\-a\\-week schedule in the office.


*Domestic relocation is available for this position.*

**Employee Benefit Details**

Our goal at Caterpillar is for you to have a rewarding career. Our teams are critical to the success of our customers who build a better world. Here you earn more than just a salaried wage because we value your performance, we offer a total rewards package that provides benefits (medical, dental, vision, pension, and accident \\& life insurance) along with the potential of an annual bonus.

**Final Details**

Please frequently check the email associated with your application, including the junk/spam folder, as this is the primary correspondence method. If you wish to know the status of your application – please use the candidate log\\-in on our career website as it will reflect any updates to your status.


Relocation is available for this position.**Posting Dates:**


November 21, 2025 \\- December 4, 2025
Caterpillar is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants of any age are encouraged to apply


Not ready to apply? Join our Talent Community.

title: Technical Product Manager
description:
**ABOUT INFLUENCONNECT \\& COMMS8**


InfluenConnect™ (www.influenconnect.com) is a pioneering SaaS platform launched by Comms8 in 2023 to liberate the influencer economy. The platform connects brands with over 105,000 influencers worldwide, providing transparency, data\\-driven insights, and access to diverse creators across emerging markets.  

  

Backed by Comms8 — a multi\\-award\\-winning martech agency with offices in London, Tokyo, and Hong Kong — our mission is to bridge East and West through impactful, inclusive campaigns. Our agency has been recognised by the Cannes Lions, UK Agency Awards, and The Drum. Clients include UNDP, NHS, Hoyoverse, Montblanc, and Air China.

**ABOUT OUR TEAM**


Our team at InfluenConnect x Comms8 is a dynamic and diverse group that thrives on collaboration and innovation. We believe in equal opportunities for all and celebrate the richness of cultural differences. We foster an inclusive work environment where every team member’s unique perspective and background are valued.

**ABOUT THE ROLE**


We’re hiring a Technical Product Manager to lead platform delivery and internal systems development across both InfluenConnect and Comms8\\.


You’ll report to the Managing Director and collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to:

* Drive core feature development on our SaaS platform (InfluenConnect)
* Oversee automation and tool\\-building to improve operational efficiency


This is a dual\\-role opportunity with clear ownership of technical execution. You’ll be fluent in product thinking, capable of translating business goals into dev\\-ready plans, and ideally comfortable implementing features independently as we reduce reliance on external developers.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Platform \\& Product Management**

* + Drive delivery of new features: discovery tools, UX improvements, creator onboarding, affiliate tracking, etc.
	+ Translate business objectives into roadmaps, sprint plans, and technical briefs
	+ Collaborate with external developers, internal analysts, and user teams
	+ Prioritize and launch scalable, user\\-centric features aligned with platform growth goals

**Internal Systems \\& Automation**

* + Lead system automation projects (CRM workflows, dashboards, content scheduling, supplier databases)
	+ Work with internal stakeholders and junior automation team (e.g. Airtable, Zapier, Looker Studio)
	+ Develop internal documentation and training materials for newly implemented tools

**Cross\\-Functional Management**

* + Use Trello, Jira, or Notion to manage project pipelines and team accountability
	+ Report regularly to the founder and unblock team progress as needed
	+ Balance fast delivery with long\\-term product quality and technical scale

**Requirements**

* 3–5 years of experience managing SaaS products or internal systems
* Must be a fluent with English \\& Chinese.
* Great communication skills.
* Solid grasp of product lifecycles, UX, APIs, and system basics (coding ability is a bonus)
* Confident in owning roadmaps, writing specs, and working with developers
* Comfortable using tools like Jira, Trello, Notion, Airtable, Zapier, and Looker Studio
* Plus values: experience with Web3, blockchain, payments, trust \\& safety, or marketplace platforms
* Proactive, solution\\-focused, and ready to get things done.

**Benefits**

* Be part of building two fast\\-growing brands changing the game in cross\\-cultural marketing and influencer tech.
* A supportive, inclusive team culture that champions your growth
* Career progression opportunities in a fast\\-growing agency
* Competitive salary and performance\\-based bonus
* Flexible, remote\\-first work style

title: Head of Marketing Services (E-commerce enablement)
description:
**Lead Full\\-Funnel Growth Across Ads \\& E\\-commerce. Join AnyMind Group as the Head of Marketing Services and take charge of performance\\-driven advertising and e\\-commerce operations for top\\-tier brand clients. You'll own strategy and execution across media buying, marketplace operations, and digital enablement in the e\\-commerce area, bringing together creative campaigns and operational excellence to scale brands faster across Asia.**
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


**What You'll Do**
------------------


* **Lead Ad Strategy \\& Execution (60%)**: Oversee all e‑commerce advertising formats from marketplaces to social commerce and programmatic. Define and execute ad growth plan, budget allocation, creative testing, channel mix and ROI optimisation.
* **Own E‑commerce Operations (40%)**: Partner with operations, fulfilment, and logistics teams to ensure scalable product listing, stock management, marketplace readiness, and operational KPIs (conversion, AOV, returns).
* **Build Integrated Solutions**: Combine advertising services with e‑commerce enablement to offer bundled, value‑driven solutions for brands—bridging media, operations and technology.
* **Drive Team \\& Performance Culture**: Lead, mentor and scale a high‑performance team across media specialists, operations managers and optimisation analysts.
* **Measure, Analyse \\& Report**: Develop dashboards and insight workflows that measure advertising effectiveness, operational efficiency and holistic brand impact. Use data to refine strategies and improve client outcomes.
* **Stakeholder Engagement**: Serve as key partner to brands, agencies and internal leadership; set strategy, present results, and guide next‑step actions.
* Report to Managing Director of Indonesia

**Who You Are**
---------------


* 7\\+ years in e‑commerce advertising, digital marketing or operations, preferably in a e\\-commerce enablement, agency or platform setting.
* Deep expertise in e‑commerce ad formats (marketplace ads, social ads, programmatic) and demonstrable performance growth (ROAS, conversions, GMV).
* Strong operations mindset—experience in fulfilment, marketplace logistics, product listing or supply chain optimisation is a plus.
* Strategic thinker with hands‑on execution: you can set vision and also roll up your sleeves to hit results.
* Excellent data‑analysis skills and comfort building dashboards, KPIs and reporting frameworks.
* Strong leadership and communication skills—able to align cross‑functional teams and present to senior stakeholders.
* Fluent in English both speaking and writing

**Why You'll Love It**
----------------------


* Competitive Salary
* Performance Review (2 times per year)
* Performance Bonus (1 time per year)
* 12 days of annual paid leaves
* Exciting opportunity to explore e\\-commerce and digital marketing trends
* Grow your career in an international, professional, fast\\-paced and dynamic environment

title: Senior Supervisor Operations Technology
description:
**Senior Supervisor Operations Technology**
-------------------------------------------


Job ID
931856
Job Type
Permanent Full Time
Location
Indonesia \\- Jakarta
Categories
Engineering \\- Other

Applications close
30 Nov 2025 SE Asia Standard Time
  
**About us**
============



With a global business, we offer diverse and rewarding careers. We are committed to Thiess being a company and a culture where great people can excel and where they are developed and supported to reach their highest potential. Join our team today.


**About the role**
==================



The role is responsible for providing operation performance analysis, recommendation, or guidance to solve and prioritize action plan and problem solving to site management (superintendent up)



In this role, you will:


* Be involved in shaping the operation strategy in shift, daily and weekly time frame with mining operation team
* Conduct the audit to ensure the site team configure the optimizer according to the best practice and real field conditions
* Oversee all activities by dispatch operation and mining analyst
* Train and coach ROC team members
* Continuously review ROC set\\-up and identify improvement opportunities
* Monitor FMS system health and data quality
* Collaborate with external (client, vendor, etc.)

**About you**
=============


* Bachelor's degree in engineering, statistics, and mathematics
* More than 6 years' experience in Fleet Management System (FMS)
* Good understanding of Fleet management system (Hexagon or Wenco), new mining technology, mining operation, mine planning, reporting and cost control, data analysis and statistics knowledge
* Has project management, FMS network and hardware installation capabilities
* Has capability as mining analyst and dispatch engineers
* Good understanding on coal mining or other mineral mining operation
* Good leadership and English communication skill
* Good analysis skill especially with numbers, calculation and demonstrate high excel skill
* Good presentation skill (slide designer) and confident to present in English


**About us**



We partner with our clients to deliver excellence in open cut and underground mining in Australia, Asia, Africa and the Americas. For more than 80 years, we’ve operated in diverse commodities, geologies, environments and cultures. Our team uses that insight to optimise solutions for each project and create lasting value for our clients and the communities we live and work in.



Visit our website to learn more – http://www.thiess.com


**Driving a diverse, inclusive and respectful culture**



We’re committed to safe, healthy and respectful workplaces. A place where everyone matters always.



We welcome and celebrate the differences and similarities among people including gender, identity, ethnicity, race, heritage, sexual orientation, disability, age, culture, religion, language, appearance, parental status and education.



We believe diverse experiences and perspectives not only make us more innovative, productive and engaged, but are crucial to our success.



If you require assistance to apply for this job because of disability or special needs, please contact us here. No other requests will be acknowledged.


**How to apply**
================

title: Data & Insights Analyst - People Analytics
description:
MAKE HISTORY WITH US!


At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business, and building our future on smoke\\-free products with the power to improve the lives of a billion smokers worldwide.


With huge change, comes huge opportunity. So, wherever you join us, you’ll enjoy the freedom to dream up and deliver better, brighter solutions and the space to move your career forward in endlessly different directions.

 **Role Overview**


We are looking for a curious, technically skilled individual with strong analytical abilities and excellent communication skills to join our team as a **People Analytics Analyst**. In this role, you will analyze workforce data to uncover insights that shape talent strategies and drive business performance. You’ll apply scientific thinking to business questions, using both statistical and qualitative methods, and collaborate closely with data science teams.


A key part of your role will be **translating complex technical analyses into clear, compelling narratives** that resonate with business stakeholders. You will transform data into actionable recommendations, enabling leaders to make informed, strategic decisions.


This is a unique opportunity to work at the intersection of data, people, and strategy—helping leaders make informed decisions that impact our global workforce.

**Your 'day\\-to\\-day'**

* Lead end\\-to\\-end scaleable workforce analytics projects, from consulting with HR and business leaders to understand their needs, gathering business requirements, framing analytics questions, and validating hypothesis to delivering outputs, visualizing data, and generating actionable insights that drive value.
* Partner with HR and business stakeholders to co\\-develop data\\-driven solutions and influence strategic decision\\-making.
* In collaboration with data science teams, use data mining and statistical techniques to analyze data to uncover trends, patterns, and opportunities.
* Translate complex data into clear, compelling stories and visualizations.
* Provide data driven insights and recommendations that support talent strategies and business goals to drive actions
* Measure Impacts from actions delivered
* Continuously explore new tools, techniques, and data sources to enhance the impact and efficiency of analytics solutions.
* Ensure data quality, privacy, and compliance in all analyses.
* Support data literacy by sharing knowledge and best practices with HR colleagues and stakeholders.
* Part of your role and onboarding journey will be to deliver operational reporting to ensure all reports are delivered according to SLA and support efforts to automate this demand

**Who we’re looking for**

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in a relevant field (e.g., Data Science, Psychology, Economics, Business, or related disciplines).
* Proven experience in data analysis, preferably in HR or workforce\\-related domains.
* Familiarity with HR systems and data (e.g. SuccessFactors).
* Strong technical skills: advanced Excel, SQL, scripting (e.g. Python)
* Strong statistical and quantitative analytical skills
* Experience with dashboarding tools (e.g., Power BI, advanced PowerPoint storytelling).
* Ability to apply structured thinking and scientific methods to problems.
* Excellent communication and storytelling skills—able to translate data into business\\-relevant insights.
* Strong consulting mindset: proactive, curious, and solution\\-oriented.
* Understanding of data privacy and governance in HR analytics.

title: Data Innovation Analyst (Disparity)
description:
Job Brief



Location: Remote



**Program Background**
The SKALA Program is a significant Australian investment designed to help Indonesia address regional disparities in development. SKALA will contribute to this objective by strengthening selected elements of Indonesia's large and complex decentralised government system responsible for the delivery of basic services (Layanan Dasar). The SKALA Program's core approach is to facilitate better collaboration (Kolaborasi) between Indonesian government stakeholders, at national and subnational levels, to help realise synergies (Sinergi) that will trigger improved service delivery. Moreover, SKALA will build on, and take to scale, the successes and learning from Australia's previous 19 years of support to Indonesia's decentralised government system. The SKALA Program is to be implemented through the following three pillars:* Pillar 1: Stronger national level enabling environment for sub\\-national service delivery.
* Pillar 2: Better sub\\-national governance for service delivery.
* Pillar 3: Greater participation, representation and influence for women, people with disabilities and vulnerable groups.

  

SKALA is implemented at the national level with an office in Jakarta and at the subnational level with offices in Aceh, Nusa Tenggara Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Maluku, Gorontalo, Kalimantan Utara, Tanah Papua. In addition to the 3 pillars, SKALA works across 4 general themes of Public Financial Management, Minimum Service Standards, Data and Analysis and GEDSI. **About DT Global Asia Pacific**
At DT Global Asia Pacific, we aim to positively impact people’s lives through delivery excellence. As a leading implementing partner across Asia and the Pacific, we co\\-create locally led solutions in partnership with governments, communities, and stakeholders. We bring together talented teams and deep regional expertise to deliver initiatives that promote inclusive economic growth, essential services, and resilient, secure communities. With over 1,500 staff, experts in 22\\+ countries and more than 60 years of development experience, we tackle complex community, national and transnational challenges — from governance and justice systems to climate resilience, infrastructure and social equity — with innovative thinking and a commitment to long\\-term impact.

  

For more information, please see **www.dt\\-global.com** **The Role**


Reporting to the Research Lead, the Data Innovation Analyst (Disparity) will focus on processing and presenting data to measure regional disparities as the initial stage of the Disparity Analysis Study will be carried out by the Partner Research Organization. This position will support the SKALA Research Team in identifying and mapping the study areas to serve as inputs for subsequent stages of the study.

  

 copy paste it to access the full Terms of Reference for this position:**https://tinyurl.com/438tw57z** **About You****Specific Responsibilities****The key roles and responsibilities of the position are to provide the following:**

* Assemble large\\-scale survey datasets by leveraging expertise in managing sources such as Susenas, Sakernas, Podes, and other relevant socio\\-economic data, including data from sectoral ministries (Satu Sehat, Dapodik). This includes extracting key information, cleaning and transforming data and conducting statistical analysis. Identify, design and implement infrastructure for scalability, optimize data delivery and automating manual processes.
* Build required infrastructure for extraction, transformation and loading of data from various data sources using SQL technologies.
* Construction of the Multidimensional Poverty Index (MPI) at the household level using geotagged Regsosek data.
* Spatial Analysis and Deprivation Mapping:
* Conduct spatial clustering to identify multidimensional poverty hotspots.
* Integrate MPI with basic service facility maps to identify priority areas with critical service deficits.
* Data Consistency – Perform cross\\-validation with BPS (Susenas) data and sectoral datasets.
* Perform analytical skills to interpret data, identify trends, patterns, and correlations, and generate actionable insights for different sets of data including Regsosek/DTSEN, Susenas, Sakernas, Podes, and other relevant socio\\-economic data. Apply statistical methods to draw meaningful conclusions from these datasets.
* Visualization \\& Documentation – Present analysis results in the form of maps, dashboards, and technical reports to support the study team’s decision\\-making.
* Technical Collaboration – Work closely with the research team, partner institutions, and Bappenas/SKALA representatives in co\\-designing the analytical methodology.
* Other tasks as requested by SKALA

 **Other Duties**

* Comply with DFAT, DT Global and SKALA policies on gender, disability, fraud and anticorruption, child protection, PSEAH and the environment.
* Ensure compliance and adherence to various operational policies, guidelines and manuals issued by DT Global and SKALA.

 **Job Requirements*** Work environment involves only infrequent exposure to disagreeable elements and minor physical exertion and/or strain.
* Work may require long, and flexible hours as needed. Travel is based on need (other options: travel is not required, or occasional travel).

 **Deliverables*** Data \\& Analysis of multidimensional poverty hotspot maps at district/sub\\-district/village levels.
* Maps of basic service facility distribution and accessibility analysis.
* Overlay analysis of disparities (MPI vs. service access).

 **Relationship Management**
This position reports to the Research Lead and will work closely and effectively with Research Manager and SKALA DNA team.

 **Selection Criteria****Essential*** Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Economics, Data Science.
* At least 5 years of experience in processing and analyzing large\\-scale socio\\-economic data.
* Familiar with MPI / Multidimensional Deprivation Index
* Data processing using R, Python, Stata, or SPSS.
* Familiarity with national datasets such as Regsosek, Susenas, etc.
* Ability to develop interactive data visualizations (dashboards, heatmaps, spatial visualization).
* Strong ability to work in cross\\-disciplinary teams and meet analysis deadlines.

 **HOW TO APPLY** **Please submit**  

1\\) Your CV  

2\\) A cover letter addressing the selection criteria **APPLICATIONS CLOSE Friday, 5****th** **December 2025\\. Max 5 PM Jakarta Time** **Encouraging applications from people with disabilities**  

As part of our commitment to inclusion, we actively encourage applications from people with disabilities (PWDs). We are also committed to providing reasonable accommodation throughout the recruitment process and in the workplace to support the success and well\\-being of employees with disabilities. Candidates requiring any adjustments to participate equitably, may contact SKALA People \\& Culture unit at recruitment@skala.or.id and we will work with the candidate to find the right solution. This information is strictly confidential; used solely to strengthen our inclusive hiring efforts and ensure we provide any support needed. Your disclosure will not impact on recruitment decisions.  

  

***Should this role be of interest, we encourage you to apply as soon as possible. Kindly note only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.***  

DT Global is committed to child protection and safeguarding the welfare of children in the delivery of our international development programs. We are committed to Safety and the Prevention of Sexual Abuse and Harassment (PSEAH), and bribery prevention. DT Global is an equal opportunity employer and we encourage women, men, people with diverse backgrounds and people living with disabilities to apply. This program is funded by the Australian Government and Managed by DT Global.

**Location:**Jakarta, ID
**SR\\&T Analyst – Restructuring, Turnaround \\& Cost Transformation ID**  

  

**Are you ready to unleash your potential?**  

  

At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.
  

  

We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose\\-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.
  

  

Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.
  

  

We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.  

  

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!  

  

**Work you’ll do**  



Deloitte is growing its Strategy, Risk, and Transaction (“SR\\&T”) – Restructuring, Turnaround \\& Cost Transformation (“RTCT”) practice in Southeast Asia.  


Our people flourish in the unexpected. The RTCT team specialises in offering sophisticated advice and innovative solutions to companies facing corporate stress or disruption. Working with lenders, investors and senior stakeholders including CEOs, CFOs and MDs, we advise on financial restructuring / refinancing, operational restructuring, profit improvement programs, cash generation / working capital analysis, and large\\-scale complex transformational change, to protect and build value, while maximizing returns.  

You will work alongside our clients to bring a rigorous, evidence\\-based analytical capability and strategic thinking to help them solve pressing, complex and cross\\-border issues. You will have the opportunity to work collaboratively with our clients to understand the forces that are driving change, identifying opportunities and develop solutions across the whole organization.  



The nature of the work we do includes:
* Independent Business Reviews
* Financial Restructuring
* Operational Turnaround

* Cost Optimisation and EBITDA improvement
* Corporate \\& Transaction Structuring

**Your role as a Team Member:**  


At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We expect our people to embrace and live our purpose and shared values, challenging themselves every day to identify issues that are most important to our clients, our people and the communities, and to make an impact that matters. title: Laboratory Analyst
description:
Company Description


Mitrabara Adiperdana Tbk (MBAP) is proud to expand its business through one of its subsidiaries, Mitradelta Bahari Pratama (MBP). As our company continues to grow, we are venturing into the aquaculture industry with a clear vision: to become a leader in sustainable practices while creating a meaningful socio\\-economic impact. At MBP, you will have the opportunity to contribute to sustainable aquaculture initiatives, drive innovation, and support the development of local communities.


Description


* Melakukan pengecekan parameter air dasar minimal 2x sehari (pH, DO, tinggi permukaan air, warna air, suhu, dan parameter lainnya).
* Melakukan pengecekan kimia air minimal 1x seminggu, termasuk TOM, alkalinitas, plankton, dan parameter pendukung kualitas air lainnya.
* Melakukan pengecekan benur (larva udang) dan menyusun laporan hasil pengujian kualitas benur sebelum proses penebaran ke kolam budidaya.
* Membantu proses penimbangan dan persiapan obat\\-obatan yang akan digunakan atau dikirim ke kolam budidaya.
* Menyusun laporan hasil pengukuran dan observasi lapangan secara harian, mingguan, atau sesuai permintaan manajemen.
* Menganalisis data kualitas air sebagai dasar rekomendasi teknis bagi tim teknisi atau tim operasional tambak.
* Melakukan pengawasan kegiatan panen serta menyusun laporan hasil panen secara akurat dan tepat waktu.
Requirement


* Pendidikan minimal D3 di bidang Kimia, Biologi, Teknologi Hasil Perikanan, atau bidang terkait.
* Memiliki pengalaman minimal 2 tahun sebagai Analis Laboratorium, khususnya di sektor tambak, akuakultur, atau industri perikanan.
* Memiliki pengetahuan yang baik mengenai metode pengukuran dan parameter kualitas air seperti pH, DO, TOM, alkalinitas, plankton, dan lainnya.
* Mampu mengoperasikan peralatan laboratorium, seperti spektrofotometer, DO meter, refraktometer, dan alat pendukung lainnya.




* Memiliki pemahaman tentang biologi udang, jenis plankton, manajemen budidaya udang, serta metode kultur plankton dan mikroorganisme lainnya.


Job Responsibilities


Other Information


Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Site \\- Nusa Tenggara Barat

30 January 2026

3

title: Food Mass Market Senior Business Analyst
description:
**About the Role**  

As our **Food Mass Market Senior Business Analyst**, you’ll drive strategic and analytical initiatives to grow GoFood’s Mass Market segment. You’ll combine business understanding, user behavior insights, and experimentation to identify opportunities, run targeted campaigns, and scale solutions that strengthen user engagement and increase overall product performance.
### **What Will You Do**

* + Discover growth opportunities in business metrics and customer metrics by exploring business data, transaction data, customer activity within apps and actual customer insights
	+ Drive actionable insights recommendations such as making funnel conversion analysis, cohort analysis, long\\-term trends, user segmentation, etc.
	+ Identify the business need and generate hypothesis based on business need to design \\& run experiments
	+ Build predictive models or clustering models to improve consumer targeting intervention effectiveness
	+ Ability to integrate qualitative data (user interviews, surveys, and behavioral research) alongside quantitative analysis to enhance EDA, refine hypothesis testing, and identify friction points to improve customer experience and business strategies
	+ Create and manage dashboards and data pipelines to monitor metrics to measure business performance
	+ Working closely with the business team and other data teams (Data Engineer, Data Science) to implement data solutions.

### **What Will You Need**

* + Minimum of 5 years of working experience in pricing, revenue management, or analytics. Preferrable from consulting or tech company
	+ Has end to end the problem\\-solving mindset that can work well with stakeholders
	+ Comfortable analyzing large amounts of raw data and able to communicate the insights to a wider audience
	+ Having capability in SQL
	+ A proactive team\\-player who can work under pressure and tight deadlines
	+ Strong project management skills to manage complex projects and to prioritize and effectively collaborate with multiple internal and external stakeholders
	+ Open to acquiring new skills and taking on diverse projects

**About the Team**  

Meet the team behind GoFood’s rapid growth — supporting hundreds of millions of transactions each month across Indonesia. We help strengthen the business by identifying the right recommendations and promotions tailored to user needs. Whether it’s suggesting the perfect late\\-night snack or surfacing nearby deals, we focus on delivering product value through data\\-driven insights and targeted marketing solutions.  

The GoFood Growth pod is a diverse group of 50\\+ problem solvers across analytics, product, marketing, and operations. You’ll collaborate with teams across Gojek and be part of a community that loves learning, experimenting, and (of course) discovering new food spots together. We’re also doubling down on automation and machine learning to scale our impact even further. **About GoTo Group**
GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on\\-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household. **About Gojek**
Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on\\-demand platform and pioneer of the multi\\-service ecosystem with over 2\\.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market. **About GoTo Financial**
GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last. *GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.* *\\#LI\\-ONSITE*
We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

description:
\\*Perusahaan: DISTRIBUTOR AICE GROUP

\\*Lokasi: SOLO \\- SALATIGA

\\*Jenis Pekerjaan:\\* Full\\-time

\\*Tentang Kami:\\*

Kami adalah perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang makanan yang berkomitmen untuk memberikan nilai tambah bagi pelanggan dan masyarakat melalui analisis data yang akurat dan tepat. Kami mencari seorang Data Analyst yang berpengalaman dan memiliki kemampuan analisis data yang baik untuk bergabung dengan tim kami.

\\*Tentang Posisi:\\*

Sebagai Data Analyst, Anda akan bertanggung jawab untuk mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan menginterpretasikan data untuk membantu perusahaan dalam pengambilan keputusan bisnis. Anda akan bekerja sama dengan tim manajemen dan departemen lainnya untuk mengidentifikasi tren, peluang, dan risiko yang terkait dengan data.

\\*Tanggung Jawab:\\*

\\- Mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data dari berbagai sumber

\\- Mengembangkan dan memelihara database dan sistem pelaporan

\\- Membuat laporan dan visualisasi data yang akurat dan tepat waktu

\\- Mengidentifikasi tren dan pola data untuk membantu pengambilan keputusan bisnis

\\- Berkolaborasi dengan tim manajemen dan departemen lainnya untuk memahami kebutuhan data dan mengembangkan solusi

\\- Mengembangkan dan memelihara dokumentasi data dan proses analisis

\\*Kualifikasi:\\*

\\- Sarjana (S1\\) di bidang Statistik, Matematika, Ilmu Komputer, atau bidang terkait lainnya

\\- Pengalaman minimal 2 tahun dalam analisis data

\\- Kemampuan analisis data yang baik dan kemampuan untuk mengidentifikasi tren dan pola

\\- Kemampuan menggunakan perangkat lunak analisis data seperti Excel, SQL, Python, R, atau lainnya

\\- Kemampuan visualisasi data yang baik dan kemampuan untuk membuat laporan yang jelas dan efektif

\\- Kemampuan bekerja dalam tim dan mandiri

\\- Kemampuan komunikasi yang baik dan kemampuan untuk mempresentasikan hasil analisis kepada stakeholders

\\*Keuntungan:\\*

\\- Gaji yang kompetitif

\\- Kesempatan untuk berkembang dalam karir

\\- Pelatihan dan pengembangan keterampilan

\\- Lingkungan kerja yang dinamis dan profesional

\\- Kesempatan untuk bekerja dengan tim yang berpengalaman dan berdedikasi

\\*Cara Melamar:\\*

Jika Anda tertarik dengan lowongan ini, silakan kirimkan lamaran Anda yang terdiri dari:

\\- CV

\\- Surat lamaran

\\- Portofolio yang menampilkan contoh analisis data dan visualisasi data

\\- Dokumen lainnya yang relevan

Kirimkan lamaran Anda ke **ceo.office1124@gmail.com** dengan subjek Management Trainee CEO.

Atau hubungi : \\+62 815\\-6527\\-122

title: Data Analyst Intern
description:
Data Analyst Intern


**Category:** Education
**Location:**Jakarta, DKI Jakarta, ID  

**Data Analyst Intern**  

**Finance \\& Operations**  

**Jakarta, Indonesia**  

Are you passionate about data analysis and visualization? Are you looking for an opportunity to develop valuable skills in a global healthcare company? We are seeking a Data Analyst Intern to join our team in our Finance \\& Operations (F\\&O) department. If you are eager to work on data architecture and visualization projects, collaborate with stakeholders, and drive business insights, then this internship is for you. **Your new role**  

The internship opportunity will give you the opportunity to develop skills sets that will be beneficial to your future career growth such as a data architecture and visualization projects, collaborate with stakeholders on requirement gathering, and prepare frameworks to drive business insights. As a Data Analyst Intern you will:
* Design and implement data architecture and modelling solutions to prepare clean, analysis\\-ready datasets that support visualizations and reporting.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional stakeholders to gather requirements, translate business needs into analytical specifications, and create visual dashboards.
* Develop frameworks and perform exploratory analyses using visualization tools.
* Internship duration: 5 January 2026 – 31 July 2026\\.
* Working hours Monday to Friday, 9am – 5pm (inclusive of lunch hour).
* Location: Jakarta, Indonesia.
* Internship allowance will be given.

  

  

**Your new department**  

You will be joining the Finance \\& Operations team at Novo Nordisk, which play a pivotal role in driving strategic business decisions and supporting organisational growth through data\\-driven insights. As an intern, you will collaborate with experienced professionals across both functions, gaining hands\\-on exposure to analytics projects that impact finance \\& operations within the pharmaceutical industry. The department is based in Jakarta, Indonesia, offering a dynamic and collaborative atmosphere where you can make a real impact.  


**Your skills \\& qualifications**  

To succeed in the role, we seek candidates who fulfil the following criteria:
* Recent graduate in bachelor’s or master’s degree program in Computer Science, Data Science, or related discipline.
* Proficiency in data modelling and visualization tools, with a strong emphasis on Power BI (Python is a plus).
* Excellent analytical and problem\\-solving abilities.
* Capable of working independently and meeting deadlines in a fast\\-paced environment.
* Proficient communication skills in English.

  


**Working at Novo Nordisk**  

Every day we seek the solutions that defeat serious chronic diseases. To do this, we approach our work with an unconventional spirit, a rare determination and a constant curiosity. For over 100 years this unordinary mindset has seen us build a company unlike any other. One where a collective passion for our purpose, mutual respect and a willingness to go beyond what we know delivers extraordinary results.  

  

**Deadline**  

24 November 2025\\. Applications are reviewed on an ongoing basis, and the position may be closed before the deadline.  



Novo Nordisk is currently in the process of adjusting job titles globally. Please note that the job title listed in this advertisement may be subject to change. More detailed information will be provided during the recruitment process.  

We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.  



Novo Nordisk is not your typical healthcare company. In a modern world of quick fixes, we focus on solutions to defeat serious chronic diseases and promote long\\-term health. Our unordinary mindset is at the heart of everything we do. We seek out new ideas and put people first as we push the boundaries of science, make healthcare more accessible, and treat, prevent, and even cure diseases that affect millions of lives. Because it takes an unordinary approach to drive real, lasting change in health.

title: Financial Business Analyst
description:
### **Company Overview**


Voted \\#1 EHR by PC Mag, WRS Health delivers a fully integrated cloud based EMR and practice management solutions to its clients. We bring solutions to physicians by providing constant enhancement of our products and services including EHR, practice management, marketing, patient coordination and billing.

### **Job summary**


We are seeking a highly skilled Financial Business Analyst with at least 5 years of experience in evaluating and analyzing financial performance and business operations. This role is critical in driving financial insights while also identifying gaps, inefficiencies, and areas of improvement across our business and operational processes.


The ideal candidate is detail\\-oriented, tech\\-savvy, and has strong financial modeling and analytical skills, with a background in Software\\-as\\-a\\-Service (SaaS) and/or health\\-tech industries. The Financial Business Analyst will partner with leadership and cross\\-functional teams to deliver financial analysis, develop strategies, and recommend data\\-driven solutions that support operational efficiency and sustainable growth.

### **Key Responsibilities**

* Conduct in\\-depth financial analysis, including modeling, budgeting, forecasting, variance analysis, and ROI assessments.
* Evaluate and analyze business and financial operations to identify risks, gaps, and opportunities for efficiency and growth.
* Develop, monitor, and interpret financial and operational performance metrics, KPIs, and dashboards.
* Partner with leadership to design and implement process improvements that drive financial and operational scalability.
* Support strategic decision\\-making by assessing the financial impact of business initiatives across Product, Sales, and Operations.
* Research industry trends, benchmarks, and best practices in SaaS and health\\-tech to inform financial and business recommendations.
* Prepare clear, concise financial reports and presentations that communicate actionable insights to stakeholders.
* Ensure compliance with financial standards, policies, and internal controls.

### **Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business Administration, Economics, or a related field (MBA or advanced degree preferred).
* Minimum of 5 years of experience as a Financial Analyst, Business Analyst, or in a hybrid role combining both.
* Proven ability to perform financial modeling, budgeting, forecasting, and reporting at a high level.
* Experience analyzing and improving business processes, with a strong understanding of operational inefficiencies.
* Background in SaaS or health\\-tech industries preferred.
* Proficiency with BI and data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, Looker).
* Advanced skills in Excel, with experience in accounting/finance platforms such as QuickBooks, Xero, and SQL\\-based analysis.
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to present complex financial information to non\\-financial stakeholders.
* Critical thinker and problem\\-solver who thrives in a fast\\-paced, evolving environment.

  

Job type: Full Time \\- Remote


Hours: Available during standard US business hours (9am\\-5pm EST or 8:30am\\-4:30pm EST)


This job description is intended to describe the general requirements for the position. It is not a complete statement of duties, responsibilities or requirements. Other duties not listed here may be assigned as necessary to ensure proper operations of the department.

  

WRS Health is an equal opportunity employer.

title: Lab Analyst
description:
Be a part of a revolutionary change

  

At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business and building our future on one clear purpose – to deliver a smoke\\-free future.

  

With huge change, comes huge opportunity. So, wherever you join us, you’ll enjoy the freedom to dream up and deliver better, brighter solutions and the space to move your career forward in endlessly different directions.

  

Wherever you join our crucial 47,000\\-strong Operations team, you’ll have the opportunity to make an impact. PMI’s shift from selling cigarettes to our new smoke\\-free products has changed the way we work. New products bring new challenges – in the way we source and buy raw materials, in the way we engineer and manufacture, and in our supply chain planning.

  

Bring us your curiosity and a desire to challenge the everyday and we’ll give you lots of responsibility. You’ll help us improve, inject innovation and create new ways of working. You’ll be solving supply chain problems that span the whole world: a smoke\\-free world.

  

Your ‘day to day’  

* Apply well\\-defined methods and work instructions to perform routine analyses and technical activities to ensure that all raw materials, semi\\-finished and finished products are appropriately analyzed and monitored.
* Ensure that instruments are calibrated for accuracy, precision and reliability of the analysis. Carry out calibration and/or calibration verification and collaborative test on instruments and materials (Raw Materials, Finished Goods and semi\\-finished) to monitor the instruments and materials performances.
* Ensure the identification and management of identified nonconformities and related corrective \\& preventive actions. Update and create procedures and work instructions in order to define, improve and/or to standardize Quality related activities.
  

Who we’re looking for

* Minimum Bachelor Degree in Chemistry (or equivalent discipline; Pharmacy, Chemical Engineering, etc) or relevant skills through demonstrated experience
* At least 1 year of experience in the lab field (experience in QA or/and industrial field is a plus). Fresh Graduate are welcome to apply
* Knowledge of International standards (ISO). Advanced knowledge on Quality tools, root cause analysis, analytical skills, statistical tool knowledge. Ability to transform data into information (reporting skills)
* Good in english both writen \\& communication


What we offer

  

Our success depends on our talented employees who come to work here every single day with a sense of purpose and an appetite for progress. Join PMI and you too can:

* Seize the freedom to define your future and ours. We’ll empower you to take risks, experiment and explore.
* Be part of an inclusive, diverse culture, where everyone’s contribution is respected; collaborate with some of the world’s best people and feel like you belong.
* Pursue your ambitions and develop your skills with a global business – our staggering size and scale provides endless opportunities to progress.
* Take pride in delivering our promise to society: to deliver a smoke\\-free future.

  

To join our growing team…

**Are you ready to unleash your potential?**

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!  


**Work you’ll do:**  


* You will develop middle logic layer and backend handoff to partnering systems.
* You will involve in database design and development.
* You will perform primary and secondary research, conduct analyses and appropriate modelling tasks that feeds directly into the development of technology\\-enabled solutions for tackling our clients’ complex business problems.

* You will uphold the firm’s standards and ethos in working with fellow team members and in your interactions with the clients.

**Your role as a leader:**

title: Analyst Credit & Risk Management - Fixed Term Contract (1 Year)
description:
**Be a part of a revolutionary change**

  

At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business and building our future on one clear purpose – to deliver a smoke\\-free future.

  

With huge change, comes huge opportunity. So, wherever you join us, you’ll enjoy the freedom to dream up and deliver better, brighter solutions and the space to move your career forward in endlessly different directions.

  

Our new vision means we’re reinventing our financial modelling, planning and forecasting tools. Join us in **Finance** and you’ll work across the full breadth of the business, making sure our new commercial model is profitable and sustainable. There’s something new to learn every single day: changes to integrate and challenges to conquer. If you love working collaboratively and taking risks, you’ll be in your element here.

  

Our work spans the globe and includes audit, treasury, internal control and commercial financial support. Whether your skills are in financial control, planning and forecasting, data analytics or digital risk, there’s space to move your career forward in any number of directions.

 **Your ‘day to day’**

  

* Connect with customers to resolve issues related to overdue invoices and credit limits
* Performs the daily of O2C Credit \\& Risk management services such as analysis and review on credit scoring requirement \\& credit limits, risks segmentation, monitor credit exposure (issue reporting), manage credit blocked, initiate override requests, prepare credit reports. Acts on issue identified in the process by providing a work around to resolve
* Control: Ensure compliance with the governing company controls, policies and procedures. Prepare the documentation as requested by Corporate and Independent Auditors or Tax related concerns

 **Who we’re looking for**

* College/University \\- Minimum S1 from Finance/Accounting Background
* Fresh graduate are open to apply or Min 1\\. year of experience in Finance/Accounting field
* Good in english both in writen and verbal
* Excel is a must

 **What we offer**

Our success depends on our talented employees who come to work here every single day with a sense of purpose and an appetite for progress. Join PMI and you too can:

  

* Seize the freedom to define your future and ours. We’ll empower you to take risks, experiment and explore.
* Be part of an inclusive, diverse culture, where everyone’s contribution is respected; collaborate with some of the world’s best people and feel like you belong.
* Pursue your ambitions and develop your skills with a global business – our staggering size and scale provides endless opportunities to progress.
* Take pride in delivering our promise to society: to deliver a smoke\\-free future.

  

To join our growing team…

title: Legal Analyst (Global)
description:
* **Job Description: Legal Analyst (Global)**
* **Position Title: Legal Analyst (Global)**
* **Department: Legal / Compliance / Corporate Affairs**
* **Reports To: Global Legal Manager / Senior Counsel**
* **Location: Remote – Global Operations**
* **Employment Type: Full\\-Time**

**Position Summary**

The Legal Analyst (Global) supports the company’s worldwide legal operations by conducting legal research, analyzing international regulatory requirements, managing cross\\-border contracts, and assisting with corporate governance processes. This role ensures the company’s activities align with global laws, compliance standards, and internal policies. The ideal candidate is detail\\-oriented, highly analytical, and comfortable working across multiple jurisdictions and time zones.

**Key Responsibilities**

**1\\. Research \\& Regulatory Analysis**

* Conduct research on international laws, regulations, and policies impacting the company’s global operations (e.g., corporate, privacy, employment, trade, anti\\-corruption).
* Monitor upcoming legislative changes across key markets and prepare briefing notes.
* Analyze risks associated with new markets, global expansion, or regulatory developments.

**2\\. Contract \\& Transaction Support**

* Review, summarize, and track commercial agreements including NDAs, MSAs, licensing agreements, vendor agreements, and cross\\-border contracts.
* Assist in contract drafting and redlining under the supervision of counsel.
* Maintain and update contract management systems and global templates.

**3\\. Compliance \\& Risk Management**

* Support global compliance programs (anti\\-bribery, sanctions, GDPR/privacy, ESG, trade compliance).
* Monitor compliance data, identify gaps, and propose process improvements.
* Assist with due diligence on partners, vendors, distributors, and M\\&A transactions.

**4\\. Corporate Governance**

* Support global subsidiary management activities (entity formation, board resolutions, annual filings).
* Assist with maintaining legal records, policies, global compliance frameworks, and internal documentation.

**5\\. Cross\\-Functional Collaboration**

* Work closely with internal teams (HR, Finance, Procurement, Security, Commercial, Operations) on legal and regulatory matters.
* Help coordinate with external counsel across multiple countries.

**6\\. Reporting \\& Documentation**

* Prepare legal memos, risk assessments, executive reports, and status summaries.
* Maintain internal dashboards and trackers for legal and compliance matters.

**Qualifications**

**Required**

* Bachelor’s degree in Law, Legal Studies, International Relations, Political Science, or related field.
* 2–5 years’ experience as a legal analyst, paralegal, legal assistant, compliance analyst, or similar role.
* Strong understanding of corporate law, contracts, and international legal frameworks.
* Excellent research, analytical, and writing skills.
* Experience working with contract management or compliance tools.
* Ability to work across time zones and manage multiple priorities.

**Preferred**

* Master’s degree or legal certification (JD, LLB, LLM, Paralegal Certificate).
* Experience in a multinational corporation or cross\\-border legal environment.
* Familiarity with GDPR, FCPA, trade compliance, or other global regulatory regimes.
* Multilingual abilities.

**Key Competencies**

* Strong attention to detail
* Analytical and problem\\-solving skills
* Cross\\-cultural communication
* Confidentiality and professional integrity
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively
* Project management and organizational skills

**Why Join Us**

* Opportunity to work on high\\-impact global projects
* Exposure to international legal issues and cross\\-border operations
* Growth opportunities in corporate legal, compliance, and global risk functions

**Location: Full Remote**

Kindly send us the five letter results. (e.g. ENTJ\\-T) to queenie@boo.world together with links to your resume and sample works. Subject: Position you are applying for (e.g **Legal Analyst (Global)**)

title: Ad Hoc Cybersecurity Analyst
description:
We are looking for a project\\-based Cybersecurity Analyst to work on a focused security initiative involving Microsoft Outlook and NTLM credential exposure. You will design, build, and document a small lab environment, simulate a real vulnerability scenario, and develop practical detection and mitigation strategies that can be applied in an enterprise setting.

This role suits someone who enjoys technical, hands\\-on work and can turn a problem statement into a clear testing plan, execution, and final report.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Investigate how Outlook can be abused to trigger outbound connections and leak NTLM hashes
* Build a lab environment with Outlook clients, an attacker\\-controlled SMB or WebDAV endpoint, and basic monitoring
* Reproduce the exploit in a controlled environment, including using malicious reminder sound paths and UNC references
* Clearly document the lab setup, configuration steps, and test scenarios
* Design and test detection methods for suspicious outbound SMB and WebDAV traffic originating from Outlook
* Correlate Windows event logs, network logs, and any available SIEM data to identify exploitation attempts
* Develop ways to inspect message properties or mailbox data to flag suspicious reminder sound parameters
* Review and adapt existing detection scripts or rules and integrate them into a monitoring workflow
* Propose and test firewall rules and network controls that reduce or block outbound SMB and WebDAV to untrusted networks
* Evaluate the impact of disabling or restricting specific Windows services that support these outbound connections
* Recommend hardening steps for high\\-value and privileged accounts, including reducing or eliminating NTLM use where appropriate
* Design and prototype scripts or procedures to scan mailboxes, flag risky messages, and support remediation
* Produce clear technical documentation of the lab, attack path, detection rules, and mitigation steps
* Write concise incident\\-style summaries that explain risk, attack flow, and recommended actions
* Present findings in language that can be understood by both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders
* Deliver a final project report covering detection coverage, residual risk, and suggested next steps

**Requirements**

* Solid understanding of:
* Windows environments and Outlook behavior
* Basic networking (TCP/IP, ports, SMB, UNC paths)
* NTLM authentication and why NTLM hash exposure is dangerous
* Experience with:
* Windows event logs and basic log analysis
* At least one of the following: SIEM tools, packet capture tools, or network monitoring
* Comfortable:
* Building and working in a small lab environment
* Reproducing exploits in a controlled and safe way
* Keeping accurate notes and documenting changes and observations
* Strong written communication skills for technical documentation and reporting

**Nice To Have**

* Hands\\-on experience with Microsoft Exchange, Outlook configuration, or mailbox forensics
* Scripting skills in PowerShell or Python for log parsing, mailbox scanning, or small automation tasks
* Familiarity with Active Directory hardening features and NTLM\\-related controls
* Background in email security, credential theft techniques, or phishing\\-style attack simulations

Job Types: Internship, Contract  
Contract length: 3 months

Language:

* English (Required)

title: Executive & Business Support Analyst
description:

This role combines data\\-driven business analysis, market and competitive research, and executive\\-level coordination to enhance strategic decision\\-making and operational effectiveness.
  

  

**Executive \\& Strategic Support**

**Reporting \\& Data Management**

**Administrative \\& Operational Support**

* Handle legal documentation, vendor registration, and client paperwork required for BD operations.

We organise data science workshop for individuals and corporate, we adopt a learn\\-by\\-building approach suited to beginners and non\\-programmers. What is it like working at Algoritma? Stay Proactive \\& Positive: We entrust people with huge responsibilities and allow for a high degree of autonomy and creative freedom. \\- Our employees take initiative \\- Our managers believe in empowerment \\- Our project directors take ownership of their results. 2\\. Trust \\& Loyalty: We may not be able to control everything, but we can influence certain things. \\- Our employees are trustworthy and loyal \\- Our manager do not take unethical shortcuts and think of long term impact of their decisions 3\\. Accountability. Accountability is about follow through and getting done what you said you’d get done. It’s recognizing that other team members are dependent on the results of your work. It’s about open, proactive communication to keep team members informed of the status of your commitments because it has a direct impact on their ability to achieve their own commitments. \\- Our employees take the responsibility to complete the tasks assigned. \\- Our employees perform the duties required by the job further the goals of the organization. \\- Our employees recognize that procrastinating feedback only makes things worse, thus makes accountability it a habit 4\\. Relentless \\& focused: We demonstrate outstanding focus and work ethics, productivity, and a sense of urgency in our work. \\- Our employees are reliable in their commitment \\- Our managers set challenging but attainable goals 5\\. Kindness: We treat others how we would want to be treated. We respect other people’s opinion despite disagreement. We do not shame others for voicing their concern or opinion, we embrace openness and kindness. We believe that people who are compassionate are easier to work with and are more successful as they receive more opportunities. You can’t fake a culture of kindness. \\- Our employees get things done without stepping on others. \\- Our employees don't use fear tactics or shaming.
