title: Data & AI Presales Consultant (Indonesia)
description:
**Why SoftwareOne?**  

SoftwareOne and Crayon have come together to form a global, AI\\-powered software and cloud solutions provider with a bold vision for the future. With a footprint in over 70 countries and a diverse team of 13,000\\+ professionals, we offer unparalleled opportunities for talent to grow, make an impact, and shape the future of technology. At the heart of our business is our people. We empower our teams to work across borders, innovate fearlessly, and continuously develop their skills through world\\-class learning and development programs. Whether you're passionate about cloud, software, data, AI, or building meaningful client relationships, you’ll find a place to thrive here. Join us and be part of a purpose\\-driven culture where your ideas matter, your growth is supported, and your career can go global.  

  

**The role**  

Are you ready to architect transformative data and AI solutions?  

Do you thrive on turning complex information into business advantage?  

Would you like to work with cutting\\-edge cloud technologies to unlock insights for our organisation?  

You’ll join our **Data \\& Analytics team**, partnering with business stakeholders across the organisation to drive innovation in how we collect, model and act on information.  

As the Solution Architect for Data \\& AI, you play a pivotal part in shaping how our business harnesses its data. You design and build the blueprint for our analytics and generative\\-AI capabilities on the AWS platform so that teams can make better decisions, solve complex problems and deliver value. **What You’ll Do:*** Design end\\-to\\-end analytics and AI solutions: Work with stakeholders to gather needs, sketch the architecture and document the big picture.
* Architect on AWS: Apply your expertise with services such as Redshift, EMR, Kinesis, Glue, QuickSight and the suite of AI/ML and generative\\-AI tools to build robust, scalable platforms.
* Model and integrate data: Define clean data models and ETL patterns, bring data in from diverse sources, optimise for performance and maintain integrity.
* Ensure scale, security and performance: Build solutions that grow with us, run efficiently, protect sensitive information and meet compliance standards.
* Troubleshoot and optimise: Spot bottlenecks or quality issues, propose creative fixes and tune the environment as it runs.
* Collaborate and innovate: Partner with engineers, scientists and analysts; contribute ideas, stay up\\-to\\-date with emerging tech and help raise the bar on what our data estate can do.


  

**What we need to see from you**  

* A proven track record designing and delivering data\\-centric solutions in the cloud – you speak the language of data modelling, warehousing, ETL and governance and you’ve seen ideas through from concept into production.
* Deep familiarity with the AWS analytics and AI family (Redshift, EMR, Kinesis, Glue, QuickSight and related AI/ML/generative\\-AI offerings) and an enthusiasm for exploring new services.
* Comfort writing code and queries – you work fluently in Python and SQL (or similar languages) to manipulate, transform and interrogate data.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, communication and collaboration skills – you can translate business questions into technical designs and work effectively with both technical and non\\-technical colleagues.
* Experience working in an Agile environment, version controlling your work and adapting as priorities evolve.
* Relevant qualifications: a degree in an IT\\-related discipline or equivalent, plus current AWS certifications (Solution Architect, Data Analytics Specialty or the equivalent).


  

**Job Function**  

  

Sales
  

**Accommodations**  

SoftwareOne welcomes applicants from all backgrounds and abilities to apply. If you require reasonable adjustments at any point during the recruitment process, email us at reasonable.accommodations@softwareone.com.  

Please include the role for which you are applying and your country location. Someone from our organization that is not part of the decision\\-making process will be in touch to discuss your specific needs and we will make every effort to accommodate you. Any information shared will be stored securely and treated in the strictest of confidence in line with GDPR.  

At SoftwareOne, we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. Additionally, we encourage experienced individuals that have taken an intentional career break and are now prepared to return to work to explore our SOAR program.

title: Financial Technology Senior Consultant (FSO)
description:
**Why should I work for Ernst \\& Young's Financial Services (FSO)?**

  

We are the only professional services organisation who has a separate business dedicated exclusively to the financial services marketplace. Join Financial Services (FSO) and you will work with multi\\-disciplinary teams from around the world to deliver a global perspective. Aligned to key industry groups including asset management, banking and capital markets, insurance and private equity, we provide integrated advisory, assurance, tax, and transaction services.

  

Through diverse experiences, world\\-class learning and individually tailored coaching you will experience ongoing professional development. That’s how we develop outstanding leaders who team to deliver on our promises to all of our stakeholders, and in so doing, play a critical role in building a better working world for our people, for our clients and for our communities. Sound interesting? Well this is just the beginning. Because whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime.

 **The opportunity**


In a world where disruption is commonplace and technology changes business at an amazing rate, we help solve complex industry challenges while helping our clients manage risk and improve their performance. As a future FSO Technology Consultant, you will help our clients in the following domains:

* **Business \\& strategic challenges**: business \\& solution architecture, business process design for the digitization of core banking or insurance processes, digital transformation in an agile context, project / program management, business and IT alignment of digital driven business initiatives, front\\-to\\-back renewal, and design \\& improvement of digital operating models.
* **Technical matters**: data science, advanced analytics embedded in core business processes, IoT, data strategy, data governance, data quality, data architecture, data management, data usage, blockchain, artificial intelligence and RPA.


As part of the team, you will work on specific projects critical to financial services current landscape, with opportunities to switch teams, as you and our fast\\-paced business grow and evolve. You will play an important part in taking EY to the next level.

 **Positions we are looking for**

* Cybersecurity
* Digital
* Platform
* Data \\& Analytics

 **To qualify for the role you must have**

* A Bachelor or Master's Degree in (Business) Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems Management, Mathematics, (applied) Economics or a related field of studies with an affinity for leading\\-edge technologies.
* Previous experience of at least 3\\-5 years in roles of Functional Consultant or Analyst Programmer preferably in companies in the financial services industry (payments, banks, insurance, capital markets).
* Solid analytical skills.
* Knowledge of project management with agile, traditional and hybrid methodologies.
* Advanced level of English.
* Experience in team leadership.
* Excellent oral and written communication skills.

 **If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please apply as soon as possible.**

**The exceptional EY experience. It's yours to build.**

title: Fraud Data Analyst
description:
**Fraud Data Analyst**
======================


Bali, BALI
Work Type: Full Time
  
**Position:** Fraud \\& Data Analyst  

**Location:** Bali, Indonesia (On\\-site)  

**Employment Type:** Full\\-time **About TyrAds**
TyrAds is a global marketing and advertising agency specializing in mobile user acquisition and performance marketing for top\\-tier gaming and app developers worldwide. We combine data\\-driven strategy, creative storytelling, and cutting\\-edge technology to deliver measurable results for our partners.
We’re now looking for a **Fraud \\& Data Analyst** to join our Bali office and play a key role in protecting our ecosystem from fraud, optimizing campaign performance, and driving strategic insights through data. **What You’ll Do:*** Monitor and analyze customer game progression, rewards, and overall activity to detect illicit, fraudulent, or suspicious behaviors on our platform.
* Collaborate with the Data Team to understand and analyze repayment behaviors, delinquency patterns, and loss drivers.
* Partner with the Tech Team to develop and enhance risk and fraud prevention tools and products.
* Generate ad\\-hoc reports and deep\\-dive analyses to support business and risk\\-related decisions.
* Design, develop, and maintain self\\-service dashboards, reports, and analytical infrastructure to enable scalable, real\\-time monitoring of risk and fraud patterns.
* Work closely with data engineers to define data requirements, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and availability of key data assets.
* Automate recurring reports and workflows to improve efficiency and reduce manual processes.
* Contribute to the development of new risk metrics, segmentation strategies, and performance tracking methodologies.
* Ensure all analytics and reporting comply with internal data governance and regulatory standards.

 **Requirements*** Minimum **3 years of experience** in **Fraud Analytics**, **Risk Analytics**, or **Data Analytics**.
* Strong proficiency in **SQL** and **Python** for data extraction, transformation, and analysis.
* Hands\\-on experience with **BI tools** such as **Tableau**, **Qlik**, or **Power BI**.
* Proven ability to translate complex data insights into clear, actionable recommendations for stakeholders across all levels.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills; comfortable engaging with senior leadership and cross\\-functional teams.
* Basic understanding of **data warehousing**, **ETL processes**, and working with large datasets.
* Experience in **dashboard development**, **report automation**, and **data quality improvement initiatives**.
* Experience in the **Gaming**, **AdTech**, or **Digital Marketing** industry is a strong plus.

 **Why Join TyrAds?*** Work in an international, fast\\-growing performance marketing company.
* Collaborative and innovative environment with global exposure.
* Opportunity to work closely with talented teams across Tech, Data, and Creative functions.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.

title: Finance & Accounting Analyst
description:
Esrocte sedang mencari Finance \\& Accounting Analyst yang tidak hanya teliti dalam angka, tetapi juga mampu berpikir strategis dan memimpin tim di departemen keuangan. Posisi ini akan menjadi peran kunci dalam melakukan analisis dan memastikan keakuratan laporan keuangan sekaligus memberikan insight untuk pengambilan keputusan bisnis

**Tanggung jawab**

* Menyusun dan menganalisis laporan keuangan bulanan serta tahunan (Laba Rugi, Neraca, Arus Kas) untuk memberikan insight strategis bagi manajemen.
* Melakukan analisis tren keuangan, variance analysis, dan menyajikan rekomendasi berbasis data untuk peningkatan kinerja keuangan perusahaan.
* Menyusun dan memonitor budget tahunan serta forecast keuangan, memastikan akurasi dan keselarasan dengan target bisnis.
* Melakukan rekonsiliasi keuangan, memastikan kesesuaian antara catatan akuntansi, data fisik, dan laporan pajak.
* Memimpin dan mengembangkan tim keuangan, memastikan proses operasional Finance, Accounting, dan Tax berjalan efektif dan sesuai regulasi.
* Berkoordinasi lintas departemen untuk memastikan setiap keputusan operasional didukung analisis finansial yang kuat.
* Mengidentifikasi peluang efisiensi biaya, optimalisasi modal kerja, serta mengusulkan perbaikan proses untuk meningkatkan produktivitas dan profitabilitas.

**Kualifikasi**

* Minimal pendidikan S1 Akuntansi.
* Pengalaman kerja minimal 3–5 tahun di bidang analisis keuangan, termasuk 1–3 tahun pengalaman operasional di Finance, Accounting, dan Tax.
* Berpengalaman dalam budgeting, forecasting, financial modeling, serta menyajikan analisis kepada manajemen.
* Mahir menggunakan Google Workspace dan familiar dengan software akuntansi/ERP (Odoo, SAP, atau sejenisnya).
* Berpikir analitis dan kritis, dengan kemampuan problem\\-solving yang kuat serta ketelitian tinggi.
* Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi dan kolaborasi yang baik, mampu menjembatani antara tim operasional dan manajemen.
* Pengalaman di industri manufaktur atau garmen menjadi nilai tambah.

* How many years of experience do you have in finance, accounting, and tax operations?
* Do you have experience in the manufacturing or garment industry

title: Analyst, Accounting
description:
### **Analyst, Accounting**

#### **(Third Party Contractor)**

### **Jakarta, Indonesia**

 **Role Purpose:**


Support accurate and timely financial reporting and operational accounting for deepwater projects. Ensure compliance with company policies, regulatory requirements, and industry standards while providing critical analysis to support business decisions and project performance.

**Responsibilities include but are not limited to the following:**

* Perform daily accounting operations including general ledger posting, account reconciliations, and transactional review.
* Manage and process accounts payable, ensuring accuracy, timeliness, and compliance with company procedures.
* Support project accounting for ongoing deepwater operations, ensuring correct cost allocation, accruals, and reporting.
* Prepare and review journal entries, account reconciliations, and variance analyses to ensure data integrity.
* Support monthly, quarterly, and annual closing processes, including preparation of financial statements and management reports.
* Provide financial insights and analysis to support operational and management decision\\-making.
* Liaise with internal stakeholders, including Supply Chain, Tax, and Treasury, to ensure smooth end\\-to\\-end accounting operations.
* Assist in tax\\-related matters (VAT, withholding tax, corporate tax) to ensure compliance with local regulations.
* Maintain proper documentation and ensure all financial processes are in accordance with company accounting policies and internal controls.
* Support both internal and external audit processes by preparing required schedules and documentation.
* Identify opportunities to improve accounting processes, system efficiency, and internal controls.

**Qualifications include but are not limited to the following:**

**Education:**

* Minimum **Bachelors degree (S1\\)** in Economics, Accounting, or Business.
* Professional certification or coursework in accounting or taxation is an advantage.

**Experience****:**

* 2\\-5 years of experience in accounting, preferably within the oil \\& gas industry or project\\-based environment.
* Strong background in operational accounting, including accounts payable, banking transactions, and tax compliance.
* Experience with project accounting, cost tracking, and financial reporting for capital projects.
* Familiarity with ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle) and Microsoft Excel for financial analysis and reporting.
* Exposure to joint venture accounting or intercompany transactions is an advantage.

**Technical \\& Management Skills:**

* Proficient in accounting software and ERP systems.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills with attention to detail and accuracy.
* Good understanding of local accounting standards and relevant tax regulations.
* Ability to manage multiple priorities and meet deadlines in a fast\\-paced, project\\-driven environment.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; able to work collaboratively in a multi\\-discipline, multi\\-cultural team.
* Commitment to high standards of integrity, compliance, and HSE practices.

title: Analyst, Reporting
description:
### **Analyst, Reporting**

#### **(Third Party Contractor)**

### **Jakarta, Indonesia**

 **Role Purpose:**


Support the preparation, analysis, and delivery of accurate and timely management reports to facilitate informed decision\\-making. Ensure financial data integrity, consistency across reporting systems, and compliance with company standards and procedures for deepwater project operations.

**Responsibilities include but are not limited to the following:**

* Prepare regular management and financial performance reports, including variance analyses and key performance indicators (KPIs).
* Consolidate financial and operational data from multiple sources to support management review and business planning.
* Assist in budgeting and forecasting processes by providing accurate data, trend analysis, and financial insights.
* Perform monthly and quarterly closing activities, ensuring accuracy and consistency of reported figures.
* Support the preparation of internal management reports, business performance dashboards, and presentations for management review.
* Analyze actual vs. budget results, highlighting key variances and underlying drivers.
* Work closely with cross\\-functional teams (Accounting, Finance, Operations) to ensure data accuracy and alignment in reporting.

title: Operation Analyst (Operation Excellence)
description:
* Melakukan pemantauan secara menyeluruh terhadap aktivitas operasional gudang, mulai dari proses inbound (penerimaan barang) hingga outbound (pengeluaran barang).
* Bertindak sebagai control tower untuk memastikan setiap proses berjalan sesuai SLA, alur sistem (WMS), dan prinsip FIFO/FEFO.
* Mengidentifikasi potensi hambatan secara dini dan berkoordinasi dengan tim lapangan untuk memastikan kelancaran arus barang dan akurasi pengiriman.

* Melakukan verifikasi anatara data sistem dengan kondisi fisik di lapangan guna memastikan akurasi stok, kelengkapan dokumen penerimaan, dan kepatuhan terhadap standar prosedur.
* Memberikan eskalasi jika ditemukan ketidaksesuaian atau anomali dalam proses penerimaan barang.
* Melakukan pemantauan suhu secara rutin pada seluruh aset coldchain seperti cold room, chiller, hingga armada berpendingin.
* Menggunakan data dari sensor IoT maupun inspeksi manual untuk memastikan kestabilan suhu sesuai standar penyimpanan dan regulasi (GDP, HACCP, dll).
* Mengambil tindakaan korektif bila terjadi deviasi suhu yang dapat mengancam kulaitas untuk keamanan produk.

title: Growth Operations Senior Associate
description:
**About the Role**  

As Growth Operation Senior Associate, you will be an integral player in the overall GoFood strategy and operation. You'll take full ownership of GoFood promotions, starting from analysis, hypothesis creation, experimentation, evaluation and execution of operations. If you are passionate about shaping data into actionable intelligence and thrive in a collaborative environment, this role offers an exciting opportunity to shape growth for Gojek and Merchants that are partnered with us. You'll have a direct impact on ensuring the business maintains its market leadership in Indonesia.
### **What You Will Do**

* + Discover growth opportunities from the interaction of GoFood and its merchants through all of the metrics by running data analysis from Gojek’s vast data resources including business data, transaction data, customer activity within apps and actual customer insights
	+ Introduce beneficial business changes through well\\-written experimentation documents; validate the hypotheses through A/B test or other robust experimentation method
	+ Operate the product solution and define the program to achieve business objectives by combining multiple initiatives (e.g. promotion program, incentive product, discovery product, and ads )
	+ Optimize and automate solutions by leveraging Data Sciences and Product resources
	+ Proactively improve the operation process in the team and act on how to drive a faster, effective, and efficient execution process through third\\-party tool or in\\-house service

### **What You Will Need**

* + BS/MS in Engineering, Computer Science, Math, Economics, Statistics, or equivalent experience
	+ Minimum 3 years of working experience growth or analyst related roles
	+ Data analytics capability, have a good knowledge of SQL and experimentation process; High Proficiency in Python and R is a plus
	+ Strong business acumen with successful experience influencing and leading cross\\-functional teams
	+ End to end the problem\\-solving mindset that can work in increments and exponents
	+ Radical Candor leadership while also a strong team player, possessing team synergy skills with a high level of enthusiasm in collaborating in a cross\\-functional team and can also balance attention to detail with swift execution
	+ Experience in Growth, Product Management, and Data team is a plus

**About GoTo Group**
GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on\\-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household. **About Gojek**
Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on\\-demand platform and pioneer of the multi\\-service ecosystem with over 2\\.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market. **About GoTo Financial**
GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last. *GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.* *\\#LI\\-ONSITE*
We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

title: Data Analyst – Offline Brand & Merchant Growth (Marketing)
description:
We are looking for a Data Analyst to support Kredivo's offline expansion growth initiatives, including exhibitions, in\\-store activations, merchant branding, and OOH (Out\\-of\\-Home) projects. This role will focus on building, maintaining, and interpreting performance tracking dashboards, and ensuring every initiative's effectiveness is measurable, comparable, and scalable. The ideal candidate is a structured thinker who can bridge data analysis and business impact, comfortable working with large datasets, and cross\\-functional teams like Data Science, Business Development, Growth and Brand.


Key Responsibilities


1\\. Data Analysis \\& Measurement


* Analyze offline merchant performance, including store\\-level GMV uplift, AOV changes, activation impact, and regional trends.
* Create post\\-activation and campaign evaluation reports with actionable recommendations.
* Develop standardized frameworks to measure ROI, payback period, and merchant\\-level success indicators.
* Normalize data from multiple measurement systems.


2\\. Dashboard Development \\& Automation


* Build and maintain SQL\\-based dashboards to monitor offline and regional performance.
* Automate manual data collection and reporting processes for activations, branding, and merchant metrics.
* Ensure alignment of offline data pipelines with the central data infrastructure.


3\\. Branding Rationalization \\& Analytics


* Evaluate OOH investment efficiency and help prioritize placements using data\\-driven insights.


4\\. Cross\\-Functional Collaboration


* Collaborate with BD, Sales, Growth, and Data Science teams to align measurement frameworks and ensure data consistency.
* Provide fast\\-turn insights for pilot activations, new category exploration, and regional growth experiments.
* Support offline marketing planning by identifying underperforming regions or categories
* through data\\-driven diagnosis.


5\\. Insight Reporting \\& Storytelling


* Translate quantitative analyses into clear, compelling insights for business and management teams.
* Build structured presentations and visual summaries that highlight findings, anomalies, and strategic opportunities.
* Present insights regularly to Brand and Management teams to guide decision\\-making.


Qualifications :


* Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Business Analytics, or related fields.
* 2–4 years of experience in Data Analytics, ideally in marketing, retail, or OOH performance measurement.
* Proficiency in SQL, data visualization tools (Metabase, Power BI, Tableau, Google Data Studio).
* Strong Excel/Google Sheets capability for quick analysis and pivoting.
* Experience handling geolocation or spatial data (heat maps, radius analysis) is a plus.
* Familiarity with A/B testing, uplift modeling, and ROI frameworks.
* Comfortable working with multiple stakeholders and large datasets.
* High attention to detail, analytical rigor, and business acumen.

title: Analyst, Account Executive
description:
**Company Description**  

Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose – to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.


Make an impact with a purpose\\-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.

 **Job Description**  

* Assist in developing and executing strategies to help financial and non\\-financial clients increase their payment volumes, grow new payment areas, and expand their customer base through new card issuance or acceptance partnerships.
* Help nurture strong working relationships with key decision\\-makers and influencers at client and partner organizations to promote Visa’s products and services.
* Contribute to building business cases, forecasting revenue, and supporting deal structuring and execution. Help track financial performance and ensure alignment with internal budgeting processes.
* Keep account plans updated and ensure visibility of the sales pipeline to support business development and client engagement efforts.
* Partner with cross\\-functional teams to identify new business and product opportunities, support proposal development, and assist in preparing materials for client meetings and internal reviews.


This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in the office will be confirmed by your Hiring Manager.

 **Qualifications**  

What you will need:

* Minimum 5 years in the payments industry, ideally in sales or relationship management within Corporate or SME sectors. Prior experience as a credit card product management within a financial institution advantageous
* Strong financial \\& analytical skills with a keen eye for data extraction, manipulation, and insight development with limited data
* Excellent interpersonal, presentation, and stakeholder engagement skills with the ability to influence outcomes.
* Self\\-starter with a positive, flexible mindset and the ability to lead change in dynamic environments.
* Fluency in English \\& Bahasa Indonesia, both written and spoken

  

What will also help:

* Demonstrated curiosity for digital trends and continuously seeks smarter, more efficient ways to improve processes and drive innovation
* A track record for thriving in fast\\-paced, high\\-pressure, and ambiguous environments with a proactive, solutions\\-oriented mindset
* Strong cultural sensitivity and a global outlook in team and client interactions

  

**Additional Information**  

Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: Ad-hoc Data Analyst
description:

You need a place where you can work on projects that will **globalize** your standard? Need projects that will expand your knowledge and skills extensively? Looking to find a job in the international spectrum? **Codingo Singapore** provides you the bridge to the global standard.

**Codingo Singapore** is Singapore's no. 1 Assignment Help Platform. Initially focusing only in coding, we are now expanding into various fields! Thus, we require a lot of manpower to fulfill the fields that we are not established in.

We are looking for a detail\\-oriented and analytical Ad\\-Hoc Data Analyst to assist with data\\-related tasks on a project basis. This role is ideal for students and fresh graduates with a strong foundation in data analysis, statistical methods, and data visualization. You will work closely with the team to extract insights from datasets, support decision\\-making, and contribute to data\\-driven solutions.

**Responsibilities:**

* Collect, clean, and preprocess data from various sources to ensure accuracy and consistency.
* Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
* Generate reports, dashboards, and visualizations to communicate findings effectively.
* Assist in statistical modeling, hypothesis testing, and predictive analysis as needed.
* Support data\\-driven decision\\-making by providing actionable insights.
* Document methodologies, findings, and recommendations in a clear and structured manner.
* Collaborate with different teams to understand data requirements and deliver ad\\-hoc analyses.

title: Trade Management Staff
description:
Job Description


PT LG Electronics Indonesia
Step into the innovative world of LG Electronics. As a global leader in technology, LG Electronics is dedicated to creating innovative solutions for a better life. Our brand promise, 'Life's Good', embodies our commitment to ensuring a happier, better life for all.  

  

With a rich history spanning over six decades and a global presence of more than 100 subsidiaries, we operate on a truly global scale. Since our establishment in 1958, our dedication to enhancing lives worldwide through innovative products has remained unwavering. Our business domains include Home Appliance \\& Air Solution, Home Entertainment, Vehicle Components Solutions, and Business Solutions.  

Our management philosophy, ""Jeong\\-do Management,"" embodies our commitment to high ethical standards and transparent operations. Grounded in the principles of 'Customer\\-Value Creation' and 'People\\-Oriented Management', these values shape our corporate culture, fostering creativity, diversity, and integrity. At LG, we believe in the power of collective wisdom, fostering a collaborative work environment.  

  

Join us and become a part of a company that is not just about creating solutions for a better life, because at LG, Life's Good.

**What you'll do**

* List Price \\& Prompt Limit Price Registration
* Sales Program Registration Process
* Sales Program Claim Checking
* Sales Program Analyzing \\& Reporting

* At least bachelor’s degree in any major.

title: Business Development Analyst - Professional Services
description:
**Company Description**  

Turner \\& Townsend is a global professional services company with over 22,000 people in more than 60 countries.  

Working with our clients across real estate, infrastructure, energy and natural resources, we transform together delivering outcomes that improve people’s lives. Working in partnership makes it possible to deliver the world’s most impactful projects and programmes as we turn challenge into opportunity and complexity into success.  

Our capabilities include programme, project, cost, asset and commercial management, controls and performance, procurement and supply chain, net zero and digital solutions.  

We are majority\\-owned by CBRE Group, Inc., the world’s largest commercial real estate services and investment firm, with our partners holding a significant minority interest. Turner \\& Townsend and CBRE work together to provide clients with the premier programme, project and cost management offering in markets around the world.  

Please visit our website: www.turnerandtownsend.com

 **Job Description**  

* Application of the business development understanding to management information and reporting to deliver insights and reporting.
* Provision of weekly, monthly and quarterly standardised reporting which collates data into meaningful information for Board\\-level executives, leadership and business development professionals.
* Produce insightful and accurate commentary and analysis to accompany data and analysis.
* Collate multiple datasets in Dynamics 365, PowerBI and Sharepoint based systems to create a single, accurate view to aid business development activities.
* Engage diverse stakeholders to build understanding on the impact of data and how it is used to make business decisions.
* Provide inductions, training and guidance to stakeholders which improves reporting accuracy and understanding.
* Maintain data quality and consistency through establishing processes, procedures and guidance which support improved ways of working.
* Accurate data entry support to maintain systems and support priority requirements
* Development of PowerBI and Sharepoint dashboards/lists and repositories to aid reporting.
* Work with colleagues in Finance and Business Development teams locally and globally

  

**Qualifications**  

* Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Business Development or a related field.
* Experience in business development or sales
* Proficiency in Dynamics 365, SalesForce, Excel and Microsoft Office
* Detail\\-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality.
* Drive for continuous improvement, and problem solving.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Knowledge of data governance and best practices.
* Ability to work at pace in a fast paced environment

  

**Additional Information**  

Our inspired people share our vision and mission. We provide a great place to work, where each person has the opportunity and voice to affect change.


We want our people to succeed both in work and life. To support this we promote a healthy, productive and flexible working environment that respects work\\-life balance.


Turner \\& Townsend is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and actively encourage applications from all sectors of the community.


Please find out more about us at www.turnerandtownsend.com/

title: Fullstack Developer .Net
description:
Mengembangkan dan memelihara aplikasi web berbasis .NET Framework (C\\#) dan PHP Framework (CodeIgniter, Laravel).


Membangun dan mengelola Web API (RESTful) untuk komunikasi antara sistem frontend dan backend.


Melakukan integrasi API dengan sistem eksternal seperti layanan pembayaran atau sistem pihak ketiga lainnya.


Mengelola dan mengoptimalkan database (T\\-SQL), termasuk pembuatan stored procedure, view, dan function.


Berkolaborasi dengan tim lintas fungsi (Business Analyst, QA, dan Project Manager) dalam pengembangan sistem.


Merancang solusi teknis yang scalable, maintainable, dan sesuai standar best practice.


Melakukan troubleshooting dan bug fixing untuk menjaga stabilitas sistem.


Menerapkan metode Trunk Based Development dalam proses pengembangan.


  
Minimum Qualifications: Pendidikan minimal S1 dari jurusan MIPA (Matematika/Fisika) atau Teknologi Informasi (Teknik Komputer, Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Manajemen Informatika, Ilmu Komputer, Sistem Komputer, Teknologi Informasi).


IPK minimal 3\\.00 (skala 4\\.00\\).


Memiliki pengalaman kerja minimal 2 tahun sebagai Fullstack Web Developer.


Menguasai .NET Framework (C\\#) dan memahami konsep MVC.


Berpengalaman dalam pengembangan dan pengelolaan RESTful API.


Mahir dalam T\\-SQL dan pengelolaan database SQL Server.


Menguasai PHP Framework (CodeIgniter dan Laravel).


Memahami konsep MVC, ORM (Eloquent), dan REST API architecture.


Memahami proses bisnis di sektor perbankan, terutama produk digital banking dan credit/loan system.


Terbiasa bekerja dengan metode Trunk Based Development.

title: IFRS17 Actuarial Analyst - Zurich Topas Life
description:
Job Summary

Acts under direct supervision, performing actuarial duties in order to provide highly accurate data and analyses for use by more senior actuaries in relation to reserving, reporting, quantitative risk management or the pricing of business.
Job Qualifications
* 2 years experience in Actuary Analyst using IFRS17
* Background education from Actuarial Science or related
* Having FSAI or ASAI certification will be plus point
Job Accountabilities \\- Key Accountabilities  

* Provide basic actuarial services under direct supervision to fulfill routine business requirements and to solve problems with a limited level of complexity / diversity.
* Perform statistical analyses, model and analyze data and develop models/programs for model building and analyses; interpret results of models and analyses.
* Compile and categorize data and document and verify factors and assumptions used in computations to ensure robust output.
* Assist in the development of risk based capital models as well as parameterization and allocation activities to support actuarial services.
* Participate in the evaluation and review of new/proposed processes and systems.
* Demonstrate increasing knowledge of actuarial disciplines and procedures to build value adding, relevant technical knowledge.
* Work with actuarial colleagues to develop understanding of company operations, business objectives and actuarial methodologies.
* Demonstrate progress towards local actuarial qualification.

  

**Why Zurich**  


At Zurich, we like to think outside the box and challenge the status quo. We take an optimistic approach by focusing on the positives and constantly asking What can go right?
We are an equal opportunity employer who knows that each employee is unique \\- that’s what makes our team so great!  

Join us as we constantly explore new ways to protect our customers and the planet.

title: Performance Marketing Analyst - Majamojo
description:
**About the role:**


We’re looking for an experienced and strategic Senior Performance Marketing who can drive user acquisition, player quality, and monetization growth across Majamojo’s game portfolio. This role combines hands\\-on campaign execution with strategic leadership — balancing data\\-driven performance optimization with strong understanding of brand visibility and product awareness in the gaming ecosystem.


You will lead paid marketing initiatives across UA, retargeting, in\\-app ads, and awareness channels, working closely with creative, product, and monetization teams to ensure sustainable ROI and player lifetime value.

**What You Will Do, but not limited to:**

### **User Acquisition \\& Growth**

* Plan, execute, and optimize multi\\-channel campaigns across Google UAC, Meta Ads, TikTok Ads, ASA, Unity Ads, IronSource, Moloco, and others.
* Manage campaign structures, bidding strategies, and budget pacing to achieve CPI, ROAS, and LTV targets.
* Develop and maintain a growth forecast model based on acquisition cost, retention, and monetization KPIs.
* Analyze existing channels and identify new opportunities to increase ROI and new users.
* Integrate ad channels with data analytics tools such as Adjust and Firebase.

### **Product \\& Brand Awareness**

* Design and execute brand awareness and product visibility campaigns (YouTube, TikTok TopView, influencer, display) to expand reach and strengthen IP presence.
* Coordinate with brand and content teams to align messaging between performance and brand campaigns.
* Coordinate with brand and content teams to align messaging between performance and brand campaigns.
* Analyze uplift in awareness, engagement, and organic install growth from upper\\-funnel efforts.

### **In\\-App Ads Monetization**

* Collaborate with the monetization team to optimize in\\-app ad networks (AdMob, Unity Ads, AppLovin MAX, IronSource, etc.).
* Track ad fill rate, eCPM, ARPDAU, and balance between ad monetization and user experience.
* Suggest creative placements or event\\-driven ad triggers to increase ad revenue without harming retention.

### **Creative Strategy \\& Asset Intelligence**

* Analyze ad creative performance and identify winning themes, messages, and formats.
* Work closely with the creative team to brief data\\-inspired asset requests (video, static, playable ads).
* Build and maintain an asset performance dashboard with clear recommendations per audience segment.
* Research trending creatives in the market and apply the findings to enhance asset performance and campaign results.

### **Reporting \\& Leadership**

* Lead weekly performance reviews with product and finance to align UA efficiency and revenue targets.
* Provide insights and learnings across CPI, ROAS, LTV, Retention, and cohort performance.
* Mentor and develop junior performance marketers to execute with operational excellence.

**Requirements**

* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or Data/Analytics.
* 3–6 years of experience in performance marketing or user acquisition, **preferably in mobile gaming or app publishing.**
* Deep hands\\-on knowledge of:
* Google Ads (UAC), Meta Ads Manager, TikTok Ads, ASA, Unity / IronSource / AdMob / AppLovin MAX.
* App tracking tools: Appsflyer, Adjust, Firebase Analytics.
* Cohort and revenue analysis (ROAS, LTV, ARPU, Retention).
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate data into actionable strategy.
* Proven success managing large budgets and scaling paid campaigns profitably.
* Understanding of upper\\-funnel marketing (awareness, influencer, video, PR synergy).
* Experience collaborating with product, creative, and BI teams in fast\\-paced environments.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in both Bahasa Indonesia and English.
* Passion for games, mobile apps, and player communities.

### **Nice to Have**

* Experience with creative automation / asset versioning tools.
* Familiarity with programmatic buying platforms or DSPs (e.g., Liftoff, Mintegral, Moloco).
* Basic SQL / data visualization (Looker, Tableau, Data Studio).
* Prior work in Southeast Asia gaming markets (Indonesia, Philippines, Thailand, Malaysia).

title: Regulatory Reporting Analyst - Ops
description:
The Regulatory Reporting Analyst (Ops) is a developing professional role. Applies specialty area knowledge in monitoring, assessing, analyzing and/or evaluating processes and data. Reviews policies to understand the reports that are needed. Interprets data and makes recommendations. Researches and interprets factual information. Identifies inconsistencies in data or results, defines business issues and formulates recommendations on policies, procedures or practices. Integrates established disciplinary knowledge within own specialty area with basic understanding of related industry practices. Good understanding of how the team interacts with others in accomplishing the objectives of the area. Develops working knowledge of industry practices and standards. Limited but direct impact on the business through the quality of the tasks/services provided. Impact of the job holder is restricted to own team.  

  

**Responsibilities:**

* Primarily responsible for the preparation and filing of various Bank Regulatory Reports based on predefined metrics or KPIs in line with production frequency and timelines assigned by Regulatory.
* Ensure accuracy, timeliness and completeness of Regulatory Reports.
* Attention to detail and must work collaboratively with stakeholders to implement process changes, improve productivity, and optimize reporting efficiency.
* Monitor changes in regulatory requirement and update process notes accordingly. Ensure proper documentation with required approvals.
* Analyze data and identify factors contributing towards variances.
* Provide insights on process and recommendation for improvement/ automation.
* Maintain detailed record for reports submitted and queries received from regulator.
* Effectively identify and mitigate risks / issues while ensuring continued compliance with internal and regulatory requirements.
* Performs data analysis to monitor and track data quality and completeness of data.
* Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.

 **Qualifications:**

* 0\\-3 years’ experience and ability to partner with business \\& technology stakeholders to ensure successful delivery of Regulatory Reports.
* Strong ability to interpret business requirements for the purpose of liaising with technology developers.
* Knowledge of TTS Products (Payments \\& Receivables, International Trade, Corporate Cards, Onboarding) and Services Regulatory Reporting domain.
* Experience managing tight deadlines or unexpected requirement changes.
* Proficient in MS Office applications (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
* Background in Data Analytics preferred.

 **Education:**

* Bachelor’s/University degree or equivalent experience

title: Operations Coordinator
description:
**ONA Indonesia**, an affiliate company of Destination Group, is a personal care electronics brand dedicated to serving the needs of digital\\-savvy modern individuals. With a vision to become a celebrated local brand with international reach, we have made waves with our first hero product, a high\\-speed hairdryer that quickly went viral. Our commitment to innovation and quality sets us apart as we continue to bring cutting\\-edge, high\\-quality electronic devices for our discerning customers.

 **Job Description \\& Key Responsibilities:**

 **1\\.** **SOP Development \\& Operations continuous improvement:**

* Develop, implement, and regularly update SOPs for logistics and product service \\& delivery processes to ensure efficiency and adherence to standards.

  

2\\. **Logistics Management:**

* Oversee inventory, distribution, transportation, order fulfillment, and warehouse operations to ensure accuracy and smooth flow.
* Manage inventory supply, conduct regular counts and audit, and ensure zero stock issues.
* Monitor warehouse partner performance, ensuring operational accuracy aligns with standards.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams on forecasting and stock management.
* Analyze inventory data with Data Analysts to identify trends and optimize procurement and operational costs.

 **3\\. Product Service \\& Delivery:**

* Support product development projects by ensuring compliance with regulations and obtaining necessary certifications.
* Ensure packaging, logistics, and all product details meet established standards.
* Develop and deliver training to retail staff (SPG/B), ensuring SOP adherence, optimal sales performance, and well\\-stocked inventory at offline locations.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in management, business, or any major.
* Having min. 2 years of experience in logistics and inventory management (70%) and product service and delivery (30%), SOP Development and Operations continuous improvement.
* Attention to detail.
* Having good empathetic listening and communication skills.
* Having good interpersonal communication skills, able to coordinate needs and requirements across different teams.
* Able to work in a fast\\-paced environment and possess great flexibility.

title: Senior Software Analyst
description:
**About the Role**  

As Senior Software Analyst, Engineering and Solution, you will lead and manage the technical project team and be an instrumental cog in the IT PAC (People and Culture) team of GoTo and own everything related to HR systems and their ecosystem. Collaborating with other IT stakeholders, for example, infrastructure, security, and other functional teams, you will be responsible for overall technical project planning, development and modification of HR systems, and providing support for Workday with downstream/upstream systems. You will have ample opportunity to flex your Workday configuration skills and dive deep into projects that deliver exceptional human capital technology solutions, ensuring everything we do works in harmony with GoTo’s goals and values.
### **What You Will Do**

* + Work closely with HR teams to align business requirements with technical solutions.
	+ Act as the main IT contact for the HR team, including for workforce planning process stakeholders.
	+ Responsible for technical design, configurations, and deployment of HR systems aligned with company policies, especially the workforce budget planning platform (knowledge of Workday workforce planning is a plus).
	+ Collaborate with Enterprise Architecture team to develop detailed IT architecture plans and technology roadmap as it relates to HR ecosystem
	+ Oversee integration between HR systems and other corporate systems, including maintaining APIs, ETLs, or middleware flows.
	+ Ensure overall tech design and configuration adheres to security and risk management controls and policies are fully documented
	+ Strategize, monitor, and provide technical support on the HR ecosystem
	+ Monitor, review, and assess the HR ecosystem for continuous improvement \\& enhancement

### **What You Will Need**

* + At least 3\\+ years of experience in implementing/managing HR Projects \\& Systems (includes but not limited to features, integrations, data migration, reporting access roles)
	+ Experience in managing a support team and establishing strong relationships across teams and business users, including managing and own the troubleshooting escalation processes
	+ Knowledge of Workday/similar HR System Interface, Reporting \\& Dashboard, Security, Access, Enterprise Change Management Process, Audits, Application security \\& data privacy reviews
	+ Understanding of the workforce planning system, processes, and activities
	+ Understanding of IT Application Development principles (SDLC) \\& architectures with proven experience in supporting Agile PI events, sprints, and the release management processes
	+ Excellent verbal \\& written communication skills and proven track record of successful engagement with Agilent businesses and functions
	+ Strong leadership \\& organizational skills with the ability to deliver in a fast\\-paced, results\\-driven environment

**About the Team**  

Our IT PAC (People and Culture) Team is part of the larger IT Enterprise Systems Team under the CIO Organization. This larger team, which has more than 50 team members globally, oversees all internal and enterprise systems for GoTo's businesses, including (but not limited to) finance, people services, productivity, sales, operations, internal security access, authentication, account authorization, account audits, and emails. For instance, should you have a question about how to do automation or how to authenticate your work email with a particular app/service, we are your people! .  

We are a tight\\-knit group made up of folks who love to play soccer and tennis, cook, enjoy reading great books, and get together to just hang out over coffees or iced teas. We work hard and play hard, and believe it or not, we actually enjoy each other’s company! **About GoTo Group**
GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on\\-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household. **About Gojek**
Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on\\-demand platform and pioneer of the multi\\-service ecosystem with over 2\\.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market. **About GoTo Financial**
GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last. *GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.* *\\#LI\\-ONSITE*
We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

title: Credit Reviewer Senior Analyst
description:
**About Amartha**


At Amartha, we empower micro\\-businesses across Indonesia, enabling growth and equal prosperity. We’ve supported over 2\\.7 million entrepreneurs—mostly women—by disbursing IDR 22\\.8 trillion in funding. As we step into 2025, Amartha is evolving into a technology\\-driven financial ecosystem, expanding our reach in lending, funding, and payments. Through innovation and digital solutions, we aim to enhance accessibility, streamline processes, and create a seamless user experience.

**About the Role**


The Credit Reviewer is responsible for conducting independent reviews and assessments of credit portfolios to ensure compliance with the organization’s credit policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements. The role focuses on evaluating the quality of credit decisions, identifying emerging credit risks, and recommending corrective actions to strengthen the credit process and portfolio performance.

**Responsibilities**

* Conduct a credit end to end process review and prepare the report.
* Analyze credit product proposals from internal.
* Identify risk, room for improvement and prepare recommendations after review.
* Setup methodologies to identify potential borrowers from multiple datasource.
* Perform independent reviews of credit proposals, renewals, and existing credit exposures to assess creditworthiness and risk rating accuracy.
* Evaluate adherence to internal credit policies, approval processes, and regulatory guidelines.
* Analyze financial statements, business performance, and collateral adequacy to assess repayment capacity and risk exposure.
* Identify trends, weaknesses, and potential problem credits within the portfolio.

**Requirements**

* Bachelor Degree any field, from reputable University
* Minimum 2 years of relevant working experience, preferably from start\\-up/tech company or financial industry.
* Good knowledge about credit risk flow process
* Intermediate proficiency in using data tools (SQL, BigQuery, etc)
* Excellent communication skill and stakeholders’ management
* Strong analytical skills and problem solving
* Adaptable and wiling to travel
* Have Credit portfolio management experience will be an advantage.
* Self motivated and detail oriented

*At Amartha, we are dedicated to creating a workplace that celebrates diversity, ensures equity, and fosters inclusion. We believe that diverse perspectives—shaped by factors such as gender, age, race, ethnicity, education, culture, and life experiences—drive innovation and growth.*

*We actively welcome individuals from all backgrounds to join us in building an environment where everyone feels respected, valued, and empowered. Our commitment is to provide equal opportunities and foster a sense of belonging that enables our employees to thrive and make meaningful contributions.*

title: Data Engineer Consultant (Junior & Senior) 1
description:
**About EY:**


EY, a global leader operating in more than 150 countries delivers unparalleled service in **Consulting** and assists clients to transform and upskill their capabilities.

  

We serve our clients to build a better working world, helping them to create long\\-term value for people and society and build trust in the capital markets. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities, and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we work towards our ambition to be the best employer.

  

At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture, and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

  

The exceptional EY experience. It’s yours to build.

  

We look forward you to joining us in the **EYDS AI and Data** team:

 **Ideally, you must have:**

* Bachelor’s Degree or above in Information Systems, Computer Science, Informatics, Electronics and Communications, or related disciplines.
* Minimum 1\\-2 years (for Associate level) and 3\\-5 years (for Senior level) in data engineering.

 **Job description:**

* Design and implement scalable data pipelines to support data processing and analytics.
* Conduct user acceptance test, user training.
* Develop and maintain ETL processes using Microsoft Azure Data Factory and Azure Databricks.
* Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to understand data requirements.
* Ensure data quality and integrity throughout the data lifecycle.
* Optimize data storage and retrieval processes for performance and efficiency

 **Technical skill:**

* Python/Scala for data processing, ETL, and automation
* Data pipeline design and implementation
* Data modelling
* ETL development and maintenance
* Data quality and integrity management
* Optimizing data storage and retrieval
* User acceptance testing (UAT) and training
* Collaboration with data teams

 **Tools:**

* Azure Data Factory
* Azure Databricks
* Azure Cloud Platform
* SQL\\-based databases

 **The opportunity:**


You will help our clients navigate the business and technology transformation vision. We’ll look to you to provide our clients with a unique business and technology perspective on how technology can transform and improve their entire organization – starting with key business issues they face. This is a high\\-growth, high\\-visibility area with plenty of opportunities to enhance your skill set and build your career.

 **Your key responsibilities:**


You’ll spend most of your time working with a wide variety of clients and your colleagues to deliver the latest trends, practices, technologies, and architecture to design, build and maintain scalable and robust solutions that unify, enrich, collaborate and deliver value.

 **Skills and attributes for success:**

* Outstanding team player
* High level of motivation
* Strong work ethic
* Self\\-starting attitude
* Independent and able to manage and prioritize workload
* Ability to quickly and positively adapt to change
* Excellent written and verbal communication, presentation, client service, and technical writing skills, coupled with excellent executive presence.
* Significant experience in managing and delivering medium to large teams on complex programs and projects.
* Assessing, designing, architecting, and developing solutions leveraging the latest technologies and trends to exceed the business requirements
* Unifying, enriching, and delivering value to derive insights and opportunities
* Leveraging in\\-house and partners \\- platforms and solutions as needed and recommending and building new platforms/solutions as required to exceed business requirements
* Communicating findings, recommendations, and opportunities to improve platforms and solutions
* Demonstrating a deep understanding of technology, concepts, tools, features, functions, and benefits of different approaches
* Seeking out information to learn about emerging methodologies and technologies
* Clarifying problems by driving to understand the true issue
* Looking for opportunities for improving methods and outcomes
* Collaborating, influencing, and building consensus through constructive relationships and effective listening
* Solving problems by incorporating data into decision making
* Proven track record of sales and delivery in a consulting context with established client relationships and experience

 **What we look for:**


We’re interested in passionate individuals with a strong vision and a desire to stay on top of trends. If you have a genuine passion for helping businesses achieve their full potential, then these role(s) are for you.

 **What we offer:**

* Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next
* Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, on your way
* Transformative leadership: We’ll give you the insights, coaching, and confidence to be the leader the world needs
* Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs

  

If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.

title: Test Analyst
description:
**The Opportunity** 

* Permanent position based in Jakarta
* Support testing and environment coordination across core Enterprise Applications
* Collaborate with developers, business analysts, and environment leads

We are announcing a new permanent position in Jakarta for a Test Analyst. This role will support testing and environment coordination across our suite of core Enterprise Applications.


As a Test Analyst, responsibilities include executing manual and automated testing, such as API/integration testing, module and functional testing, and validation of data quality, accuracy, and security.


The Test Analyst will collaborate with developers, business analysts, and environment leads to maintain test and development environments, draft test scripts and use cases, document and report test results, and present outcomes to both business and technical teams.


This position is suited for an individual with extensive hands\\-on testing experience, meticulous attention to detail, and a dedication to continuous improvement.


You will collaborate with a small core test team and leverage resources from other business units to ensure that test coverage meets business requirements.


Furthermore, you will assist in the development of bug resolutions and system enhancements and participate in project teams rolling out new enterprise applications such as Workday and Datapay.


In addition, you will be involved in refining existing platforms like Oracle Fusion, testing new releases for their business value and integration effects, and facilitating the business's optimal use of its enterprise applications—including reporting tools.


**About you** 

* 3–5 years’ experience in testing and environment coordination for enterprise applications
* Skilled in quality assurance, system stability, and automation techniques
* Strong documentation and presentation skills

You are an experienced Test Analyst with 3–5 years in testing and environment coordination for enterprise applications.


Your expertise in quality assurance and system stability, along with proficiency in testing tools and automation techniques, makes you a strong candidate.


You excel in documentation and presenting testing results to both business and technical teams.


Your skill in supporting bug fixes and system improvements ensures seamless releases and robust environments.


As a key contributor, you'll join project teams deploying new enterprise applications and support ongoing development.


You'll test new releases to evaluate their value and feasibility for the business.


Comfortable with tight deadlines, you'll work independently or in teams and present results confidently.


Your passion for improvement and collaboration will enhance the testing environment.


If you’re someone who:
 

* Has proficiency in API, integration, module, functional, data quality, and security testing of enterprise applications
* Has experience with testing tools such as Playwright and Azure DevOps (ADO) and familiarity with automation techniques
* Can draft test scripts, document results, and present findings and recommendations to stakeholders
* Participates in release planning, sprint review meetings and ensures test activities comply with organizational standards, compliance and audit requirements
* Supports bug fixes and system improvements, ensuring timely issue resolution for system reliability

We’d love to hear from you.


**What we offer** 

* Professional development opportunities
* A supportive and caring work environment where you can bring your whole self to work
* Opportunities to learn from our industry experts and technical gurus across the Asia Pacific
* A highly supportive environment of sharing and collaboration

Beca prides itself on supporting a diverse and inclusive culture – open to inputs from creative people of all genders, ethnicity, identity, thought and experiences.
 

**About us**   

Beca is one of Asia Pacific’s largest independent advisory, design, and engineering consultancies.


After a century of operation, we have grown from a family\\-owned business to one of the most progressive, client\\-centric professional services consultancies in our region.


We have more than 4,000 employees in 25 offices around the world and have delivered projects in more than 70 countries.


‘Creative people together transforming our world’ is our vision.


It reflects our culture, our aspirations and our purpose – to make everyday better.


We create value through understanding and delivering successful solutions, exceptional service and our enduring relationships and use our skills and systems to empower innovation; helping our clients shape communities, optimise their assets and streamline their operations.


Find out more about us at www.beca.com

title: Production Operator 4
description:
**Job Title – Production Operator**

**Location – Karawang, Indonesia**

  

This position reports to the Production Supervisor and is based at Firmenich Aromatics Indonesia, Karawang Plant. The role is responsible for coordinating production activities while ensuring compliance with Health, Safety, Environment, and Food Safety standards, including GMP. Key tasks include operating and monitoring equipment, recording production data, performing in\\-process analysis with QC, and maintaining good housekeeping through implementation of 5S. The role also supports continuous improvement by recommending procedural enhancements and ensuring alignment with local food safety regulations.

 **Key Responsibilities:**


Coordinate one or more of the following Categories of Process Production Activities and may have additional tasks within each:

* Ensure compliance with Health, Safety, Environment, and Food Safety policies, including GMP.
* Operate and monitor production equipment safely and efficiently.
* Record production data and perform in\\-process analysis with QC Analysts.
* Maintain good housekeeping through 5S implementation and follow applicable procedures.

 **We offer:**

 **You Bring:**

* Positive work attitude, structured
* Must be Thorough and attentive to details, Organized
* Able to multitask and complete multiple requests on time
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
* Developing analytical skills with problem solving ability
* Ability to adapt well to a fast\\-paced environment

 **About dsm\\-firmenich**


At dsm\\-firmenich, we don’t just meet expectations – we go beyond them. Join our global team powered by science, creativity, and a shared purpose: to bring progress to life.


From elevating health to making fortified food and sustainable skincare, the impact of your work here will be felt by millions – every single day. Whether it’s fragrance that helps you focus, alternative meat that’s better for the planet, or reducing sugar without losing flavor, this is where you help shape the future of nutrition, health, and beauty for everyone, everywhere.


And while you’re making a difference, we’ll make sure you’re growing too. With learning that never stops, a culture that lifts you up and the freedom to move across businesses, teams, and borders. Your voice matters here. And your ideas? They’re essential to our future.


Because real progress only happens when we **go beyond, together.**

 **Inclusion, belonging and equal opportunity**


At dsm\\-firmenich, we believe being a force for good starts with the way we treat each other. When people feel supported, included, and free to be themselves, they do their best work – and that’s exactly the kind of culture we’re building. A place where opportunity is truly equal, authenticity is celebrated, and everyone has the chance to grow, contribute, and feel they belong.


We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and we’re serious about making our hiring process as fair and inclusive as possible. From inclusive language and diverse interview panels to thoughtful sourcing, we’re committed to reflecting the world we serve.


We welcome candidates from all backgrounds — no matter your gender, ethnicity, sexual orientation, or anything else that makes you, you.


And if you have a disability or need any support through the application process, we’re here to help – just let us know what you need, and we’ll do everything we can to make it work.

 **Agency statement**

We’re managing this search directly at dsm\\-firmenich. If you’re applying as an individual, we’d love to hear from you. We’re not accept agency submissions or proposals involving fees or commissions for this role.

title: Solutions Engineer - MSSP - APAC
description:
**Build a great career with SOCRadar**


SOCRadar is well\\-positioned for continued success with a focus on innovation, global expansion, and feature\\-rich multi\\-functionality. Our mission is to enable the organizations to get proactive against evolving cyber threats. Enterprises worldwide are increasingly selecting SOCRadar to get proactive security by understanding their attack surface and gaining automation\\-enabled visibility into surface, deep, and dark web. SOCRadar users leverage our expertise and investment in a scalable, innovative Extended Threat Intelligence (XTI) solution to protect their most valuable assets: brand reputation, employees, customers, and overall business operations.


**What will Pre\\-sales Engineer do**:


* As a Pre\\-sales Engineer based in the APAC, you will . You will engage directly with prospects' and customers' technical teams to understand their cybersecurity risks, pain points, and threat exposure through research and structured discovery.
* Your core responsibility is to propose SOCRadar's tailored threat intelligence\\-driven solutions that align with each customer's unique attack surface and risk landscape.
* You will develop trust\\-based relationships with stakeholders, clearly articulating the value and effectiveness of the proposed solutions and demonstrating how SOCRadar's Extended Threat Intelligence (XTI) platform helps mitigate real\\-world threats across the surface, deep, and dark web.
* As a Pre\\-sales Engineer serving the APAC region, you will be instrumental in enabling SOCRadar's strategic expansion through Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) playing a critical role in the sales process by bridging the gap between technical requirements and business needs.
* You'll partner closely with MSSPs to position SOCRadar's Extended Threat Intelligence (XTI) platform as a core component of their service delivery enhancing their offerings with scalable, proactive cyber threat monitoring, dark web surveillance, and attack surface management.
* Your primary focus will be to understand MSSP partners' operational models, technical architecture, and service\\-level obligations to help tailor SOCRadar integrations that drive automation, intelligence enrichment, and actionable visibility.
* You will lead technical engagements with MSSP architects, SOC teams, and client\\-facing analysts to co\\-design solutions that not only meet current detection and response needs, but also create competitive differentiation in a saturated market.
* You will cultivate strategic technical relationships, provide guidance on scalable multi\\-tenant deployments, and ensure that MSSP partners are fully equipped to deliver value\\-added threat intelligence services built on the SOCRadar platform.


**Responsibilities:**

  

* Conduct technical discovery sessions to identify the prospect's cyber risks, use cases, and threat intelligence needs.
* Develop tailored threat intelligence solution proposals based on identified pain points and attack vectors.
* Perform demos and product walkthroughs to communicate how SOCRadar addresses customer\\-specific challenges.
* Deliver training and onboarding sessions for customers and partners on how to effectively use the SOCRadar platform.
* Collaborate closely with Account Managers (AMs) and Channel Account Managers (CAMs) to strategize and win deals.
* Lead and manage proof\\-of\\-concepts (POCs) and ensure clear success criteria are met.
* Prepare use\\-case documentation and regional threat analysis reports.
* Respond to RFI/RFPs, aligning customer requirements with platform capabilities.
* Analyze customer incidents to identify upsell/cross\\-sell opportunities and guide the customer on the most effective additional services.


* Build strong, trust\\-based relationships with both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders, acting as a credible advisor.
* Collaborate with MSSP partners to integrate SOCRadar's Extended Threat Intelligence (XTI) capabilities into their service delivery models.
* Provide presales support for MSSP\\-aligned service offerings, including threat monitoring, managed detection, incident response advisories, and dark web threat intelligence integration.
* Customize solution architectures that enable MSSPs to scale their operations through multi\\-tenant XTI platform deployments and streamlined SOC workflows.
* Educate and enable MSSP technical and sales teams through workshops, trainings, and use\\-case\\-based demonstrations focused on SOCRadar's value in managed services.
* Act as the primary technical liaison between MSSP stakeholders and internal product/engineering teams, providing feedback to improve service alignment.
* Assist MSSPs in crafting security operations processes that leverage SOCRadar data and insights to enhance their threat response and reporting capabilities.
* Support MSSP partner enablement and onboarding efforts, ensuring alignment with SLAs, compliance needs, and regional threat landscapes.


**Requirements:**


* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or a related technical field.
* Minimum 3 years of experience in cybersecurity presales, technical sales, or security engineering roles.
* Solid understanding of cyber threat intelligence, attack techniques, and risk management practices.
* Proven ability to conduct technical discovery, evaluate cyber risks, and translate them into actionable solutions.
* Strong presentation and communication skills, capable of tailoring technical content for different audiences.
* Experience with managing POCs, proposal development, and delivering high\\-impact product demonstrations.
* High emotional intelligence with the ability to build trust and credibility with clients and partners.
* Familiarity with Extended Threat Intelligence, including dark web monitoring, brand protection, and attack surface management.
* Willingness to travel as needed to support customer meetings, trade shows, and partner engagements across the APAC.
* We would love to hear from you if you are a driven and technically proficient professional with a passion for cybersecurity and a track record of success in pre\\-sales.
* Fluent in English language.


Please submit your application through our official job posting on our website, or feel free to reach out to us directly for further information. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you and drive the success of SOCRadar in the APAC region.
