title: Data Scientist
description:
*We deliver the best GIS solutions in the world, with the brightest minds on the map.*


What are the issues that matter most to you? Climate change, national security, disaster response?


At Esri Indonesia you'll work with people at the forefront of these issues, connect them with the best tech and solutions and get an inside look into the real\\-world challenges that shape our future.


We turn problems into opportunities, and that takes two things:

* The most powerful GIS technology and solutions.
* Driven, talented, and passionately curious people.


Here we connect them, and that’s how we achieve incredible things for communities, economies, and for your career.

  

About the Role


As a Data Scientist in the Solution Engineering department, you will support and collaborate with Solution Engineers to design and develop GeoAI models, as well as train and experiment with various data types.


As data scientist you will be responsible for key tasks such as:

* Design and implement scalable GeoAI with a strong emphasis on geospatial use cases.
* Manage the end\\-to\\-end GeoAI lifecycle: data preparation, model development, model evaluation, inferencing, accuracy assessment, model deployment, and model management.
* Integrate AI and GIS workflows within enterprise systems to enhance mapping processes and generate actionable insights.
* Work with large\\-scale geospatial datasets (satellite, aerial imagery, drone imagery, LiDAR, IoT, sensor data, and spatial databases).
* Collaborate with Solution Engineering teams to design data\\-driven solutions that address business needs and industry challenges.
* Collaborate with Implementation teams to deliver GeoAI\\-enabled projects for customers and partners.
* Support solution deployment in enterprise environments, including cloud services, containers, and scalable infrastructure.
* Document methodologies, workflows, and technical processes in a clear and structured manner.
* Explore and evaluate Esri product capabilities and innovations, stay current with new features and best practices, and participate enablement programs to share knowledge with internal teams, customers, and partners.

  

About You


We are looking for an experienced Data Scientist with knowledge in GIS, particularly in Image Processing, along with a strong understanding of Big Data, IoT, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence concepts to drive successful development of a scalable GeoAI solutions.

* Min. bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Sciences, Mathematics, Statistics, or any related fields.
* Min 2 years of professional experience as Data Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, or equivalent role.
* Strong experience with Machine Learning \\& Deep Learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit\\-learn).
* Proficiency in Python for data science, AI model development, and automation.
* Familiarity with Big Data, IoT, and statistics as applied to geospatial AI.
* Knowledge of model deployment techniques (containers, APIs, cloud platforms like AWS/Azure/GCP).
* Familiarity with REST APIs and solution integration approaches.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills with the ability to structure complex challenges.
* Excellent communication skills to present technical insights to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to write clear, well\\-structured technical documentation.

Understanding of GIS concepts and practical experience in geospatial analysis and image processing, is an advantage.  
* 

  

Discover how our values shape our impact, your journey begins with one click here: Our people

title: Technical Senior Safety Engineer
description:
**Title:**


Technical Senior Safety Engineer
KBR’s Sustainable Technology Solutions (STS) group is looking for a Technical Senior Safety Engineer to support the Abadi LNG project, one of the largest projects in Asia. This project will provide front\\-end design (FEED) for onshore liquefied natural gas facilities \\& will have a peak production capacity targets of 9\\.5 million tons per annum of LNG and 150 million standard cubic feet per day of pipeline gas. The Abadi LNG project has been designated a project of national strategic importance by the Indonesian government.


The Technical Senior Safety Engineer will develop Design Safety Philosophies, Specifications for fire protection systems (active \\& passive), data sheets for firefighting systems independently or with minimum supervision.


**Responsibilities:**

* Develop UFDs, P\\&IDs for the fire protection systems and perform Fire water/foam demand calculations (incl. Gas suppression system), and Firewater system Hydraulic check analysis
* Prepare Hazardous Area Classification Source release schedule and Drawings, Fire Zone drawings, Fire \\& Gas Detection Layouts, Safety \\& Fire Fighting equipment layouts, , Escape route drawings, Firefighting Nozzle coverage shadow drawings. Etc
* Participate in Process Hazard reviews and analysis including HAZOP/HAZID/SIL/Bowtie/ALARP studies (when needed) and support in Actions close\\-out
* Under minimum supervision or independently, carry out the design of Active and Passive Fire Protection packages (including preparing requisitions, datasheets, TBE, etc) and PFP schedule documents
* Support in reviewing/consolidating comments and coordinating third party studies, including FERA, dispersion analysis, EERA, ESSA, QRA studies, etc. (not limited to)
* Support preparation of TBE and vendor document reviews for Mechanical/Electrical/Instrument packages on safety / HFE aspects
* Provide inputs, including Human Factors Engineering, for projects as required
* Interface/coordinate with other Engineering disciplines to resolve technical matters related to safety aspects \\& with Designers and provide inputs for safety layout preparations for projects as required

**Required Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in chemical engineering or related field
* 4 years HSE Engineering experience (Process Safety/Risk Analysis/Loss Prevention Engineering), with average experience ranging from 6\\-10 years in the Hydrocarbon industry
* LNG facilities experience in design projects is required
* Strong knowledge of International Codes and Standards, Regulatory codes and standards (DNV/ ABSNFPA) and the ability to influence designs to achieve optimal HSE outcomes
* Familiar with plot plan reviews, HAZID, HAZOP, SIL classification/ verification and other safety reviews (e.g.SIMOPS, ALARP)
* Good working knowledge of PIPENET, Flaresim \\& other consequence modelling software such as DNV PHAST etc
* Need to be a good team engineer and have proactive inter\\-discipline communication skills

**Decarbonization – Energy Transition – Sustainability**
========================================================

title: AI Operations Engineer
description:
### **About BukuWarung**


BukuWarung’s vision is to empower 60mn MSMEs in Indonesia to become financially aware and enable them to manage and grow their business using our technology platform from bookkeeping and digital payments to AI\\-driven merchant operations.


As part of our next growth phase, we are expanding our **AI Platform and Operations** function to build scalable, intelligent systems that accelerate product development, automate operations, and make infrastructure self\\-optimizing.


We are looking for an **AI Engineer (AI Operations Engineer)** who can bridge the gap between **AI product development** and **infrastructure management** designing, deploying, and maintaining AI systems that power both internal tools and production workloads.

### **Key Responsibilities**

#### **1\\) AI Product Development**

* Design, train, and deploy machine learning or LLM\\-based models that solve core operational and product problems (e.g., anomaly detection, classification, forecasting, and conversational AI).
* Build modular APIs and microservices for inference, data processing, and automation.
* Collaborate with product teams to prototype, test, and iterate on AI\\-first user experiences.
* Convert experimental notebooks into production\\-grade pipelines and scalable services.

#### **2\\) AI Infrastructure \\& Reliability**

* Design and maintain scalable ML infrastructure across training, deployment, and monitoring workflows.
* Build CI/CD pipelines for model delivery, manage containerized inference systems, and ensure production reliability.
* Implement observability for AI models tracking drift, latency, performance, and cost.
* Collaborate with DevOps and platform engineering to optimize compute utilization, GPU scheduling, and cost management.

#### **3\\) Automation \\& AIOps**

* Automate workflows for model retraining, deployment, and validation.
* Build systems for intelligent alerting, anomaly detection, and auto\\-remediation of AI services.
* Integrate AI pipelines into existing DevOps and monitoring tools for proactive issue management.

#### **4\\) Data Pipeline \\& Tooling**

* Develop robust data ingestion and processing pipelines (structured/unstructured).
* Manage feature stores, vector databases, and embeddings pipelines for retrieval\\-augmented generation (RAG) systems.
* Build internal developer tools and utilities for faster experimentation and monitoring.

#### **5\\) Collaboration \\& Governance**

* Partner closely with AI researchers, backend engineers, and product managers to translate business needs into reliable AI systems.
* Contribute to MLOps best practices, documentation, and standardization.
* Ensure compliance with BukuWarung’s data security, audit, and ethical AI frameworks.

### **Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in backend or ML engineering roles
* Strong programming skills in Python (FastAPI, Flask) and familiarity with microservice design
* Experience deploying and monitoring ML/LLM workloads in production (batch and real\\-time)
* Proficiency with:
	+ ML/AI frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, LangChain)
	+ Infrastructure tools (Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Airflow)
	+ Cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, or Azure)
	+ Observability stack (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, OpenTelemetry
* Experience managing GPU\\-based workloads and cost optimization
* Excellent problem\\-solving, debugging, and automation skills
* Familiarity with vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, FAISS) and RAG pipeline architecture

### **Preferred Experience**

* Built and deployed AI\\-powered automation systems or developer tools
* Experience with LLM fine\\-tuning, embedding generation, or prompt engineering
* Exposure to distributed systems and scalable API design
* Understanding of data governance, security, and compliance in AI workflows
* Previous experience in fintech, SaaS, or infrastructure\\-heavy products

title: Line Coordinator
description:
Be a part of a revolutionary change

  

At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business and building our future on one clear purpose – to deliver a smoke\\-free future.

  

With huge change, comes huge opportunity. So, wherever you join us, you’ll enjoy the freedom to dream up and deliver better, brighter solutions and the space to move your career forward in endlessly different directions.

  

Wherever you join our crucial 47,000\\-strong Operations team, you’ll have the opportunity to make an impact. PMI’s shift from selling cigarettes to our new smoke\\-free products has changed the way we work. New products bring new challenges – in the way we source and buy raw materials, in the way we engineer and manufacture, and in our supply chain planning.

  

Bring us your curiosity and a desire to challenge the everyday and we’ll give you lots of responsibility. You’ll help us improve, inject innovation and create new ways of working. You’ll be solving supply chain problems that span the whole world: a smoke\\-free world.

  

Your ‘day to day'

* Ensure compliance to all PMI and legal standards, policies and guidelines related to Environment, Health, Safety, Sustainability to prevent personnel, asset or societal loss.
* Act and promote an interdependent and transparent safety culture fostering the utilization of preventive/predictive approach in line with Open\\+/IOS
* Ensures compliance to all PMI and Legal standards and guidelines related to Quality of incoming materials, SFGs and FGs in line with the QMS.
* Oversight that the processes of DMS (BOS, QBos, CL and CIL etc) are completed on time and with the highest quality of execution, assuring the respect of the standards
* Activate actions on the shifts to comply with quality of the product, involving the main stakeholders
* Ensure the highest internal and external consumers satisfaction, through Open\\+/IOS tools.
* Ensure accurate input of all necessary operating data from the production floor (PLC, MES, LES, MPA, MINT, SPA, etc.) in order to guarantee data integrity
* Guarantee production plan shift adherence maximizing the perfomance of the line(s) and consumer service level operating on the production line in case of need.
* Lead/participate to DDS execution and decision making process
* Coach/lead the shift daily direction setting, retrieve stops/MTBF from reporting systems, identifying the major causes of losses and establishing with the team a daily plan to improve performance.
* Support planned activities, namely preparation and follow\\-up of shift planned stops and change overs execution.
* Ensure continuous and reliable operation of equipment, accurate adjustment and fix the minor quality and operational troubles in order to achieve/exceed the planned volume.
* Ensure continuous and efficient operation of the technology in case of need, supporting digital solutions implementation.
* Lead team members in order to secure effective coverage on the production line
* Coordinate the execution of the required maintenance checks to ensure equipment basic condition.
* Follow\\-up on effective execution of DMS, ensuring a proper coordination with maintenance lead, members of autonomous/self sufficient team to fix defects and execute maintenance routines.
* Support Process Lead on data integrity and reports preparation about production losses.
* Ensure a proper handover between shifts, supporting team members on is execution
* Coach the autonomous/self sufficient team members guaranteeing cross functional training plan
* Develop capabilities and follow the professional growth of the team, providing regular feedback in coaching session
* Effectively motivate the team to achieve the assigned line(s) business results.
* Provide all relevant information for the smooth running of production in/between teams, as well as to the support group and project managers in order to ensure optimal monitoring of the problems encountered and to share experiences and knowledge in order to continually increase competences and expertise.
* Complete the necessary forms and make timely data entry into the information systems to ensure product traceability and equipment intervention.
* Take responsibility for the completion of own and team training and development plan and comply with the established requirements.
* Implement Standard work process defined in Pillars (AM steps, quality factor, problem solving SWP, etc)
* Ensure self and team capabilities based on QM. Own and cover the crew leader role. Promote and develop equipment ownership within the team.

 **WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR**

* Minimum High School Degree with Technical background
* Overall Experience: 3\\-5 years experience in Manufacturing:
* Specific Experience: 2 years on maintaining or operating equipment
* Knowledge production systems MES, MPA, SPA
* Knowledge of SAP, MINT, etc. will be an advantage
* Basic user skills of work with MS Office package: Excel, PowerPoint.
* Knowledge and skills in applying lean production tools

  

What we offer

  

Our success depends on our talented employees who come to work here every single day with a sense of purpose and an appetite for progress. Join PMI and you too can:

* Seize the freedom to define your future and ours. We’ll empower you to take risks, experiment and explore.
* Be part of an inclusive, diverse culture, where everyone’s contribution is respected; collaborate with some of the world’s best people and feel like you belong.
* Pursue your ambitions and develop your skills with a global business – our staggering size and scale provides endless opportunities to progress.
* Take pride in delivering our promise to society: to deliver a smoke\\-free future.

  

To join our growing team…

title: Web Scraper / Data Engineer
description:
**Web Scraper / Data Engineer**  

**Location: Remote**  

**Job Type: Full\\-time**  

  

**About STERRY**  

At STERRY, we’re not your average Growth Marketing Agency—we’re the rocket fuel behind crowdfunding and e\\-commerce success. Since day one, we’ve helped clients pull in over $100 million in trackable online revenue. * Attention to detail and ability to deliver clean, well\\-documented code

**What We Offer*** Flexible working hours (remote\\-first)

description:

Will work within defined parameters to make decisions, apply concepts to issues of great complexity, and resolve issues through immediate action or short\\-term planning at customer power generating facilities. * Manage, perform, coordinate the management of HD Gas Turbine site activities

May be assigned other duties to help proactively drive our Sulzer vision and align with our organization’s core values.

* Minimum Diploma degree in Engineer majoring in Mechanical or Electrical
* Relevant experience of minimum 15 years of working on Outage of Heavy\\-Duty Gas Turbine. Or came from customer power plant experience
* Ability to read and comprehend engineering drawings and data

* Strong technical competence in reading and interpreting electrical/mechanical flow and instrument diagrams dial and laser alignment and thermal growth equipment
* Possess General Knowledge of mechanical and overall Heavy Duty Gas Turbine maintenance. Familiar with tools, hand tools, and special tools.
* Familiar with technical drawing, symbols and legend, P\\&ID diagram.
* Familiar with safety code and procedure for startup and commissioning
* Achievement Orientation, communication for result, teamwork, active learning, business awareness, problem solving and analytical thinking

  



If you’re qualified with proven expertise in developing professional strategies and driving continuous improvement in Field Service, take the next step and make the most of your expertise and skills  


**This role is available in Purwakarta, Indonesia.**  


**Have a question about the role?**

Reach out to mariana.mariana@sulzer.com  



We are looking forward to hearing from you!

title: IT Quality Assurance (Q A ) Automation
description:
**Job Summary**A Quality Assurance Engineer with 1\\-5 years of experience is needed to contribute to the testing and quality management processes in a dynamic and collaborative environment. The role requires strong technical skills, proficiency in QA/TE/SDET, and a keen eye for detail. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing test plans, performing manual and automated testing, identifying defects, and ensuring that products meet both business and technical requirements. In addition to testing, the role involves performance testing and working closely with cross\\-functional teams to ensure product quality throughout the development lifecycle.  
**Requirement**

* Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Computer Science, Informatics) or equivalent. Open to non\\-engineering backgrounds with strong technical expertise.
* 1\\-5 years of experience in QA/TE/SDET or a similar field
* Strong technical and programming skills
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills
* Proficiency in quality management software (e.g., Jira)
* Strong attention to detail and accuracy
* Effective communication and teamwork skills

**Qualifications**

* **Testing Skills**: Knowledge of testing types (Smoke, Regression, Sanity), testing techniques (Decision Table, Black Box, etc), and bug management.
* **Programming**: Familiarity with basic programming concepts (variables, data structures, functions, and async programming) in one or more languages such as **JavaScript**, **Java**, **Python**, or similar.
* **Automation Frameworks**: Experience with one or more frameworks like **Cypress, WebdriverIO**, **Appium**, or **k6** for API and web automation, Mobile Automation.
* **Software Tools**: Basic Git, Linux, SQL, and understanding of REST APIs.

**Key ResponsibilitiesTesting Domain**

* Develop and document test plans, test cases, and test strategies.
* Execute manual and automated tests (regression, integration, UAT, system, etc.).
* Identify, log, and track defects in defect tracking systems (e.g., Jira).
* Ensure comprehensive test coverage and measure effectiveness.
* Monitor and report key test metrics (pass/fail rates, defect density, etc.).
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams (e.g., development, product).

**Product Analysis**

* Review product specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria.
* Conduct risk\\-based testing to prioritize critical product areas.
* Perform usability testing to identify UI/UX issues.
* Validate product features against business requirements.
* Track product versions and ensure feature testing aligns with release stages.

**Technical Analysis**

* Perform performance testing to identify and resolve bottlenecks.
* Evaluate scalability by testing system performance under load.
* Test APIs and integrations to ensure system interoperability.

**Automation Testing**

* Develop and maintain test automation (e.g., Cypress, etc.).
* Write, execute, and maintain automated test scripts.
* Generate and analyze detailed test reports.
* Update and maintain automation scripts based on product changes.
* Contribute to the test automation strategy and prioritize which tests to automate.

title: Observability Engineer [NOC] - ID (Ref: 25-085)
description:
We are seeking a NOC Observability Engineer to Join our SiteOps team for monitoring our systems and applications. In this role, you will be responsible for the optimal performance and availability of Dropsuite's cloud and private infrastructure through active 24x7 monitoring of the infrastructure and performing surveillance of our computer systems, applications, and related networks \\& security.  



This role involves actively monitoring systems, identifying \\& resolving issues in the capacity of a Level 1 engineer, and providing timely response \\& escalation of all incidents, outages, and performance alerts.  



**Work Arrangement**

* Full\\-time position
* Onsite work model (5 days per week in the office on a shift basis)
Eligible to reside and work in Bandung (Indonesian citizenship only)  
* 

*This position is open exclusively to candidates who reside in and are authorised to work in* ***Indonesia.*** *Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.*

**Key Accountabilities**

* Monitoring the performance and availability of Dropsuite’s Saas products on the cloud which includes compute, applications, networks, security, and all other elements via our observability platform.
* Monitor our internal endpoints, ensure compliance with our security policies and practices, identify potential security threats, and collaborate with the security team to implement necessary measures.
* Perform regular health checks on all our infrastructure.
* Proactively responds to all alarms and alerts and determines whether triggered alerts warrant further investigation and verification.
* Performs first\\-level troubleshooting.
* Investigate and escalate alerts triggered to the respective escalation stakeholders for Level 2 support.
* Understand and follow steps as prescribed by internal processes
* Promptly communicate incident status and update respective parties.
* Make end\\-to\\-end follow\\-ups with respective escalation stakeholders.
* Responsible to create and track trouble tickets to closure.
* Participate in incident management processes, prioritize incidents based on severity, and ensure timely incident resolution within defined SLAs.
* Provide status updates and reports on all our system performance, uptime, incident statistics, and other relevant metrics to stakeholders.
* Stay updated with emerging network technologies, industry trends, and best practices through continuous learning and professional development.
* Contribute to process improvements within the NOC environment to enhance operational efficiency.
* Provide technical support and guidance to other cross\\-functional teams as needed.
Tracking and documenting systems \\& applications issues and compiling incident reports.  
* 

**Qualifications and Competencies**

* Diploma or Degree in computer science or a related field.
* Minimum 3 years of experience in an established IT helpdesk/ Technical Support / NOC environment.
* Humble and curious attitude: you are keen to understand how things work.
* Knowledge of cloud infrastructure such as AWS and/or GCP.
* Knowledge of monitoring systems such as Datadog, Grafana, Zabbix, etc.
* Strong problem\\-solving, troubleshooting, and system analysis mindset.
* Know when to escalate or ask for help vs having to own and resolve the issue in isolation.
* Prior experience in a service provider data center is an advantage.
* Strong sense of accountability and urgency.
* Ability to work on rotational shifts and flexible hours.
* Clear communicator, confident, self\\-sufficient, focused, and determined.
* Knowledge of technology architecture for large\\-scale systems is a plus.
* Has a software development background or operations/infrastructure.
* Open and candid about discussing solutions, problems, and improvements.
* Has a passion for SRE principles and their adoption, to steer promised reliability, performance, and security of the applications, services, and systems.
A fan of the DevOps approach, promoting a loosely coupled, heavily automated, and constantly monitored distributed system.  
* 

**Why Join Us**  

At Dropsuite, now proudly part of NinjaOne, we are on a mission to safeguard business information and help businesses stay in business. We are a global, fast\\-growing, partner\\-centric company building secure, scalable, and highly usable cloud backup technologies for businesses of all sizes. Today, we perform billions of backups daily for organizations across more than 100 countries.  



As we enter an exciting new chapter with NinjaOne—a leader in endpoint management, security, and IT automation—our combined strengths enable us to drive even greater impact, innovation, and global scale. Together, we are building a world\\-class platform that empowers IT teams with simplicity, performance, and reliability.  



At our core, we are a team of hungry owners: we are tenacious in our pursuit of excellence and take full ownership in everything we do. We are deeply customer\\-focused, collaborative, and solutions\\-driven. We play as a team—respecting, supporting, and elevating one another every step of the way.  



Join us as we shape the future of IT and data protection—powered by passion, purpose, and the spirit of ownership.  



**Rewards That Go Beyond**

* Competitive compensation
* Health insurance for you and your dependents
* Social Security (BPJS Ketenagakerjaan)
* Hybrid work model
* 12 Days of Annual Leave
* Entitled to Indonesia Public Holidays
* Other leave benefits, such as Wedding leave
* Free lunches in office
* Growth opportunities
Work in a global company with meaningful work, highly skilled colleagues and an amazing culture  
* 

**Diversity and Inclusion Statement**  

Dropsuite is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status.  



As part of our recruitment process, we may collect personal data to support hiring\\-related activities such as screening, assessment, and communication. This information is collected solely for recruitment purposes and handled in accordance with applicable data protection and privacy regulations. Your data will be treated with strict confidentiality and used only to facilitate your application with us.  



**Your Career Growth Starts Here. Apply Now!**

title: Full Stack Software Engineer (Healthcare Focus)
description:
Position: Full\\-Stack Software Engineer **(Healthcare Focus)**

Language Requirement: English/Chinese (Fluent)

**Job Description**:

We are seeking an experienced Full\\-Stack Software Engineer with specialized expertise in healthcare technology to join our team in Indonesia. The ideal candidate will possess 5\\-8 years of professional engineering experience with a consistent background in healthcare\\-related software development. Candidates with sustained experience in the healthcare industry are highly preferred. You will play a critical role in developing and integrating solutions that directly impact healthcare delivery and data interoperability.

**Key Responsibilities:**

· Design and implement healthcare system integrations using HL7, FHIR, and Web Services standards

· Develop and maintain systems for healthcare data exchange and interoperability

· Design, develop, and maintain scalable healthcare software applications

· Build and optimize features across both front\\-end and back\\-end systems

· Travel flexibility to partner hospitals across Indonesia as needed for system implementation and support

· Collaborate with healthcare professionals and cross\\-functional teams to deliver compliant, robust solutions

· Ensure systems meet healthcare industry standards and compliance requirements

· Conduct code reviews, write unit tests, and maintain healthcare\\-grade code quality

· Troubleshoot and optimize system performance with focus on healthcare data security

**Requirements:**

· Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or related field

· 5\\-8 years of hands\\-on experience in full\\-stack development

· Proven track record in **healthcare software development and system integration**

· Extensive experience with healthcare data standards: **HL7, FHIR, and Web Services**

· Deep understanding of healthcare system workflows and data structures

· Willingness and ability to travel to partner hospitals across Indonesia as required

· **Proficiency in front\\-end technologies** (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular)

· Strong back\\-end development skills **(Python required)**

· Experience with **healthcare\\-compatible databases (PostgreSQL preferred)**

· Hands\\-on experience with **cloud platform**s (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud)

· Familiarity with **version control systems (Git)**

· Fluent in English with excellent communication skills

**Highly Valued Qualifications:**

· Consistent career history in healthcare technology companies or projects

· Experience working with electronic health records (EHR) systems

· Knowledge of healthcare compliance requirements and security standards

· Experience with healthcare API development and microservices architecture

· Understanding of clinical workflows and healthcare data management

· Experience with DevOps in healthcare environments

· Familiarity with containerization in healthcare contexts (Docker, Kubernetes)

**Why Join Us:**

· Opportunity to make a meaningful impact in healthcare technology

· Work with an international team of healthcare technology experts

· Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package

· Professional growth in the rapidly expanding digital health sector

· Collaborative environment at the forefront of healthcare innovation

· Chance to work directly with healthcare providers across Indonesia

Job Type: Full\\-time

Application Question(s):

* How many years of working experience do you have in the healthcare industry?
* Are you familiar with these healthcare data standards: HL7, FHIR, and Web Services?
* Are you proficient using these front\\-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular)?
* Do you have a strong skill in using Phyton?
* Do you have a strong skill in using PostgreSQL?
* Do you have a hands\\-on experience with Cloud Platforms? (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud)
* Are you familiar with version control system (Git)?

title: iOS Engineer
description:
**Who are we?**  

Amar Bank is one of the most technologically advanced digital banks in Indonesia. Our leading
digital lending product, Tunaiku has the distinction of being the first FinTech product in
Indonesia. We are also the first digital bank on the cloud. As the first profitable digital bank, we
managed to get listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange. **How did we manage to do that?**  

We are changing people’s perception of a bank. We believe we are the innovators who combine
customer focus principles with creating technology\\-based impact. We incorporate freedom and
flexibility as part of our startup working culture DNA to encourage innovation in creating better
financial solutions for the banking industry. We think of ourselves as, ‘A technology company
with a banking license’. For this reason, we ‘Act like a FinTech, and think like a Bank.’ **How did it all start?**  

Founded on March 15, 1991, in Surabaya as PT Anglomas International Bank (Amin Bank), the
bank was acquired by Tolaram Group and transformed to PT Bank Amar Indonesia (Amar Bank)
in 2014\\. It has then undergone a significant digital transformation to become one of the
country's forerunning fintech institutions through its award\\-winning digital lending platform,
Tunaiku. **Our philosophy, mission, and vision**  

Technology must impact lives, must improve lives. We exist to provide banking to those who
‘need’ and not only to those who ‘want’. Services when provided to those who need at the time
of their need brings smiles. Our vision is to bring 200 million smiles. **More about the bank with startup culture environment**  

Consist of 1000\\+ people, you will meet people who love to grow, dream big, and actually have
fun at the workplace! We provide a great working environment that pushes people to grow
outside their comfort zone. People with high drive and ambition find us a very attractive place to
work as their career growth matches their own drive and not any staid policies. Thus we hold
the honor of being awarded “Best Place to Work in Indonesia”.  

Recently Amar Bank was awarded as Inspirational Brand from APEA (Asia Pacific Enterprise
Awards) 2022\\. Of course, our innovation won't stop here. So if you would love to be a part of it,
have a growth mindset, and are constantly hungry for challenges, we invite you to join us in our
journey to ‘Impact Lives’. **Join us today and create \\#unlimitedinnovations!**
### **Responsibilities**

* Develop, maintain, and improve iOS applications with a strong focus on performance, usability, and scalability following existing company design patterns, architecture, and guidelines.
* Collaborate with designers to ensure technical feasibility and a smooth user experience.
* Collaborate with backend services and APIs efficiently and securely.
* Ensure application performance, responsiveness, and stability across devices and OS versions.
* Write clean, maintainable, and testable code with attention to scalability and reliability.
* Identify and fix bugs, optimize performance, and improve application architecture.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest iOS technologies and development trends.

### **Requirements**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
* Strong understanding of Swift fundamentals.
* 3 \\- 4 years of experience in iOS development.
* Solid understanding of **UIKit**, **SwiftUI**, and **Combine** or other reactive programming frameworks.
* Experience with RESTful APIs, and dependency injection
* Exposure to **Firebase**, **Crashlytics**, or **Analytics SDKs**.
* Familiarity with version control (Git) and CI/CD processes.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work independently in a fast\\-paced environment.
* Experience in modular app architecture or multi\\-module projects is a plus.

### **Bonus Point If**

* Speaking English fluently
* Contributions to open\\-source projects (A link to GitHub profile)
* Experienced in domain\\-driven or high\\-volume transaction development
* Have knowledge and experience in mobile iOS development


We exist to innovate and maintain the architecture of Amar Bank's products. As part of our main focus to create through technology we ensure the process and technology we use helps maintain and build human connection at scale.  

It’s our job to plan, monitor, and control the technology growth so we can provide a faster, more convenient, and more efficient way of performing business transactions.

We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

title: Android Engineer (Flutter)
description:
**About the Role**
------------------


We’re looking for a Android Engineer to build fast, reliable, and maintainable applications used daily in our electric mobility and battery\\-swap ecosystem. You will ship features end\\-to\\-end using Flutter across Android, iOS, and Web — ensuring great experience, high performance, and scalability as we grow.

**What You Will Do**
--------------------

* Build and ship end\\-to\\-end product features in Flutter for Android, iOS, and Web.
* Translate product requirements into production\\-ready UI/UX flows, reusable widgets, and clean architecture.
* Implement state management, data fetching, and API integrations (REST/GraphQL/WebSockets).
* Own app performance and reliability through profiling and proactive optimization.
* Collaborate closely with Product, Design, Backend, and QA to ensure seamless delivery.
* Maintain code quality via reviews, testing, and CI/CD best practices (feature flags, safe rollout).
* Monitor app health using Firebase tools (Crashlytics, Performance, Analytics) and iterate continuously.
* Contribute to and expand Flutter Design System (component library, theming) for consistency across products.

**What You Bring**
------------------

### **Experience**

* 5\\+ years developing production\\-scale apps; 3\\+ years hands\\-on with Flutter/Dart.
* Demonstrated success delivering features across multiple platforms (Android, iOS, Web).
* Experience with other frontend frameworks (React Native/React/Next.js) and Android native (Kotlin) is a strong plus.

### **Skills**

* Strong in state management patterns (Bloc/Cubit, Riverpod, Provider, etc.).
* Skilled in API integration using Dio/Retrofit/http with robust error handling and caching.
* Solid UI/UX execution: responsive layouts, animations, accessibility, theming.
* CI/CD awareness (GitHub Actions) and release workflows (multi\\-flavor, environment configs).
* Firebase knowledge: Auth, Firestore, Crashlytics, Performance, Analytics, Remote Config.
* Competent with Flutter DevTools for performance/memory/network debugging.
* Strong communication and teamwork with cross\\-functional partners.

**Nice to Have**
----------------

* Experience building or maintaining a Flutter Design System (design tokens, reusable components).
* Knowledge of Flutter Web deployment nuances (routing, asset optimization, web constraints).
* Comfortable using AI\\-driven tooling to improve developer productivity (assistants, auto\\-tests, code suggestions).

title: Civil Engineer
description:
Siegwerk is one of the world’s leading suppliers of Printing Inks and sustainable packaging solutions. A career here will give you significant **flexibility** and **support** in a company focused on making a **positive impact** in the world. Siegwerk is poised to disrupt the global packaging industry; changing the way packaging is produced and consumed for the benefit of us all. At Siegwerk, you will have everything you need to help make that change.

**Location : Tangerang****Indonesia**

  

Join us, let’s **Do it. With Heart.**

 **Key Responsibilities**

**Site Management \\& Supervision**

* **Direct On\\-Site Supervision:** Oversee and manage all daily civil construction activities, including earthworks, foundations, structural works (e.g., concrete, steel), paving, drainage, and utilities installation.
* **Quality Assurance/Control (QA/QC):** Conduct regular, detailed inspections of work in progress to ensure materials, workmanship, and construction procedures strictly adhere to approved design specifications, project standards, and local building codes.
* **Safety Enforcement:** Champion the project's safety culture. Ensure all workers and subcontractors comply with health, safety, and environmental (HSE) regulations and site\\-specific safety plans. Conduct daily safety briefings and hazard identification.
* **Progress Monitoring:** Track and report on the daily and weekly progress of construction activities against the project schedule. Identify potential delays and proactively implement corrective actions.

**Technical \\& Coordination**

* **Drawing \\& Specification Interpretation:** Serve as the on\\-site expert for interpreting complex engineering drawings, blueprints, and project specifications. Resolve any technical queries or discrepancies that arise in the field.
* **Resource Coordination:** Coordinate labor, equipment, and material deliveries to maximize site efficiency and productivity. Manage and optimize the use of construction resources.
* **Stakeholder Liaison:** Act as the primary technical point of contact for subcontractors, vendors, and third\\-party inspectors/consultants.
* **Problem\\-Solving:** Rapidly identify, analyze, and resolve technical and logistical issues that impact construction progress.

**Documentation \\& Reporting**

* **Documentation:** Maintain meticulous on\\-site records, including daily site diaries, progress photos, inspection reports, material test results, and non\\-conformance reports (NCRs).
* **Reporting:** Prepare and submit clear, concise daily and weekly progress reports to the Project Manager, highlighting accomplishments, upcoming tasks, and any critical issues (e.g., safety, quality, schedule).

**Qualifications and Experience**

* **Education:** Bachelor’s Degree in **Civil Engineering** from a recognized university.
* **Experience:** **Minimum of 10 years of progressive experience** in civil engineering and construction,
* **Technical Skills:**
* + Profound understanding of construction methods, materials, and quality assurance procedures for various civil works.
	+ Proven ability to read, interpret, and implement complex construction drawings and specifications.
	+ Knowledge of relevant local and international building codes, safety regulations, and construction standards.
* **Essential Skills:**
* + **Strong Leadership and Team Management** abilities.
	+ Excellent written and verbal **communication** and **conflict resolution** skills.
	+ Proficiency in project management and reporting tools (e.g., MS Project, Excel, AutoCAD).


For more information please contact : via email on namiraprisar.kinanti@siegwerk.com

 **Are you interested ?**


Should you have any further questions, Kinanti, NamiraPrisar looks forward to your call! You can reach her via email on namiraprisar.kinanti@siegwerk.com/ Mobile 085814112705

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
The Senior Data Scientist role presents a strategic opportunity to drive innovation and data\\-driven decision\\-making across the organization. This position is pivotal in transforming complex data into actionable insights, enabling smarter business strategies and enhancing customer experiences. By leveraging advanced analytics, machine learning, and AI technologies, the successful candidate will contribute to the development of scalable solutions that align with our mission of delivering ethical, efficient, and personalized financial services.


This role is critical for enabling scalable analytics, machine learning workflows, and data\\-driven decision\\-making across the organization. You will collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and product teams to ensure data quality, accessibility, and reliability.


**Position Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate with Data engineers and IT Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) to understand source data and utilize large datasets to prepare and optimize data for building Generative AI solutions using Open AI services to enhance our products and services and scaling it globally.
* Develop and implement advanced machine learning models to address complex business challenges, leveraging various algorithms and techniques, with a specific emphasis on utilizing Open AI services for building Generative AI solutions.
* Work closely with partners to gather requirements, design data models, and implement tailored solutions.
* Standardize processes, techniques, and tools into best practices for other data scientists.
* Drive the adoption of data and AI driven solutions by influencing and partnering with key stakeholders.
* Innovate and explore creative methods to source and utilize structured and unstructured data for building data and AI driven solutions. Stay updated on industry trends and advancements in AI/ML, with a specific focus on leveraging OpenAI services to continuously enhance our products and services and scaling efforts.

**Required Qualifications:**

* An advanced degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, Statistics, or another quantitative field.
* Minimum of 5 years of experience utilizing data science to solve high\\-impact business problems, with a specific recent focus on building Generative AI applications. (Banking,Insurance,Fintech/Financial services preferred but not limited)
* Proficiency in statistical analysis, machine learning, and data manipulation techniques, particularly in the context of understanding customers and scaling globally.
* Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, R, or SQL, with experience in prompt engineering and relevant packages like LangChain, LangGraph, AutoGen, Llamaindex and more.
* Practical experience with big data processing frameworks and platforms such as Azure, Databricks, Spark, with a focus on leveraging these technologies for building and scaling Generative AI solutions using Open AI services.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Excellent communication skills – able to translate sophisticated data science concepts to technical and non\\-technical partners, specifically within the context of building Generative AI solutions using Open AI services and scaling across Asia.
* Track record of implementing AI solutions into production with tangible business value, particularly related to Generative AI solutions. Eg. Chatbot, sales talking points, product comparisons

***When you join our team:***

* We’ll empower you to learn and grow the career you want.
* We’ll recognize and support you in a flexible environment where well\\-being and inclusion are more than just words.
* As part of our global team, we’ll support you in shaping the future you want to see.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
At Jabil we strive to make ANYTHING POSSIBLE and EVERYTHING BETTER. We are proud to be a trusted partner for the world's top brands, offering comprehensive engineering, manufacturing, and supply chain solutions. With over 50 years of experience across industries and a vast network of over 100 sites worldwide, Jabil combines global reach with local expertise to deliver both scalable and customized solutions. Our commitment extends beyond business success as we strive to build sustainable processes that minimize environmental impact and foster vibrant and diverse communities around the globe.  

**SUMMARY**  

Results\\-driven Quality Assurance Engineer with strong experience in internal audit (process and product) and supplier audit is an advantage. Skilled in managing engineering changes (ECN, PCN, MCN), conducting defect analysis, and leading CAPA/PICA activities to ensure product reliability and compliance. Demonstrates solid negotiation, analytical, and problem\\-solving skills to enhance overall manufacturing and supplier performance while maintaining adherence to safety and company quality standards.  



**ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES**

* Perform line (process) and product audits to verify adherence to quality procedures and product specifications
* Conduct supplier audits and assessments to ensure compliance with quality standards and supplier capability requirements.
* Conduct and follow up on CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) and PICA (Product Improvement Corrective Action) audits to ensure effective problem resolution.
* Manage and control engineering changes (ECN – Engineering Change Notice, PCN – Process Change Notice, MCN – Material Change Notice) to ensure proper documentation, validation, and implementation.
* Ensure capability studies are performed on critical processes to maintain process stability and capability.
* Perform First Article Inspection (FAI) and review visual aids to confirm conformance to design and customer requirements.
* Conduct defect analysis reporting to identify root causes and implement corrective actions.
* Perform MRB (Material Review Board) activities on sustained products, ensuring proper disposition and documentation of nonconforming materials.
* Participate in CAC (Corrective Action Committee) or continuous improvement meetings to support ongoing quality enhancement efforts.
* Assist Quality Engineering in APQP (Advanced Product Quality Planning) activities and documentation.

**MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS**

* Bachelor's degree in Technical/Engineering fields.
* At least 4\\-5 years of working experience as a Auditor in the Aerospace or Automotive industries.
* Experience in conducting quality audits to assess compliance with established standards and identify areas for improvement.
* Experience in quality assurance, with experience in quality control roles, including knowledge of measuring equipment and blueprint reading.
* Experience in Supplier Quality is an advantage, ability to manage and assess the quality of suppliers and their products, ensuring they meet the required standards.
* Experience in the machining process, especially in a shop\\-floor\\-based quality role, is highly valued.
* Ability to use statistical tools and techniques to analyze data, identify trends, and drive quality improvements.
* Good in negotiation skill and communication skills (in Bahasa and English)
* Understanding of Quality Management Systems like ISO 9001 (AS9100 is an advantage
Certifications like an Internal auditor or related to the Quality field can be beneficial.  
* 

BE AWARE OF FRAUD: When applying for a job at Jabil you will be contacted via correspondence through our official job portal with a jabil.com e\\-mail address; direct phone call from a member of the Jabil team; or direct e\\-mail with a jabil.com e\\-mail address. Jabil does not request payments for interviews or at any other point during the hiring process. Jabil will not ask for your personal identifying information such as a social security number, birth certificate, financial institution, driver’s license number or passport information over the phone or via e\\-mail. If you believe you are a victim of identity theft, contact your local police department. Any scam job listings should be reported to whatever website it was posted in.
**Jabil, including its subsidiaries, is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.**

**Accessibility Accommodation**
===============================

If you are a qualified individual with a disability, you have the right to request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access Jabil.com/Careers site as a result of your disability. You can request a reasonable accommodation by sending an e\\-mail to Always\\_Accessible@Jabil.com with the nature of your request and contact information. Please do not direct any other general employment related questions to this e\\-mail. Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to.

description:
**Job Description:**

As a Layer 1 NOC Engineer, you will be responsible for monitoring, identifying, and performing initial troubleshooting of network and server infrastructure issues, initial diagnostics such as ping, traceroute, and port checks, and escalate unresolved issues to higher\\-tier teams with clear documentation.

This role serves as the first line of defense to ensure service uptime and smooth network operations.

**Qualifications:**

* Minimum Diploma's degree in System Information or similiar fields.
* Familiarity with routers, switches, firewalls, and servers.
* Understanding of data center and cloud fundamentals.
* Ability to identify, isolate, and escalate connectivity issues.
* Perform initial diagnostics such as ping, traceroute, and port checks.
* Escalate unresolved issues to higher\\-tier teams with clear documentation.
* Knowledge of IP addressing, DNS, DHCP, routing, and switching concepts.
* Awareness of internet protocols (HTTP/HTTPS, TCP/IP, etc.).
* Familiarity with Cisco Meraki products and dashboard management.
* Experience with monitoring tools (e.g., SolarWinds, Zabbix, Grafana or similar).
* Experience and able to troubleshoot on the wireless network infrastructure issues
* Strong communication and analytical skills.
* **Willing to work in shift system**
* **Willing to work in Bogor, West Java**
* **Can join as soon as possible**

title: Data & AI Presales Consultant (Indonesia)
description:
Job Function: Sales The role:

Are you ready to architect transformative data and AI solutions?  

Do you thrive on turning complex information into business advantage?  

Would you like to work with cutting\\-edge cloud technologies to unlock insights for our organisation?  

You’ll join our **Data \\& Analytics team**, partnering with business stakeholders across the organisation to drive innovation in how we collect, model and act on information.  

As the Solution Architect for Data \\& AI, you play a pivotal part in shaping how our business harnesses its data. You design and build the blueprint for our analytics and generative\\-AI capabilities on the AWS platform so that teams can make better decisions, solve complex problems and deliver value. **What You’ll Do:*** Design end\\-to\\-end analytics and AI solutions: Work with stakeholders to gather needs, sketch the architecture and document the big picture.
* Architect on AWS: Apply your expertise with services such as Redshift, EMR, Kinesis, Glue, QuickSight and the suite of AI/ML and generative\\-AI tools to build robust, scalable platforms.
* Model and integrate data: Define clean data models and ETL patterns, bring data in from diverse sources, optimise for performance and maintain integrity.
* Ensure scale, security and performance: Build solutions that grow with us, run efficiently, protect sensitive information and meet compliance standards.
* Troubleshoot and optimise: Spot bottlenecks or quality issues, propose creative fixes and tune the environment as it runs.
* Collaborate and innovate: Partner with engineers, scientists and analysts; contribute ideas, stay up\\-to\\-date with emerging tech and help raise the bar on what our data estate can do.


What we need to see from you:
* A proven track record designing and delivering data\\-centric solutions in the cloud – you speak the language of data modelling, warehousing, ETL and governance and you’ve seen ideas through from concept into production.
* Deep familiarity with the AWS analytics and AI family (Redshift, EMR, Kinesis, Glue, QuickSight and related AI/ML/generative\\-AI offerings) and an enthusiasm for exploring new services.
* Comfort writing code and queries – you work fluently in Python and SQL (or similar languages) to manipulate, transform and interrogate data.
* Excellent problem\\-solving, communication and collaboration skills – you can translate business questions into technical designs and work effectively with both technical and non\\-technical colleagues.
* Experience working in an Agile environment, version controlling your work and adapting as priorities evolve.
* Relevant qualifications: a degree in an IT\\-related discipline or equivalent, plus current AWS certifications (Solution Architect, Data Analytics Specialty or the equivalent).


Why SoftwareOne?:  

SoftwareOne and Crayon have come together to form a global, AI\\-powered software and cloud solutions provider with a bold vision for the future. With a footprint in over 70 countries and a diverse team of 13,000\\+ professionals, we offer unparalleled opportunities for talent to grow, make an impact, and shape the future of technology. At the heart of our business is our people. We empower our teams to work across borders, innovate fearlessly, and continuously develop their skills through world\\-class learning and development programs. Whether you're passionate about cloud, software, data, AI, or building meaningful client relationships, you’ll find a place to thrive here. Join us and be part of a purpose\\-driven culture where your ideas matter, your growth is supported, and your career can go global.
Accommodations:

SoftwareOne welcomes applicants from all backgrounds and abilities to apply. If you require reasonable adjustments at any point during the recruitment process, email us at reasonable.accommodations@softwareone.com.  

Please include the role for which you are applying and your country location. Someone from our organization that is not part of the decision\\-making process will be in touch to discuss your specific needs and we will make every effort to accommodate you. Any information shared will be stored securely and treated in the strictest of confidence in line with GDPR.  

At SoftwareOne, we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. Additionally, we encourage experienced individuals that have taken an intentional career break and are now prepared to return to work to explore our SOAR program.

title: Senior Manufacturing Engineer
description:
**SENIOR MANUFACTURING ENGINEER**
=================================

**Indonesia, APAC**
-------------------

**WHO YOU’LL WORK WITH**
------------------------


As member of Footwear Manufacturing team, you will be working closely with teams across the enterprise \\- Consumer Creation, Nike Explore Team (NXT), Sourcing, Chemical Engineering, Modernization, Manufacturing Systems Engineering and our Manufacturing Partners. You will engage with leadership in Manufacturing and Engineering, as well as factory teams, to ensure the proper implementation of standardized best practices on the factory workshop floor. Additionally, you will partner with Footwear Manufacturing Systems Engineering and Manufacturing factory teams to evaluate effectiveness of global strategic initiatives and collaborate with Consumer Creation, Manufacturing Partners, and Manufacturing Systems Engineering teams to drive effective activation of advanced manufacturing capabilities.

**WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR**
--------------------------


We are seeking a Senior Manufacturing Engineer to play a crucial role within our Footwear Manufacturing and Engineering team. A robust engineering background is essential, with specific experience in footwear manufacturing being highly advantageous. You will possess strong problem\\-solving abilities, be an effective team player, and demonstrate clear communication skills. Additionally, as a senior member of the team, leadership capabilities are required to guide our factory partners. To support these qualifications, the following criteria are necessary:

* Minimum 6 years of experiences in manufacturing, footwear experiences preferably.
* Bachelor’s degrees in technical engineering, industrial and manufacturing.
* Strong influencing skills and the ability to interact effectively with others.
* Proficient communication skills in English, both written and spoken, to engage with multiple stakeholders at a high level.
* The ability to lead and mentor teams with confidence, while fostering a mastery of fundamental principles.

**WHAT YOU’LL WORK ON**
-----------------------


You will drive operational improvements, ensure product and process excellence, and support sustainable growth across Nike’s Manufacturing Partners.


Manufacturing Excellence:

* You will standardize and ensure consistent metrics at factory sites, review data, identify opportunities and validate partner plans and solutions to deliver improvements.
* You will assess the overall processes effectiveness/changes, and support implementation \\& proliferation of digital systems and tools to improve manufacturing effectiveness and performance.
* You will collaborate with Consumer Creation, Manufacturing Partners, and Manufacturing Systems Engineering teams to drive effective activation of advanced manufacturing capabilities.
* You will play a critical role to ensure Nike standards are met throughout commercialization and provide inputs to resolve issues.


Product Excellence:

* You will connect manufacturing with Consumer Creation to ensure manufacturability and process efficiency is addressed at factory sites.
* You will Drive franchise model Calibration, Standardization and Optimization initiatives across manufacturing sites.
* As part of the role, you partner with Manufacturing System Engineering and factory teams to scale foundational elements of Quality Management System (QMS), use real time data to validate effectiveness of factory QMS, identify and close gaps in factory QMS.


Sustainable Growth:

* You will assess and support new facility ramp up optimization and engineering readiness.
* Additionally, you will also support efforts to grow capacity within existing footprint and facilitate training and ensure comprehension of Nike Manufacturing Best Practices.
company_description: NIKE, Inc. is the world’s leading designer, marketer and distributor of authentic athletic footwear, apparel, equipment and accessories for a wide variety of sports and fitness activities.

title: Project Manager
description:
Project Manager
Posting Start Date: 11/4/25
Job Location (Short): Balikpapan, Kalimantan Timur, IDN, 76114
Requisition ID: 34382
Onsite or Remote: Onsite Position
**Shape the Future of Mining with Komatsu Mining Technology Solutions:** At Komatsu Mining Technology Solutions, we're not just talking about progress and innovation \\- we're making it happen. Our cutting\\-edge Modular brand solutions are powering mines worldwide, driving efficiency and sustainability in ways that seemed impossible just years ago.


X


### **The Company**

Modular Mining Systems is the global leader in mine management technology and a wholly owned subsidiary of Komatsu Ltd. Our innovative technology powers mine operations in every corner of the globe. The products we cultivate, the solutions we engineer and the service we deliver set us apart in the Mining Technology industry. We are more than a company, we’re a community of passionate, creative professionals striving toward a shared vision: to revolutionize the way the mining industry operates.


With a presence stretching from Johannesburg to Vancouver, Sydney to Lima, you are part of a global brand that supports creativity, fosters innovation and encourages you to think big, share ideas and be yourself.


### **Job Purpose**

The project manager oversees and guarantees the success of all technical projects, product deployments, and solutions at MTS Indonesia. Additionally, this role is responsible for managing the hardware services team's operations and coordinating the effective management of HSE across our people, facilities, processes, and related activities.


### **Travel Requirements**

Up to 40%


### **Job Duties and Responsibilities**

* Each day will bring new challenges and opportunities to sharpen and expand your skills. As a Project Manager at Modular, you will be responsible for:
* Leading, mentoring, and managing the Project Deployment team to optimize skills that meet current and future business demands while prioritising career growth.
* Promoting safety as our top priority by reinforcing awareness and embodying Komatsu’s SLQDC approach.
* Planning and managing projects or deployments through all phases: initiation, planning, execution, monitoring, and documentation.
* Coordinating and negotiating with internal MTS teams (regional/global) and external partners (customers, suppliers, and third parties) to ensure successful project deployment.
* Collaborating across departments to define and achieve project success criteria, including safety, quality, deliverables, schedule, and cost targets.
* Building and maintaining sustainable customer relationships and business by delivering technical support, sharing product expertise, and facilitating problem\\-solving while maximizing MTS solutions.
* Partnering with other Komatsu entities and MTS global resources to meet corporate and MTS Indonesia objectives.
* Working closely with Global EHS Managers and regional leaders to implement corporate initiatives and programs.
* Adhering to and supporting corporate project processes and reporting requirements.
* Fostering proactive collaboration and communication across Modular functions to support the achievement of the Business Plan, goals, and objectives.
* Ensuring compliance with all legislative, Modular, and customer site policies, rules, and requirements.
* Providing leadership and coordination with the HSE Team and all MTS Indonesia employees regarding Komatsu’s HSE Policy, procedures, and Cardinal Safety Rules.
* Delivering safety reports, analyses, and solutions on system status and internal compliance to relevant stakeholders.
* Assisting with incident investigations, site compliance inspections, and training within Komatsu as needed.
### **Required Skills**

* Bachelor's degree \\- preferably in engineering or business or related discipline.
* Significant experience as a project manager with experience leading mid\\-sized and low to medium\\-level complexity technology projects.
* Strong understanding of product development processes, tools, methodologies, and best practices.
* Strong knowledge of mining operations, with hands on experience in operations, engineering or maintenance.
* Extensive background in applying mining technology in operational roles.
* Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to filter and distill meaningful information to the right audience.
* An effective communicator and compelling leader who is respectful with the ability influence and guide decisions through data, collaboration, and leadership.
* Excellent time management and organisational skills.
### **Desired Skills**

* Project Management Professional (PMP)® Certification.
* WHS qualifications desirable.



**Diversity \\& Inclusion Commitment**

At Komatsu we come from diverse backgrounds, with unique perspectives, experiences, and contributions. We are committed to creating a workforce that is reflective of the communities we work and live in. We believe that our people are part of our shared purpose. We are authentic, ambitious, and innovative in our pursuit of Diversity \\& Inclusion. United, we are on a journey towards a sustainable future that creates value together.


If you want to learn more about Komatsu, please visit our website at https://www.komatsu.com/ .





**Company Information**

Komatsu is a world leader in manufacturing construction, mining, forestry, and industrial heavy equipment. Founded in 1921, Komatsu has a long history of quality, reliability, innovation, and excellence. title: Field Engineer - Civil (Contract Based)
description:
**Field Engineer \\- Civil (Contract Based)** **\\-** **SUL005D****Company****:** Worley**Primary Location****:** IDN\\-SL\\-Sulawesi Selatan**Job****:** Field Engineering**Schedule****:** Full\\-time**Employment Type****:** Employee**Management Level****:** Individual Contributor**Job Posting****:** Nov 4, 2025**Unposting Date****:** Dec 4, 2025**Reporting Manager Title****:** Project Manager
: **About the job**


We’re looking for a Field Engineer (Civil) to join our team.


When you work for us, you get the chance to join nearly 50,000 people all driven by a common purpose of delivering a more sustainable world. We’re excited about the challenges ahead. We believe there’s never been a more rewarding time to work in the energy, chemical and resources sectors.


We offer a flexible approach to working, because our people are safer, healthier, and more productive when they can balance work with life. That’s why there are flexible and hybrid working options, so you can choose when, where and how you work.

 **Who we are**


Worley is a global professional services company of energy, chemicals and resources experts headquartered in Australia.


Right now, we’re bridging two worlds as we accelerate to more sustainable energy sources, while helping our customers provide the energy, chemicals and resources that society needs now.


We partner with our customers to deliver projects and create value over the life of their portfolio of assets. We solve complex problems by finding integrated data\\-centric solutions from the first stages of consulting and engineering to installation and commissioning, to the last stages of decommissioning and remediation. Join us and help drive innovation and sustainability in our projects.

 **What you’ll do**


We’re looking for a Field Engineer (Civil) to join our team.


This roles responsibility includes:

* Monitoring the construction Contractor’s planning and work, and advising the Contract Administrator on Contractor’s requests for information (RFI) and the field work instruction (FWI) procedures during construction
* Interpret and analyze engineering designs, blueprints, and specifications to ensure feasibility and compliance with project requirements.
* Collaborate closely with project managers, designers, and other stakeholders to ensure effective communication and smooth project execution.
* Ensure construction work conforms to applicable specifications, codes, and standards.
* Conduct thorough inspections and quality checks of completed construction tasks to ensure they align with design specifications and meet high\\-quality standards.
* Ensure project scope, budgets and schedules for construction are effectively communicated and met on projects.
* Mentoring and supervision of construction supervisors.
 **What you’ll have**

* Minimum of 7\\-10 years’ experience a Field Engineer or similar role.
* Prior experience in mining industry and/or resources industry is advantageous
* Bachelor Degree (or higher) in Engineering (Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Piping, Instrumentation)
* Excellent communication skills.
* Work as part of a multi\\-discipline team.

 **Moving forward together**  

We want our people to be energized and empowered to drive sustainable impact. So, our focus is on a values\\-inspired culture that unlocks brilliance through belonging, connection and innovation.  

We’re building a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace. Creating a space where everyone feels they belong, can be themselves, and are heard.  

And we're not just talking about it; we're doing it. We're reskilling our people, leveraging transferable skills, and supporting the transition of our workforce to become experts in today's low carbon energy infrastructure and technology.  

Whatever your ambition, there’s a path for you here. And there’s no barrier to your potential career success. Join us to broaden your horizons, explore diverse opportunities, and be part of delivering sustainable change.  

**Ready to join us? Apply now to submit your CV**
