title: Backend Engineer - Junior or Senior Consultant
description:
**About EY:**

  

EY, a global leader operating in more than 150 countries delivers unparalleled service in **Consulting** and assists clients to transform and upskill their capabilities.

  

We serve our clients to build a better working world, helping them to create long\\-term value for people and society and build trust in the capital markets. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities, and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we work towards our ambition to be the best employer.

  

EY advises clients to understand, architect, select and implement bleeding\\-edge solutions required to efficiently run their businesses, with a focus on Digital and Cloud. These service areas span E\\-commerce, Solution Architecture, Mobile Applications, Digital Platform Architecture, Digital Technology Strategy, and Digital IT Operations.

  

The exceptional EY experience. It’s yours to build.

 **The opportunity:**


The Digital \\& Emerging Technology team works collaboratively with clients to transform their business through disruptive innovation enablement and transformational design solutions. The team supports our clients in modernizing systems, processes and products to enhance business and customer\\-facing platforms and services to support high performance in a rapidly changing and competitive environment. Our team helps clients sustain competitive advantage and profitability by developing technology strategies, products, and solutions to stay ahead of the rapid pace of change and disruption and supporting the execution of complex transformations.


We're seeking a highly skilled and experienced Backend Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and high\\-performance backend systems. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including front\\-end developers, product managers, and QA engineers, to deliver robust and efficient solutions. While our teams primary focus is within the financial services industries, you will have opportunities to support other sectors including healthcare, automotive, high\\-tech, and media.

**Your key responsibilities:**


The goal is to support our clients to transform their business through technology. As a Backend Engineer you will be collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features, identify and address performance bottlenecks in the backend systems, design and optimize database schemas, develop and maintain RESTful APIs for seamless communication between front\\-end and back\\-end systems, write unit tests and participate in code reviews, collaborate with technical writers to create user and developer documentation, and operating your team's software systems in a consistently high quality manner. When working on the systems within your team's domain, you take into account the appropriate architectural patterns, code design, and infrastructure options, ensuring that you deliver a system that is secure, reliable, maintainable, extensible and very well tested. Beyond delivery to the production system, engineers will be responsible for post deployment monitoring as well.


In addition to being trusted to operate independently, you also maintain a good partnership with your technical and non\\-technical stakeholders for projects that you are involved in. You take an active role in your projects as a team member involved in product design to rollout, taking ownership of your work and constantly focusing on moving these projects forward.


Being an experienced team member, you are also expected to continuously help the team grow and improve either by mentoring new or junior members of your team or by introducing and adopting process improvements.

 **Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree (Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Mathematics) or related experience
* 1\\-3 years of Development experience
* Strong knowledge of algorithms and data structures
* Fluency in developing and understanding sequence diagrams, class models, etc.
* Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Java, C\\# .Net, or Golang.
* Solid understanding of database systems, both relational and NoSQL.
* Strong in fundamental programming like SOLID Principle, Clean Architecture or related fundamental knowledge and practices
* Experience in writing maintainable and testable code, including API design, unit testing and UI testing techniques.
* Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.
* Humble and hungry engineer. Always curious, always looking for a better way
* Highly accountable and takes ownership of one's own work.

  

For senior software engineer:

* 4\\+ years of professional backend software development experience
* Experience with Event\\-Driven Architecture such as Kafka or RabbitMQ
* Familiarity with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
* Knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
* Possess excellent communication, sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills, able to think critically of the current system in terms of growth and stability
* Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
* Familiarity with modern build pipelines and tools
* Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues

 **What we look for**


We’re interested in passionate individuals with a strong vision and a desire to stay on top of trends. If you have a genuine passion for helping businesses achieve their full potential, then these role(s) are for you.

 **What we offer**

* Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next
* Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, on your way
* Transformative leadership: We’ll give you the insights, coaching, and confidence to be the leader the world needs
* Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs

  

If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.
company_description: At EY, we are committed to building a better working world.

title: Senior Quality Engineer
description:
We're looking for a Senior Quality Engineer to join our united, dedicated, and enthusiastic team at LINK Mobility, Europe’s leading provider of mobile messaging.
At LINK, we connect businesses to customers through our communications products and services that drive engagement and satisfaction during each stage of the customer journey.
You're probably already familiar with us: we're behind the messages you receive via SMS, WhatsApp, email, or even check\\-in for your upcoming flight, receive delivery notifications, cash in a mobile coupon to your favorite store, and so much more.
It’s an exciting time to join LINK as we develop our award\\-winning communications platform as a service (CPaaS) offerings in this rapidly advancing tech industry.  

POSITION OVERVIEW
As Senior QA engineer you will have an important role in the process of analyzing and testing the products developed, identifying any bugs or other issues, ensuring high quality of the team deliveries. The scope of the team is to develop and evolve the voting and promotion platforms and mobile apps

  

YOU’LL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR* Design, develop, maintain, and execute automated test scripts using **Java Script and Type Script** across multiple phases of the testing lifecycle, including design, creation, maintenance, deployment, and reporting.
* Perform **manual testing** (functional, regression, integration, system, and end\\-to\\-end) to ensure software quality and stability across releases.
* Collaborate closely with **Development** and **Product** teams to define and implement effective test methodologies, standards, and best practices to ensure fast and safe software delivery.
* Support ongoing feature development by designing, executing, and maintaining both **manual** and **automated** test suites.
* Analyze test results, identify root causes of defects, and document them clearly in **bug tracking systems** (JIRA).
* Participate in the review of product requirements and contribute to the **design of test strategies** and test plans.
* Generate detailed and comprehensive **test reports** to communicate test progress, quality metrics, and risks.
* Troubleshoot issues, reproduce reported bugs, and work with engineers to validate fixes.
* Share knowledge, mentor peers, and promote a culture of quality within the team.


WE HOPE YOU HAVE* Proven experience as a QA Engineer with strong skills in both manual and automated testing.
* Hands\\-on experience with JavaScript is preferred; experience with other programming languages such as Java, Python, C\\#, Perl, PowerShell, or Bash is a plus.
* Good understanding of the software development life cycle and software testing methodologies.
* Experience with bug tracking tools (JIRA) and version control systems
* Experience with API testing tools (Postman) or network sniffing/tracing tools
* Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment.
* Basic understanding of computer networking concepts
* Fluency in English


OUR IDEAL MATCH IS* Self\\-motivated and driven with strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills
* Business\\-oriented with the ability to understand the value chain and business model of the customers
* Good communication \\& collaboration skills, and readiness to work in multicultural environment
* Positive attitude and a constructive mindset


WE CAN OFFER YOU* A dynamic, international work environment
* Private health insurance
* Wellness app subscription
* Hybrid work plan with home office/distant working (3 days office, 2 days remote)
* Annual bonus eligibility based on achieved targets
* Eligibility to enroll in LINK’s employee share purchase program, which provides a
* 20% discount on company stock purchased by permanent employees
* *All benefits are subject to local terms and regulations and may be changed during employment*

  

LOCATION: Skopje/Kumanovo, Macedonia
Apply as soon as possible. Applications are evaluated on an ongoing basis.

 **LINK Mobility** is publicly listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange with offices in 18 countries throughout Europe. We continue to experience strong organic growth and recurring revenue as businesses move more activities onto mobile platforms. In 2023, LINK Mobility had a total turnover of 6\\.3 billion NOK.

*Every employee is an important member of LINK Mobility. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind – whether active or passive – based on ethnicity, national origin, religion, disability, gender, sexual orientation, marital or parental status, union membership, political views, age, or any other characteristic that results in compromising the principle of equality. LINK regards diversity as a lever for innovation and profitability.*

ASAP

Dragana Lazarevska
QA Team lead

IT

Full time

title: Market Claim Engineer
description:
Bridge market feedback with production quality and vendor management. This role ensures customer complaints and product failures from the field are collected, analyzed, and translated into corrective actions, while coordinating warranty and claim recovery processes with suppliers.


What You Will Do:

* Collect and categorize customer claims received through Service and QA channels.
* Conduct joint root cause analysis (RCA) with Quality Control and vendor teams.
* Maintain and analyze claim databases to identify recurring failure trends (e.g., top 5 failure modes).
* Coordinate logistics and documentation for part returns and supplier credit claims.
* Provide feedback on quality issues to relevant process owners and monitor improvements.
* Track claim and replacement status from manufacturing and material suppliers.
* Support preventive actions by feeding insights back to R\\&D for design or process improvements.


What You Will Need:

title: Quality Assurance Engineer - Senior Consultant
description:
**About EY:**

  

EY, a global leader operating in more than 150 countries delivers unparalleled service in **Consulting** and assists clients to transform and upskill their capabilities.

  

We serve our clients to build a better working world, helping them to create long\\-term value for people and society and build trust in the capital markets. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities, and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we work towards our ambition to be the best employer.

  

EY advises clients to understand, architect, select and implement bleeding\\-edge solutions required to efficiently run their businesses, with a focus on Digital and Cloud. These service areas span E\\-commerce, Solution Architecture, Mobile Applications, Digital Platform Architecture, Digital Technology Strategy, and Digital IT Operations.

  

The exceptional EY experience. It’s yours to build.

 **The opportunity:**


The Digital \\& Emerging Technology team works collaboratively with clients to transform their business through disruptive innovation enablement and transformational design solutions. The team supports our clients in modernizing systems, processes and products to enhance business and customer\\-facing platforms and services to support high performance in a rapidly changing and competitive environment. Our team helps clients sustain competitive advantage and profitability by developing technology strategies, products, and solutions to stay ahead of the rapid pace of change and disruption and supporting the execution of complex transformations.

  

We're seeking a qualified Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer to help ensure the software products’ quality and company’s success. Our ideal candidate will be responsible for conducting tests before product launches and monitor all stages to ensure the consistent and high\\-quality software design. It is very important that our team members take initiatives to identify problems, and have the right mindset and skill sets to solve them. While our teams primary focus is within the financial services industries, you will have opportunities to support other sectors including healthcare, automotive, high\\-tech, and media.

 **Your key responsibilities:**

  

The goal is to support our clients to transform their business through technology. As a QA Engineer you will be responsible for review requirements, specifications, and technical design document to provide timely and effective feedback. Create detailed, comprehensive, and well\\-structured test plans and test case. Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs.

  

In addition to being trusted to operate independently, you also maintain a good partnership with your technical and non\\-technical stakeholders for projects that you are involved in. You take an active role in your projects as a team member involved in product design to rollout, taking ownership of your work and constantly focusing on moving these projects forward.

  

Being an experienced team member, you are also expected to continuously help the team grow and improve either by mentoring new or junior members of your team or by introducing and adopting process improvements.

 **Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree (Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Mathematics) or related experience
* Having 3 years of Development experience
* Humble and hungry engineer. Always curious, always looking for a better way
* Highly accountable and takes ownership of one's own work.
* Proven experience as a Quality Assurance Tester or similar role.
* Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
* Hands\\-on experience with black box and white box testing.
* Hands\\-on experience with automated testing tools.
* Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.
* Familiar with Rest API testing using Postman, Swagger, etc.
* Has skill in software testing automation tools such as Selenium, Appium, JMeter, Katalon Studio, Android Emulator, IOS Emulator, Browser Stack is a plus

 **Ideally, you must have****a:**

* Prior consulting experience relevant to industry\\-specific business and technology functions
* Prior consulting experience highly preferred

 **What we look for**


We’re interested in passionate individuals with a strong vision and a desire to stay on top of trends. If you have a genuine passion for helping businesses achieve their full potential, then these role(s) are for you.

 **What we offer**

* Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next
* Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, on your way
* Transformative leadership: We’ll give you the insights, coaching, and confidence to be the leader the world needs
* Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs

  

If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.

**Company Description** **Who are we?**


In the fast\\-growing economies of the world, there’s a new generation of ambitious younger people eager to gain financial independence. And they’re turning to the world’s financial markets to achieve it. Exinity’s mission is to empower them to succeed. We design, engineer and market a growing range of innovative trading and investing products that meet their expectations for choice, creativity and control, and which are backed by risk management tools, education \\- and a great customer experience.


For over 20 years, Exinity has provided leveraged trading to some two million customers through our global brands Alpari and FXTM. Now, we are adding further brands to our portfolio – with a further three planned for rollout by the end of 2022\\.


Exinity is an energetic and diverse company with offices across Europe, Asia and Africa, and we’re always looking for talented individuals to join us. ‘Freedom to Succeed’ is not just a promise we make to our clients and partners, but to our people too. title: IT Quality Assurance (Q A ) Automation
description:
**Job Summary**A Quality Assurance Engineer with 1\\-5 years of experience is needed to contribute to the testing and quality management processes in a dynamic and collaborative environment. The role requires strong technical skills, proficiency in QA/TE/SDET, and a keen eye for detail. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing test plans, performing manual and automated testing, identifying defects, and ensuring that products meet both business and technical requirements. In addition to testing, the role involves performance testing and working closely with cross\\-functional teams to ensure product quality throughout the development lifecycle.  
**Requirement**

* Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Computer Science, Informatics) or equivalent. Open to non\\-engineering backgrounds with strong technical expertise.
* 1\\-5 years of experience in QA/TE/SDET or a similar field
* Strong technical and programming skills
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills
* Proficiency in quality management software (e.g., Jira)
* Strong attention to detail and accuracy
* Effective communication and teamwork skills

**Qualifications**

* **Testing Skills**: Knowledge of testing types (Smoke, Regression, Sanity), testing techniques (Decision Table, Black Box, etc), and bug management.
* **Programming**: Familiarity with basic programming concepts (variables, data structures, functions, and async programming) in one or more languages such as **JavaScript**, **Java**, **Python**, or similar.
* **Automation Frameworks**: Experience with one or more frameworks like **Cypress, WebdriverIO**, **Appium**, or **k6** for API and web automation, Mobile Automation.
* **Software Tools**: Basic Git, Linux, SQL, and understanding of REST APIs.

**Key ResponsibilitiesTesting Domain**

* Develop and document test plans, test cases, and test strategies.
* Execute manual and automated tests (regression, integration, UAT, system, etc.).
* Identify, log, and track defects in defect tracking systems (e.g., Jira).
* Ensure comprehensive test coverage and measure effectiveness.
* Monitor and report key test metrics (pass/fail rates, defect density, etc.).
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams (e.g., development, product).

**Product Analysis**

* Review product specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria.
* Conduct risk\\-based testing to prioritize critical product areas.
* Perform usability testing to identify UI/UX issues.
* Validate product features against business requirements.
* Track product versions and ensure feature testing aligns with release stages.

**Technical Analysis**

* Perform performance testing to identify and resolve bottlenecks.
* Evaluate scalability by testing system performance under load.
* Test APIs and integrations to ensure system interoperability.

**Automation Testing**

* Develop and maintain test automation (e.g., Cypress, etc.).
* Write, execute, and maintain automated test scripts.
* Generate and analyze detailed test reports.
* Update and maintain automation scripts based on product changes.
* Contribute to the test automation strategy and prioritize which tests to automate.

title: Civil Engineer
description:
Siegwerk is one of the world’s leading suppliers of Printing Inks and sustainable packaging solutions. A career here will give you significant **flexibility** and **support** in a company focused on making a **positive impact** in the world. Siegwerk is poised to disrupt the global packaging industry; changing the way packaging is produced and consumed for the benefit of us all. At Siegwerk, you will have everything you need to help make that change.

**Location : Tangerang****Indonesia**

  

Join us, let’s **Do it. With Heart.**

 **Key Responsibilities**

**Site Management \\& Supervision**

* **Direct On\\-Site Supervision:** Oversee and manage all daily civil construction activities, including earthworks, foundations, structural works (e.g., concrete, steel), paving, drainage, and utilities installation.
* **Quality Assurance/Control (QA/QC):** Conduct regular, detailed inspections of work in progress to ensure materials, workmanship, and construction procedures strictly adhere to approved design specifications, project standards, and local building codes.
* **Safety Enforcement:** Champion the project's safety culture. Ensure all workers and subcontractors comply with health, safety, and environmental (HSE) regulations and site\\-specific safety plans. Conduct daily safety briefings and hazard identification.
* **Progress Monitoring:** Track and report on the daily and weekly progress of construction activities against the project schedule. Identify potential delays and proactively implement corrective actions.

**Technical \\& Coordination**

* **Drawing \\& Specification Interpretation:** Serve as the on\\-site expert for interpreting complex engineering drawings, blueprints, and project specifications. Resolve any technical queries or discrepancies that arise in the field.
* **Resource Coordination:** Coordinate labor, equipment, and material deliveries to maximize site efficiency and productivity. Manage and optimize the use of construction resources.
* **Stakeholder Liaison:** Act as the primary technical point of contact for subcontractors, vendors, and third\\-party inspectors/consultants.

**Documentation \\& Reporting**

title: Senior iOS Engineer
description:
**Join the revolution in hospitality tech!**

 **Liven** is a leading global data, technology, and customer experience provider for the hospitality industry. From humble beginnings, we have grown to serve over 6,000 venues and millions of diners across Australia, the USA, and Southeast Asia, processing over 120 million transactions worth more than $3 billion (AUD) annually.

  

At **Liven**, our platform is built to help hospitality businesses **save more and work smarter** by seamlessly integrating every aspect of their operations — from **ordering and payments** to **back\\-of\\-house management**.

  

Driven by a deep passion for the hospitality industry, we continuously innovate to elevate the experience for both venues and their guests. Our solutions are powered by **AI\\-enriched insights** and **automated workflows**, enabling smarter decision\\-making and smoother operations at scale.

  

We’re proud to be an **AI\\-first organisation**. By automating repetitive tasks, we free up space for our teams — and our customers — to focus on what truly matters: solving complex problems, delighting guests, and driving meaningful growth.  

  

**Key Milestones:**

* **Expansion:** Acquired OrderUp, Abacus, Zeemart, Copper and Nomnie forming Asia Pacific’s largest end\\-to\\-end group in hospitality technology.
* **Global Reach:** Headquartered across major cities including Melbourne, Brisbane, Sydney, Singapore, Bali, Jakarta, New York, and India.


If you're someone who thrives on creativity, bold thinking, and using technology to make things better, faster, and smarter — you’ll feel right at home here.

 **Here’s a quick glimpse of Liven:**

* You can visit Career
* You can visit LinkedIn
* You can Visit Blog
* Acquisition News

  

We’re looking for a **Senior iOS Engineer** to join our POS team. In this role, you’ll take technical ownership of our iOS\\-based POS product, working on new features, performance improvements, and key architectural components. You’ll work closely with cross\\-platform squads including Android, Backend, QA, and Product to build world\\-class tools for hospitality operators.

 **What you'll do**

* Maintain and evolve Liven’s iOS POS application using **Swift**, **Objective\\-C**, and core iOS frameworks.
* Design and implement new features and UI/UX improvements based on product roadmap.
* Lead the development of reusable components, libraries, and frameworks (including Flutter integrations).
* Integrate the app with backend services, APIs, and hardware relevant to POS operations.
* Monitor crash rates and app performance; target a **20% reduction** in app crashes over 6 months.
* Collaborate closely with Product Managers, QA, and fellow engineers to ensure high\\-quality releases.
* Contribute to and improve CI/CD workflows, automated testing, and deployment processes.
* Mentor junior iOS engineers and help upskill the team through code reviews and pair programming.

**Qualifications**

* **8\\+ years** of software development experience with a focus on iOS.
* **5\\+ years** of hands\\-on experience with **Objective\\-C** and proven contributions to commercial apps.
* Advanced proficiency in **Swift** and strong understanding of **UIKit** and **iOS internals**.
* Experience working with **multithreading**, **design patterns**, and scalable architecture (e.g., MVC, MVVM, Clean).
* Solid experience building **transactional systems** or apps in the **POS domain**.
* Familiarity with **Flutter** and interest in cross\\-platform codebases is a plus.
* Comfortable with tools like **Firebase**, **Crashlytics**, **Fastlane**, and **GitHub Actions**.
* Proven ability to guide junior team members and work effectively within a collaborative environment.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.

**Good to Have**

* In\\-depth understanding of **POS workflows** and integrations with payment terminals and other hardware.
* Experience working with **real\\-time data sync**, **WebSockets**, and **push notifications**.
* Exposure to Flutter for shared modules or components.
* Familiarity with App Store review guidelines and release processes.

description:
**Join the revolution in hospitality tech!**

 **Liven** is a leading global data, technology, and customer experience provider for the hospitality industry. From humble beginnings, we have grown to serve over 6,000 venues and millions of diners across Australia, the USA, and Southeast Asia, processing over 120 million transactions worth more than $3 billion (AUD) annually.

  

At **Liven**, our platform is built to help hospitality businesses **save more and work smarter** by seamlessly integrating every aspect of their operations — from **ordering and payments** to **back\\-of\\-house management**.

  

Driven by a deep passion for the hospitality industry, we continuously innovate to elevate the experience for both venues and their guests. Our solutions are powered by **AI\\-enriched insights** and **automated workflows**, enabling smarter decision\\-making and smoother operations at scale.

  

We’re proud to be an **AI\\-first organisation**. By automating repetitive tasks, we free up space for our teams — and our customers — to focus on what truly matters: solving complex problems, delighting guests, and driving meaningful growth.  

  

**Key Milestones:**

* **Expansion:** Acquired OrderUp, Abacus, Zeemart, Copper and Nomnie forming Asia Pacific’s largest end\\-to\\-end group in hospitality technology.

**About the role**
------------------


As a **QA Tester** at Liven, you’ll be the guardian of quality across our platform. You’ll work closely with developers, product managers, and designers to ensure our releases are stable, reliable, and deliver seamless experiences to our customers. This role focuses primarily on manual testing, with opportunities to contribute to test process improvements, exploratory testing, and collaboration with SDETs on automation initiatives. You’ll play a key part in shaping quality practices across the development lifecycle and advocating for excellence at every stage

**What you'll do**
------------------

* **Manual Testing:** Design, maintain, and execute detailed test cases for web and mobile applications.
* **Exploratory Testing:** Investigate new features and complex workflows, identifying edge cases and potential issues.
* **Regression Testing:** Validate core user journeys and ensure stability across releases.
* **Defect Management:** Log, track, and verify issues in collaboration with development teams.
* **Collaboration:** Partner with engineers and product teams to ensure features are built with quality in mind.
* **Process Improvement:** Contribute to QA documentation, standards, and continuous improvement initiatives.
* **Automation Collaboration:** Work alongside SDETs to identify test cases for automation and ensure coverage parity

**Qualifications**
------------------

* **4–6 years** of experience in manual testing or QA roles.
* Strong understanding of QA methodologies, test case design, and defect lifecycle management.
* Experience testing web and/or mobile applications.
* Familiarity with tools like JIRA, TestRail, Postman, or equivalent.
* Basic knowledge of API testing and database validation (SQL).
* Excellent analytical, troubleshooting, and communication skills.
* A proactive, detail\\-oriented mindset with a passion for delivering high\\-quality software

**Good to Have**
----------------

* Exposure to test automation frameworks (e.g., Cypress, Playwright, Jest).
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and Git\\-based workflows.
* Experience with performance, usability, or security testing.
* Understanding of containerized or cloud\\-based systems (Docker, AWS, etc.).

We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world. **About the Role**

In this role, you will play a key part in ensuring the quality and reliability of our products across web, desktop, and mobile platforms. You will collaborate closely with engineers, product managers, designers, and operations teams throughout the entire software development lifecycle, contributing to test strategy, execution, and continuous improvement of our processes. **Proficiency in Rust / Java is essential**, as you will leverage it to design, develop, and maintain automated test frameworks and tools that ensure our systems meet the highest standards of performance and stability.

Familiarity with **secondary development tools** or cross\\-platform frameworks will be considered a plus.

title: Software Engineer in QA
description:
Ninja Van is a late\\-stage logtech startup that is disrupting a massive industry with innovation and cutting edge technology. Launched 2014 in Singapore, we have grown rapidly to become one of Southeast Asia's largest and fastest\\-growing express logistics companies. Since our inception, we’ve delivered to 100 million different customers across the region with added predictability, flexibility and convenience. Join us in our mission to connect shippers and shoppers across Southeast Asia to a world of new possibilities. **More about us:*** We process 250 million API requests and 3TB of data every day.
* We deliver more than 2 million parcels every day.
* 100% network coverage with 2600\\+ hubs and stations in 6 SEA markets (Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam and Philippines), reaching 500 million consumers.
* 2 Million active shippers in all e\\-commerce segments, from the largest marketplaces to the individual social commerce sellers.
* Raised more than US$500 million over five rounds.

  

We are looking for world\\-class talent to join our crack team of engineers, product managers and designers. We want people who are passionate about creating software that makes a difference to the world. We like people who are brimming with ideas and who take initiative rather than wait to be told what to do. We prize team\\-first mentality, personal responsibility and tenacity to solve hard problems and meet deadlines. As part of a small and lean team, you will have a very direct impact on the success of the company.
### **Roles \\& Responsibilities**

* Work with the product team to understand requirements, design comprehensive test plans and test cases.
* Execute the plans to thoroughly test all software releases under your charge, which can include client and server side products, API platform and server infrastructure.
* Create automated tests for the test cases, manually test software for which automation is not available yet.

title: Software Engineer, SEA
description:
*Note: Partly is headquartered in Christchurch, New Zealand, but has employees across NZ, AU, UK, US, SEA and the EU. This position is to be based remotely from the Philippines/ Indonesia.*

**Our story**
=============


Partly's mission is to connect the world's parts and we're doing that by building the first global platform for replacement parts, starting with auto parts. Our big vision is to accelerate the world towards a sustainable future where waste is eliminated and all replacement parts are universally searchable, accessible and available to all.


Founded by ex\\-Rocket Lab engineers, we utilise bleeding\\-edge technology to solve challenging but exciting problems that make a huge impact in a $1\\.9 trillion industry. We've more than tripled our team over the last 12 months and expect to double in size again over the coming 12 months. We're a global team spanning both Europe and Australasia.


We provide a scalable digital infrastructure solution to some of the world's largest businesses and the most exciting startups. Partly's solutions are integrated across hundreds of companies globally, providing the backbone for cataloguing and managing parts online.


Our investors in Blackbird Ventures (Canva, CultureAmp etc.), Square Peg, Octopus Ventures, Hillfarrance, Icehouse, Peter Beck (Rocket Lab), Akshay Kothari (Notion Co\\-Founder) and Dylan Field (Figma Co\\-Founder).


We're continuing to build a world\\-class team and ensuring Partly is a place where people can do the best work of their lives. We're proud of the culture we've built at Partly, and our values are lived throughout every experience.

**This role**
=============


In this role, you will work alongside other members of our development team to build out Developer and QA tools and to support our customers with integrations.


This is an opportunity to work in an extremely fast\\-paced environment and take on rewarding challenges and responsibilities.

**What will you do**
====================

* You'll be working on Developer and QA tooling.
* You will be developing systems and integrations for internal and third\\-party sales channels
* This is an opportunity to become an expert in the extremely complex and underserved auto parts domain

**Your skills**
===============

* 1\\+ years of experience developing software
* Competency in working with relational databases
* Firmly grounded computer science and engineering fundamentals, including data structures, concurrency, architecture, and design patterns.
* Strong communication and collaborative skills, both written and verbal
* (Bonus) Experience with Rust
* (Bonus) Experience with automotive parts


Please note: if you don't have all the skills/experience listed above but believe you could be outstanding in this role, please still consider applying. Many folks, especially those from underrepresented or marginalised groups, often count themselves out. Please allow us to learn more about you and why you're exceptional!

**Benefits**
============

* **Competitive base salary plus equity**. Even though we’re a small startup, we offer competitive salaries and great equity.
* **Parental leave and flexible return to work**. After returning to work, primary carers can work 4\\-day weeks for 100% of their pay for the first twelve weeks. For secondary carers, we offer 10 days of leave at full pay.
* **Flexible working hours**. We’re office\\-first, but are flexible with hours and working from home when you need to.
* **Quarterly Team get\\-togethers.** Spend time getting to know the wider SEA team in a central location.

The Digital \\& Emerging Technology team works collaboratively with clients to transform their business through disruptive innovation enablement and transformational design solutions. The team supports our clients in modernizing systems, processes and products to enhance business and customer\\-facing platforms and services to support high performance in a rapidly changing and competitive environment. Our team helps clients sustain competitive advantage and profitability by developing technology strategies, products, and solutions to stay ahead of the rapid pace of change and disruption and supporting the execution of complex transformations.


We're seeking a highly skilled and experienced Digital Transformation Technology Consultant to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and delivering scalable and high\\-performance digital application. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including front\\-end developers, product managers, and QA engineers, to deliver robust and efficient solutions. While our teams primary focus is within the financial services industries, you will have opportunities to support other sectors including healthcare, automotive, high\\-tech, and media.

 **Your key responsibilities:**


The goal is to support our clients to transform their business through technology. As a Digital Transformation Technology Consultant, you will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define, design, and deploy new features, identify and address any system challenges in the digital application. When working on the systems within your team's responsibilities, you take into account the appropriate architectural design, ensuring that you deliver a system that is secure, reliable, maintainable, extensible and very well tested. Beyond delivery to the production system, consultant will be responsible to support post deployment monitoring as well.


In addition to being trusted to operate independently, you also maintain a good partnership with your technical and non\\-technical stakeholders for projects that you are involved in. You take an active role in your projects as a team leader involved in product design to rollout, taking ownership of your work and constantly focusing on moving these projects forward.


Being an experienced team leader, you are also expected to continuously help the team grow and improve either by mentoring new or junior members of your team or by introducing and adopting process improvements.

 **Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree (Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Mathematics) or related experience
* 7\\-10 years of system implementation project
* Strong knowledge of algorithms and data structures
* Good understanding in programming languages such as Java, C\\# .Net, or Golang
* Good understanding of database systems, both relational and NoSQL
* Good understanding maintainable and testable code, including API design, unit testing and UI testing technique
* Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process will be preferable
* Humble and hungry consultant, always curious, always looking for a better way, and have an excellent communication skill
* Highly accountable and takes ownership of one's own work.
* Able to articulate business requirement, stakeholder management and technology requirement
* Have experience in integration project with multiple stakeholders

 **What we look for**


We’re interested in passionate individuals with a strong vision and a desire to stay on top of trends. If you have a genuine passion for helping businesses achieve their full potential, then these role(s) are for you.

 **What we offer**

* Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next
* Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, on your way
* Transformative leadership: We’ll give you the insights, coaching, and confidence to be the leader the world needs
* Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs

  

If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.

  

EY is an equal opportunity, affirmative action employer providing equal employment opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, or any other legally protected basis, including arrest and conviction records, by applicable law.

  

EY is committed to providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with special needs. If you are a qualified individual with special needs and need assistance applying online or need to request an accommodation during the interview process, please speak to our HR executives, and we will be happy to help you.

title: Technical Product Manager
description:
**ABOUT INFLUENCONNECT \\& COMMS8**


InfluenConnect™ (www.influenconnect.com) is a pioneering SaaS platform launched by Comms8 in 2023 to liberate the influencer economy. The platform connects brands with over 105,000 influencers worldwide, providing transparency, data\\-driven insights, and access to diverse creators across emerging markets.  

  

Backed by Comms8 — a multi\\-award\\-winning martech agency with offices in London, Tokyo, and Hong Kong — our mission is to bridge East and West through impactful, inclusive campaigns. Our agency has been recognised by the Cannes Lions, UK Agency Awards, and The Drum. Clients include UNDP, NHS, Hoyoverse, Montblanc, and Air China.

**ABOUT OUR TEAM**


Our team at InfluenConnect x Comms8 is a dynamic and diverse group that thrives on collaboration and innovation. We believe in equal opportunities for all and celebrate the richness of cultural differences. We foster an inclusive work environment where every team member’s unique perspective and background are valued.

**ABOUT THE ROLE**


We’re hiring a Technical Product Manager to lead platform delivery and internal systems development across both InfluenConnect and Comms8\\.


You’ll report to the Managing Director and collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to:

* Drive core feature development on our SaaS platform (InfluenConnect)
* Oversee automation and tool\\-building to improve operational efficiency


This is a dual\\-role opportunity with clear ownership of technical execution. You’ll be fluent in product thinking, capable of translating business goals into dev\\-ready plans, and ideally comfortable implementing features independently as we reduce reliance on external developers.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Platform \\& Product Management**

* + Drive delivery of new features: discovery tools, UX improvements, creator onboarding, affiliate tracking, etc.
	+ Translate business objectives into roadmaps, sprint plans, and technical briefs
	+ Collaborate with external developers, internal analysts, and user teams
	+ Prioritize and launch scalable, user\\-centric features aligned with platform growth goals

**Internal Systems \\& Automation**

* + Lead system automation projects (CRM workflows, dashboards, content scheduling, supplier databases)
	+ Work with internal stakeholders and junior automation team (e.g. Airtable, Zapier, Looker Studio)
	+ Develop internal documentation and training materials for newly implemented tools

**Cross\\-Functional Management**

* + Use Trello, Jira, or Notion to manage project pipelines and team accountability
	+ Report regularly to the founder and unblock team progress as needed
	+ Balance fast delivery with long\\-term product quality and technical scale

**Requirements**

* 3–5 years of experience managing SaaS products or internal systems
* Must be a fluent with English \\& Chinese.
* Great communication skills.
* Solid grasp of product lifecycles, UX, APIs, and system basics (coding ability is a bonus)
* Confident in owning roadmaps, writing specs, and working with developers
* Comfortable using tools like Jira, Trello, Notion, Airtable, Zapier, and Looker Studio
* Plus values: experience with Web3, blockchain, payments, trust \\& safety, or marketplace platforms
* Proactive, solution\\-focused, and ready to get things done.

**Benefits**

* Be part of building two fast\\-growing brands changing the game in cross\\-cultural marketing and influencer tech.
* A supportive, inclusive team culture that champions your growth
* Career progression opportunities in a fast\\-growing agency
* Competitive salary and performance\\-based bonus
* Flexible, remote\\-first work style

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**About Us**


INDICO is a digital technology subsidiary company of Telkomsel, Indonesia's leading digital telecom company. INDICO plays a strategic role as a holding company that houses current and prospective vertical digital business portfolios, including Kuncie (edu\\-tech), Fita (health\\-tech), and Majamojo (game). Moving forward, INDICO aims to explore opportunities in multiple verticals adjacent to Telkomsel's digital businesses. Our goal is to leverage Telkomsel's digital assets to develop innovative cross\\-sectoral digital solutions, empowering Indonesia's digital economy.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design, develop, and maintain fullstack applications using Golang and React.js.
* Build scalable and optimized RESTful APIs for backend services.
* Create responsive user interfaces and integrate them with backend systems.
* Collaborate with designers to implement UI/UX designs from Figma or similar tools.
* Deploy and manage applications on AWS infrastructure.
* Write unit tests to ensure code quality and reliability.
* Optimize both backend and frontend components for performance.
* Stay updated with fullstack development trends and best practices.

**Requirements**

* Proficient in **Golang** for backend development and **React.js** for frontend development with 2\\-5 years of experience.
* Strong experience with **PostgreSQL**, including database schema design and optimization.
* Deep understanding of RESTful API development and integration between backend and frontend.
* Familiarity with **AWS** for cloud platform services.
* Proficient in implementing responsive and accessible UI components.
* Familiarity with Figma or other UI/UX design tools for design collaboration.
* Experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration tools (Kubernetes) is a plus.
* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).

**Soft Skills:**

* Proven ability to manage both backend and frontend development tasks efficiently.
* Strong problem\\-solving and debugging skills.
* Excellent communication skills for cross\\-team collaboration.

title: Ad-Hoc Game Developer (Unreal Engine)
description:
**Codingo Singapore** is the perfect place for student to expand their portfolio!

You need a place where you can work on projects that will **globalize** your standard? Need projects that will expand your knowledge and skills extensively? Looking to find a job in the international spectrum? **Codingo Singapore** provides you the bridge to the global standard.

**Codingo Singapore** is Singapore's no. 1 Assignment Help Platform. Initially focusing only in coding, we are now expanding into various fields! Thus, we require a lot of manpower to fulfill the fields that we are not established in.

A Game Developer builds interactive experiences using Unreal Engine, focusing on gameplay features, tools, and performance. The role combines programming, engine knowledge, and a sense of player experience. Depending on the team size, the developer may work on core gameplay, UI, networking, or visualization projects (e.g. simulation, training, or virtual showrooms).

**Key Responsibilities**

* Develop game features, mechanics, and systems in Unreal Engine using Blueprints and/or C\\+\\+.
* Implement player interactions, character abilities, pickups, quests, or level logic according to design specs.
* Work closely with designers and artists to integrate 3D assets, animations, VFX, and sound into the game.
* Optimize scenes and code to maintain target FPS on the required platform (PC, console, VR).
* Integrate physics, AI behavior trees, and animation blueprints where needed.
* Debug gameplay issues, fix crashes, and improve stability.
* Use version control (Git, Perforce) to collaborate in a multi\\-developer environment.
* Contribute to tooling or editor extensions that improve productivity of the content team.

**Required Skills and Tools**

* Strong knowledge of Unreal Engine (level setup, Blueprints, materials, packaging).
* C\\+\\+ for Unreal (classes, UPROPERTY, UObject lifecycle) or willingness to deepen skills.
* Understanding of real\\-time rendering concepts, collisions, and physics.
* Ability to read and implement design documents.
* Basic 3D knowledge (what a skeletal mesh is, what UVs are, what LODs do).
* Familiarity with source control and branching.

**Preferred Background**

* Degree in Computer Science, Game Development, Interactive Media, or equivalent experience.
* Portfolio or GitHub showing completed game features, prototypes, or tools.
* Experience with multiplayer, replication, or networking in Unreal is a plus.
* Experience in non\\-gaming real\\-time apps (ArchViz, training sims, digital twins) is also relevant.

**Work Arrangement:** WFA/WFH

Feel free to reach out to **dam@codingo.sg** for further information

title: Associate Product Marketing Manager, Android
description:
### **Minimum qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
* Less than 3 years of experience in a marketing related field.

  

### **Preferred qualifications:**

* Experience within the mobile industry, telecommunication or consumer goods, or within a leading consumer technology company.
* Experience in partner or retail marketing.
* Excellent investigative and quantitative reasoning skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to define and drive initiatives across organizations.

**About the job**
-----------------


In this role, you will work on marketing projects in the organization, and develop a breadth of marketing skills. You will work on learning and development milestones, attend APMM programming, and contribute to the Associate Product Marketing Manager (APMM) community.Know the user. Know the magic. Connect the two. At its core, marketing at Google starts with technology and ends with the user, bringing both together in unconventional ways. Our job is to demonstrate how Google's products solve the world's problems\\-from the everyday to the epic, from the mundane to the monumental. And we approach marketing in a way that only Google can\\-changing the game, redefining the medium, making the user the priority, and ultimately, letting the technology speak for itself.**Responsibilities**
--------------------

* Lead the development and execution of the Android marketing strategy, including setting annual goals, creating channel communication plans, and managing execution.
* Collaborate with Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM), Carrier, and developers partners to drive adoption of Google services through co\\-marketing campaigns and programs.
* Work cross\\-functionally with internal stakeholders across Google to evaluate the marketing opportunities from a financial and operational perspective. Monitor and evaluate performance, and share campaign learnings with the teams.
* Assist in defining and executing go\\-to\\-market strategies and campaigns for new product or feature launches and measure efficiency against key Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
* Assist in developing programs aimed at acquiring customers (e.g., business strategies, messaging, collateral, events), increasing the engagement with them and measuring the efficiency of the programs.
Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form.

title: Fraud Data Analyst
description:
**Fraud Data Analyst**
======================


Bali, BALI
Work Type: Full Time
  
**Position:** Fraud \\& Data Analyst  

**Location:** Bali, Indonesia (On\\-site)  

**Employment Type:** Full\\-time **About TyrAds**
TyrAds is a global marketing and advertising agency specializing in mobile user acquisition and performance marketing for top\\-tier gaming and app developers worldwide. We combine data\\-driven strategy, creative storytelling, and cutting\\-edge technology to deliver measurable results for our partners.
We’re now looking for a **Fraud \\& Data Analyst** to join our Bali office and play a key role in protecting our ecosystem from fraud, optimizing campaign performance, and driving strategic insights through data. **What You’ll Do:*** Monitor and analyze customer game progression, rewards, and overall activity to detect illicit, fraudulent, or suspicious behaviors on our platform.
* Collaborate with the Data Team to understand and analyze repayment behaviors, delinquency patterns, and loss drivers.
* Partner with the Tech Team to develop and enhance risk and fraud prevention tools and products.
* Generate ad\\-hoc reports and deep\\-dive analyses to support business and risk\\-related decisions.
* Design, develop, and maintain self\\-service dashboards, reports, and analytical infrastructure to enable scalable, real\\-time monitoring of risk and fraud patterns.
* Work closely with data engineers to define data requirements, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and availability of key data assets.
* Automate recurring reports and workflows to improve efficiency and reduce manual processes.
* Contribute to the development of new risk metrics, segmentation strategies, and performance tracking methodologies.
* Ensure all analytics and reporting comply with internal data governance and regulatory standards.

 **Requirements*** Minimum **3 years of experience** in **Fraud Analytics**, **Risk Analytics**, or **Data Analytics**.
* Strong proficiency in **SQL** and **Python** for data extraction, transformation, and analysis.
* Hands\\-on experience with **BI tools** such as **Tableau**, **Qlik**, or **Power BI**.
* Proven ability to translate complex data insights into clear, actionable recommendations for stakeholders across all levels.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills; comfortable engaging with senior leadership and cross\\-functional teams.
* Basic understanding of **data warehousing**, **ETL processes**, and working with large datasets.
* Experience in **dashboard development**, **report automation**, and **data quality improvement initiatives**.
* Experience in the **Gaming**, **AdTech**, or **Digital Marketing** industry is a strong plus.

 **Why Join TyrAds?*** Work in an international, fast\\-growing performance marketing company.
* Collaborative and innovative environment with global exposure.
* Opportunity to work closely with talented teams across Tech, Data, and Creative functions.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.

description:
### **About Team**

**About Sea Labs Indonesia:**
Sea Labs is at the core of the Sea platforms development, supporting diverse business lines from e\\-commerce, supply chain, games, payment and finance, among many others. The strong growth and unique positioning of Sea's e\\-commerce business, Shopee, spurred the launch of Sea Labs Indonesia. Since its inception, the group of passionate engineers have charted the course to drive the best experience for our users in Indonesia, many of which solutions are even adapted to other markets in the region.  

Sea's hyper\\-growing business scale has transformed most "innocent" problems into huge technical challenges, and there is no better place to experience world\\-class projects first\\-hand if you love technologies as much as we do. Together with our passionate and driven teams, you'll get to develop your skills, build on industry knowledge and collaborate with global teams in a dynamic space. Browse our Sea Labs Indonesia team openings to see how you can make an impact with us. **About the Team:**
We are a group of open\\-minded and innovative mobile developers. Enthusiastic about building high\\-performance mobile applications using the most suitable technologies, we bridge the gap across platforms and solve challenging problems to support our fast\\-growing business and improve product experience for our end users.### **Job Description**

* Responsible for mobile app front\\-end development, using latest technologies in Android (Kotlin/Java).
* Build various core business features and infra modules for the Shopee mobile app, unique opportunity to deliver world\\-class user experiences to millions of users globally.
* Write clean and maintainable code, and optimize code to improve performance, scalability, and reliability.
* Explore and evaluate the practicality of new technologies to improve existing products.
### **Requirements**

* Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields.
* Familiar with at least one programming language such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, Kotlin, etc.
* Solid understanding of computer fundamentals. Interested and ability to learn other coding languages as needed.
* Demonstrates passion for front\\-end development and interest in mobile app development.

title: Art Director (Jakarta, Indonesia)
description:
**Salary Range: IDR 14\\.000\\.000 \\- 17\\.000\\.000 (Gross)**

**Job Description:**


Weshine is hiring for our client (SoundBeats.io), a fast\\-growing Web3 entertainment and creator\\-tech company based in Hong Kong. SoundBeats empowers artists, gamers, and creators by combining AI, music, and gaming within an innovative blockchain ecosystem. The company turns licensed music into immersive, interactive gameplay experiences and allows creators to design and monetize beatmaps and game content. With access to a global music catalog and a powerful creation platform, SoundBeats is redefining how music and gaming intersect in the digital world.


Art Director will oversee the overall creative direction of Soundbeats, including video ads, marketing materials, banners, and especially the game application itself (UI, 3D models, environments, VFX, and all other visual elements).

* Ensure the creative direction aligns with marketing goals, delivering outputs on time and meeting weekly deadlines.
* Ensure the creative direction aligns with the technical implementation of the game, making sure all creative ideas are feasible and consistent with the overall goals of the game department.
* Provide a 3 to 6 month creative plan as requested, outlining the company’s creative direction and priorities. This should include reports, trends, and other key matters concerning the creatives of Soundbeats.
* Ensure high\\-quality store listing assets, such as screenshots, app icons, feature graphics, and promotional materials.
* Ensure that the mobile game and video ads follow a clear creative plan, deciding whether to synchronize both visuals or keep them distinct.
* Plan and define the UI design and user experience, including layouts, color schemes, animations, transitions, loader screens, and visual effects.
* Create and deliver all design assets for developers to implement, ensuring proper documentation and versioning for smooth handoff.
* Direct the visual style of 3D characters, weapons, props, font style, and other in\\-game objects, ensuring they match the brand’s identity and technical constraints.
* Define the look and style of environments for both ads and gameplay, including lighting, mood, atmosphere, and visual polish.
* Be hands\\-on with ui and gameplay’s creative design when necessary, ensuring environments/characters align with the creative vision while staying within mobile performance and technical limits using Unity Engine or other needed platforms when necessary.
* Oversee the creation of branding elements, such as typography, logos, color palettes, and overall brand identity for Soundbeats.
* Manage the production of video trailers, promotional clips, and creative storyboards, ensuring alignment with marketing campaigns.
* Ensure consistency of the visual identity across all media, including in\\-game assets, marketing, social media, and promotional campaigns.
* Stay updated on industry trends, competitor visuals, and best practices to keep Soundbeats’ creative direction fresh and competitive.
* Maintain strong cross\\-department collaboration, ensuring creative ideas align seamlessly with development and marketing. Lead the planning, strategizing, and execution of all key creative decisions.

title: Senior Unity Game Developer (Full Stack)
description:
We’re looking for a Senior Unity Game Developer (Full Stack) who can build, optimize, and ship gameplay systems from the ground up.
  
You’ll join a small, focused team building a football gaming experience where strategy, competition, and player ownership come together. This role is ideal for a developer who’s done it all — gameplay, UI integration, backend connections, optimization, tooling — and still enjoys getting deep into the details.
  
You’ll work directly with product, art, and design teams to turn creative concepts into high\\-performing, polished player experiences.
  
  

**Why You’ll Want to Join:**  

* You will be paid in USD (bi\\-monthly: every 15th and 30th)
* Up to 14 days of Paid Time Off annually (starting Day 1\\)
* Observance of Holidays (based on your location)
* 100% remote setup so you can work wherever you feel most productive
* Collaborate with a small, talented team where your work directly impacts the product
* Build games for a global football community backed by official licenses and partnerships


**What You’ll Work On:**  

Core Development
  
* Implement and optimize gameplay systems, UI frameworks, and backend API integrations
* Build editor tooling and workflow automations to improve production efficiency
* Manage pipeline optimization for importing and integrating 2D/3D assets, animations, and VFX
* Translate design mockups and motion files into fully functional in\\-game interfaces
* Contribute to system design, technical documentation, and clean, maintainable code


Performance and Optimization
  
* Profile, debug, and optimize memory, rendering, and CPU performance across mobile platforms
* Streamline build pipelines and asset workflows to improve iteration speed
* Balance visual fidelity and performance for smooth gameplay


Integration and Collaboration
  
* Work closely with motion, VFX, and UI teams to integrate and fine\\-tune assets inside Unity
* Collaborate with backend and design teams on feature implementation and API usage
* (Optional but a plus) Convert After Effects animations to Unity\\-compatible motion sequences
* Implement basic shaders and visual effects when needed


**What You Bring:**  

* 5–10 years of experience in Unity development (C\\#)
* Proven track record building and shipping mobile or cross\\-platform games
* Strong understanding of UI frameworks, asset integration, and performance optimization
* Experience with backend API integration and Unity editor tooling
* Ability to manage end\\-to\\-end Unity workflows (assets, pipelines, builds, and VFX integration)
* Self\\-driven, technically curious, and motivated to deliver at startup speed


Nice to Have
  
* Experience converting After Effects motion into Unity
* Familiarity with shader development (HLSL or Shader Graph)
* Strong understanding of VFX pipelines and animation blending
* Hands\\-on experience with Addressables, Scriptable Objects, and build automation
* Experience developing or contributing to non\\-AAA but high\\-quality indie or mobile titles


**How to Apply:**  

**Please include:**  

* Your updated resume highlighting Unity and gameplay experience
* A portfolio or GitHub link showcasing projects you’ve built or contributed to
* A short 1–2 minute Loom video introducing yourself and describing your most complex Unity project and your role in it


Only complete applications with both a portfolio and Loom video will move forward.
  
  

If you’ve built games from the ground up, enjoy optimizing everything you touch, and want to be part of a small team redefining football gaming for fans around the world, we’d love to meet you.
